All of preciseNews for Flash RSS users with SpringWidgets.
Add map points to a variety of auction, business and venue-type categories. Points contain descriptions with YouTube videos.

mashup: Countries that lie on the Equator
description: This Google Maps mashup shows countries through which the equator passes.

mashup: If I Walk a Straight Line
description: Where do you go if you go in a straight line around the world. Use this Google Maps mashup to choose the place that you will start from and what direction you are going to walk, and then see where you pass if you walk in a straight line around the world.

SnoTunes is the unofficial SNOCAP MyStore Search Engine. SnoTunes enables users to search over 250,000 SNOCAP MyStores, browse 100 genres by popularity and alphabetically, get music recommendations and download music MP3s.

Sumoradio combines various radio station playlists with Amazon.com. If you heard a song on the radio you can jump online, Sumo knows who, what and when. All playlists are updated every 5 minutes, you can save tracks for later by clicking Add to my mix.

Google Maps API used to simplify and speed searches for office space all over the UK Capital. The entire site is navigable by the map system, which includes postcode integration and images of office buildings.

mashup: Flex, Yahoo Maps, and RSS Feeds
description: Demonstration of a mashup using Yahoo Maps and the new AS3 Communications Kit for Flex 2. Maps GeoRSS or RSS feeds directly onto a map as well as displaying traffic or weather data. Source code available.
Track live comments posted to Digg. Blue posts are replies to the top thread, yellow are replies to another comment.
Vacation rental listing site using Google Maps and Google Local Search. New site with sample listings for presentation purposes.
Search for videos through Google.
Breaking news in pictures every few minutes. Featured stories are ripped from the headlines, using Netvibes UWA.
Breaking news and colorful commentary every few minutes, 24-7.

A site that generates code to embed maps created using the My Maps service of Google into websites and blogs. A range of style and presentation options are available to customize map appearance. Users can share maps they create in the library of maps.
Visits famous places through Virtual Earth and Google Maps. See Related Flickr photos.

Demonstrates the workaround provided by Yahoo for using Maps in Flex 2. Uses some sample code as base and adds some simple features like plotting geoRSS, regular RSS, and traffic and weather by zip code.
Social networking travel websites that creates personalized recommendations for each user based on user interests and user ratings. Uses geotagged Flickr photo stream and Google maps.

Get stock price, percentage change, 52 week range, EPS, PE ratio and market cap for any stock on the go. Simply use the keyword summary followed by the stock ticker symbol, e.g. AAPL, SUNW, AMZN, GOOG etc. Use from SMS, WAP or Email

Map mashup for mobile phones. FONFinder produces a mobile-friendly XHTML page with a map of the nearest FON hotspots based on a street address. Maps are adjusted in size for each particular mobile phone model.
Enter the name of digg user and see who is digging them. Can be used to highlight the issue of digg cabals and people who only digg each other.

mashup: Business of Baseball on Google Maps
description: Google Maps Mashup of Forbes data on the Most valuable teams in MLB. Also includes Yahoo Sports MLB RSS feeds.

From The Center for Public Integrity, Wasting Away is an authoritative report on the EPA that includes an original accounting of the companies responsible for many of polluted sites in America, as well as an array of maps that show where these sites are.

A Mozilla Firefox extension allowing users to view what music their facebook friends listen to and how similar their tastes are. View what music their Facebook users have recently being listening to on Last.fm and what their current chart is.
Search and view outdoor geo-tagged live webcams. Rated and shared by users.

Multi-Search uses Pipes, BBC News, Yahoo Search and Term Extraction APIs, and the Google Blog Search. We start with BBC news stories and excerpts, gather terms, find blog entries through Google, and then guess the feed URL using Yahoo Search.

Turtilla is an online service which allows you to search and filter content related to your interests. This content is captured from a large variety of sources. The generated results can be converted to an RSS feed.

The most lovable pooch in the UK is collared up and barking at the door, ready to take you on a mashed-up guided tour of United Kingdom towns and villages. It is built on an ASP.NET 2.0 and SQL Server 2005, and uses APIs from Flickr and Eventful.
DuggBack is a service that lets you quickly find all the available mirrors and web caches for a popular Digg story.

Camera shoppers, this site offers user consumer reviews and ratings from multiple sources. Also on this page are live price comparisons to help the user find the best deals on the web together with live ebay listings for the camera of their choice.

Google map and bars, lounges, restaurants and clubs etc. Links to reviews. Venues have map with nearby venues. Site also has a Mapchat mashup mixing maps and chat and a Twitter mashup in the members section, showing your status and pic in your profile.

mashup: Student Housing Info at UC Davis
description: Rental listings are shown on a Google map according to the filter you select. You can switch to Satellite view and zoom in to see the actual places and their surroundings on the map.
psynchr is a Flash based web service to view multiple photosets. You can synchronize multiple photosets on flickr.
A mashup app at uses Grazr to interact with Rhapsody, making for a smoother experience than the Rhapsody default UI. You will need a Rhapsody account to stream any audio.
Lord of the Rings Online game map using Google Maps technology.

Giveness is a social network for philanthropy. Charities can create their own communities to connect with their supporters and fundraise online. When a user purchases a product through Giveness, 100 percent of the commissions generated will be donated.
Uses Yahoo Search and del.icio.us to search for articles on Wikipedia, show them inline and allow instant bookmarking. Tutorial on how this was built at kentbrewster.com
A memorial mashup for the victims of Virginia Tech.
Mashing up the Google Feed API and Windows Live Search for isfeed: access to RSS files, this provides a river of news reading experience for recent posts around any keyword.

Gridmarker.com is a free place to store, share, view, and search for your favorite locations in Second Life. You can also find new places to explore by viewing and searching favorite locations of other users.
Uses Technorati and Feedburner APIs to rank Philippine blogs.
Users of Stikkit can now use text messaging to send Stikkit notes to their account. You can also retrieve the next to do, or calendar item.
There are literally thousands of hotels across the world employing green policies of some kind, but these hotels truly represent the best of green culture.
Create your own slideshow and let it run on your Vista Sidebar. Expands on undocking from sidebar. Multiple instances can play different slideshows. Keeps settings after Windows restart.

Using information gathered from newspapers, planning board agendas and other sources, plots of new retail developments of several national retailers such as Wal-Mart, Target, and Kohls using a Google Maps interface.
A Widgetbox widget that uses Bigtribe, Geohana and Google Maps to create an embeddable golf course locater widget.
Real estate website that uses Bigtribe-Geohana to display property locations on a Google Map and drive the display of information related to the locations as they are selected.
A 360 degree panorama journey through Prague. Over 400 locations and 800 panoramas. Now with navigation in 18 languages.
Track the current status of all MLB games with a single keyword. Simply use SMS or WAP and use keyword scoresmlb.
WeddingWire uses GoogleMaps to mashup thousands of wedding vendors locations such as florists, photographers, DJs, etc. in the US.
View radar and cloud cover superimposed on an animated Virtual Earth map. Adjust the degree of transparency for the weather data to see more or less of the underlying map.
An interesting way to look at real estate in the UK.

Junkdepot is a free and easy way to sell all your junk. You can also find great items other people want to sell. Your listings are syndicated to other classified sites and you can find listings near you on our Google map.

This Netvibes module searches for audio, video, photo or document files from your Orb account matching a search string. Clicking on results can play corresponding video or audio stream, open picture in a new window or download the document.
Mashup created with the Eddy Framework and Yahoo APIs that displays the latest technology news from PC Magazine, The BBC, HowStuffWorks and Major Geeks in a tabular structure.
Combination of Mediawiki and Google Maps to manage location based data about Dutch cultural heritage.
Get the latest StumbleUpon Buzz on your mobile phone using the keyword sumobile. Users can use this keyword and request information using SMS, WAP or Email.
A Widgetbox widget that uses Bigtribe, Geohana and Google Maps to create an embeddable restaurant locater widget.
Private website using Weatherbug to get information about local weather and change the appearance of parts of the site respectively.
Profileomat is a shareable Profile Aggregator that lists all your personal Websites, Social Networks, Blogs, Contact Info, Photo Albums and other Profiles in a box. Formerly called linkmybox.com
Dutch mashup combining Maps with demographic information.

Spotstory is a place where people can share and discover interesting, but often overlooked, locations. Spotstory can be thought of as wiki for place, combined with mapping, photo sharing, social networking, and more.
After you have logged in to MapYourBuddies, this mashup will display your friends from Facebook on a Google Map and give gift recommendations from Amazon based on your friends favorite music.
MyBikramYoga.com is dedicated in bringing you the latest in the Bikram yoga community, news, blogs, images and videos.

Helps you find accommodations, events, activities, and things to do when planning a vacation or outing in Washington State. Locations and details of each activity are superimposed on a Virtual Earth map.

Golfing enthusiasts can search for golf courses on a Virtual Earth map. Select a course and reserve tee times. This mashup combines data from Cybergolf, weatherforyou.com, and other sources to provide a comprehensive golf planning experience.

This website uses Virtual Earth mapping technologies and real-time GPS location data to display the current locations of all ferryboats in the fleet. Click on the thumbnail map of a specific route to view a larger map with current ship status.

Find Tesco store locations on a Virtual Earth map of the UK with an optional satellite image overlay. Hover the mouse over a location to get directions, or click on the name of the store to view its address, phone number and store hours.
View all Track info, track layouts, and links to track specific information for all 32 NASCAR tracks.
TicketObserver compares ticket prices for theme parks in France and Belgium. It will expand soon to the UK and US.
Map of Inc. magazine list of American One Trick Towns. Includes Punxsutawney for Ground Hog Day, the North Pole, Gilroy Garlic Festival, the Most Haunted Town, Paris Texas, and others.
Helps image buyers more efficiently find images and image owners to sell them, by accepting payments for them and archiving licenses for public inspection.
Allows users of flickr and 23 photo services to mash up their images into an interactive web page with the option of including Google Maps or Second Life Maps as a background.

The MyDataBus service provides a simple way to store, transfer, and share your files online. Data can include photos, videos, and others. Integrates with social tools like Facebook. Integration with Snipshot allows online photo editing.
Get latest tennis scores on your cell phone using SMS, WAP and email. Use the keyword tennis followed by part of the player name.
A stylish mashup that helps you find information on gas prices, movies, restaurants, traffic, local events, WiFi locations, driving directions, and more on a Virtual Earth map.
Real estate search for Southern California. Search for properties meeting specific criteria. Hover over a specific property on the map to reveal address and price.
Custom classifieds service includes user stores, streaming Google Earth integration, ad syndication, photo hosting, and other features.

Job seekers can view jobs based on the usual criteria, such as salary, permanent or temp, location etc. and see the results by list or on a Virtual Earth map. Clicking on a location reveals the available jobs in that area.
Comprehensive mashup for real-time UK traffic information.
Soup Soup displays news articles from news sources such as CNN, BBC, FOX News, etc. with related articles from Wikipedia and other sites and photos from Flickr. The system uses Yahoo Pipes.
Enter one search and see Web sites, images and videos related to your search term.
Guide to events, attractions and businesses for cities across the United States. Formerly called usguidez.
Allows users to add subtitles to web videos and search for related products.
Zimride is a carpool and rideshare matching website that uses Facebook profiles and geocoded addresses. Imagine the possibilities.
Panoramic virtual tours presenting historical objects, landscapes, urban areas, hotels, restaurants, entertainment and sport centers etc. In Czech and English.
Fly into a series of locations around the world. Cycles through scenes every 60 seconds. Requires IE plugin.
This mashup combines great motorcycling routes on a map along with route information, trip length, and locations of nearest H-D dealerships and Best Western Hotels.
Dutch mashup that superimposes carnival parade routes on a Virtual Earth map.

Jay Crim and Shekar Davarya spent the summer of 2002 driving across the country on Route 66, collecting interviews with the people who live, work and travel on the old road. This multimedia map is the result. Built with the new My Maps service.

Using the SunlightLabs APIs, Kiwini Oe of Clear Ink created info centers on the Second Life Capitol Hill that offer detailed information on members of the U.S. Congress. This links shows you a YouTube video of the mashup.
Dynamic tribute to Kurt Cobain, showing Nirvana live concerts on a Google map by year. Search for videos directly by keywords.
This lightweight music search page uses the SNOCAP MySpace Search API to display results along with embeddable Flash player.
See where your friends are located in the UK. Click on the markers to see their details in the information window.
Internet application helps users create Google Maps with customized points of interest without writing code.
Craigslist apartment listings plotted on a map, with answers to real-estate and apartment-related questions for your city.
Maps popular Vancouver British Columbia attractions with links to more information.
Real-time visualizations of the stream of information flowing into Flickr. View photos, tags or buddy icons as they are active on the site.

Phrasr is an interactive web based application that uses Flickr images to illustrate the phrases that users submit. You can choose every image and then publish the entire phrase, which is shown as a personal slide show.
Get news, ratings, game schedules and rumors for NBA teams plotted on a map.
Display crisis hotspots on a world map and retrieve latest news on each crisis from Reuters.

Uses the SharedBook Reverse Publishing Platform, multiple streams of data containing the obituary, guest book entries and family photos automatically flow from Legacy.com to SharedBook where the content is mapped into a structured book product.
Map shows locations of cities ranked as having the best quality of living.
Google Maps and KML news feed.
Map of hotels, apartments, hostels and spas in Buenos Aires, Argentina, with links to their websites.
Most recently posted Twitters locations plotted on a map and updated automatically.
Enter an artist name and get videos, discography, bio, torrents and related artists
Locations of most recent posters to the Twitter social networking site
Bookr is a tool to create photobooks using Flickr images. Photobooks may be e-mailed or embedded in blogs.
Memory game that chooses Flickr pictures as cards, based on a tag you enter.

The goal of Zoomap is to populate maps with user images. Add any image on any place in the world and leave a message in a text bubble. Everything on the map can be viewed by other users, the images can be reused and you can send the location by email.
Displays a blog owners next Meetup.com event, and the number of Yes and Maybe responses received so far.
Shows the last item bookmarked by the blog owner on Del.icio.us the social bookmarking website.
Maps police, fire and emergency incidents for many areas around the U.S. It displays a national map as well as maps by region and by zip codes. Shows incidents from multiple agencies on one map.
Zudos allows you to view the latest social media buzz on any desired topic through a consolidated interface.
Personalized aviation weather configured with your favorite METARs, TAFs, and radar images.
Visitors can add information about prices available in offline shops.
Quickly edit all your online photos from your browser. Web-based way to fix underexposed photos, remove red-eye, or apply effects to your photos. All online.
Look for public Flickr photos with this tag-based search.
Joobel search for local jobs. In German.
Watch twitters in real time with this live map that dynamically updates to show the latest twitterings.
Schedule SMS reminders for events up to 18 months in advance.
Video surveillance system allowing you to monitor and broadcast images of your home or office to the Internet or a mobile phone.

mashup: Judys Book meets Better Business Bureau
description: New and improved mashup of Judys Book local search and the Better Bureau Search websites for more than 20 major metropolitan areas and a number of states and locales.
Yellow-page listings with points-of-interest data plotted on a map.
Save and share your favorite restaurants, or use the tag cloud to see others favorites. In Italian.
Shows all the locations of a chosen physician group. Click on an icon to see a list of the physicians at that location.
Search real estate listings with photos and maps. Winner of the Adobe Flex Developer Derby.
Compare traffic for up to five domains with this mashup of Alexa, Compete or Quantcast.
A search engine for ASP.Net-related applications, code samples, tips, tricks, articles and blog posts based on Google Co-op.
Crime mapping site for Leawood, Kansas.
Plots the hometowns of the top American Idol contestants.
Community-based meta search engine that allows users to collaborate, discuss, tag, and link aggregated search results.
Find bargains on Amazon.com. Find items by highest percentage off, popularity, rating and bargains.
Send and receive SMS text messages from Microsoft Outlook. Get Outlook appointment reminders and important messages forwarded to your phone.
Mashup of the local search site Judys Book with Denver-area Better Business Bureau business lookups and a search within the city contractor database for a valid contractor license.
See Amazon.com customer reviews and editorials within the online card catalog of the Boulder, Colo., public library.
Motorcycle roads, routes and rides, with interactive road maps and scenic photography.
Get BBC news headlines via Twitter.
Full featured commercial service to track contact data, notes and history. Free level allows 500 contacts. Integrates with Skype, S3 and Alexa Thumbnail services.
Helps children learn the English alphabet through photos.
Tracking campaign appearances by major candidates. In French.
Create you own winery tour Mashup of U.S. wineries, winery events, wine festivals, and wine trails. Over 3,200 entries. Includes printable Google directions with full winery contact information.
Elkx-Box means embeddable multilingual keyword extraction box and provides a way to embed a box on your web page containing all relevant keywords of your content. The whole service is free of charge.

This widget will display the latest items from the Digg website. You can change its preferences to point to change the minimum number of diggs and count of displayed items. More than just RSS, it displays both the item content and images.
Google Power Search exposes Google search features like search by file type.
Google News Bar gadget (based on Google AJAX search API) can be added to your Google home page. Add the search terms of your interest and view them as vertical or horizontal newsbars.

mashup: Yellow Pages plus Denver Health Inspections
description: See health code violations and past inspections directly on a restaurant listing page.
Locate ping-pong tables in Berlin, Germany, on a map.
Synchronize Microsoft Outlook and Google Calendar with this Windows utility. Requires .Net 2.0 and Outlook 2003 or higher.
Follow World Cup Cricket in real time on your phone using SMS, WAP or email. Use the keyword cricscore and get back results of ongoing matches.
Find useful information about Singapore places
A jukebox-like playlist for YouTube videos. No need to listen to your own MP3s when YouTube already has everything online.
Satellite images, information and directions for hundreds of stadiums across the United States.

This mashup modifies CNN articles, integrating the Congressional voting history, campaign finance history, etc. for members of the House and Senate mentioned in the page text. This mashes up CNN.com and the Pop-up Politicians widget from Sunlight Labs.
Create, save and share personal customizable Google maps. Easy to share links to sites, or embed map in web page. RSS feed for newly published maps.
TubeBattle is a community-driven video rating system. Includes sexy video section which is probably NSFW, not safe for work.
Karaoke2U is the user and YouTube powered content site for your Karaoke Videos. All Video is submitted and voted on by the Karaoke2U community. Share, watch and promote your Karaoke Videos.

Mashup of the Citysearch.com local search and review site with the Denver restaurant health inspections database. See health code violations and past inspections directly on a restaurant listing page.
Customizable maps, fishing catch tracker, fishing reports and daily weather.
Free, self-serve carpool or rideshare commuter matching service. Map-centric with user-friendly interface.
Draws musical scales on a virtual fretboard. Uses the FUTEF API to get scale information from Wikipedia.
User-edited search results for health, beauty and fashion sites plus blog, friends, reviews and contests.

Lots of handy tools that let you profile any the 87,058,540 Internet domains in existence. In addition to indexing every active domain, it also knows about the 237,192,827 inactive domains that have been registered and deleted since the early days.
Upload your GPS tracks stored in GPX format, and see your tracks and your friends tracks in satellite view.
Black Enterprise magazine listing of Top 10 Most Powerful Blacks in Hollywood, mapped by place of birth with biographical info and videos.

Winner of the 2007 ETel Mashup Contest. A clever and useful mashup that transcribes office voice mails left by patients for doctors into text and then sends them via SMS to the doctor. With source code.
Virginia Beach and Norfolk area rental ads with syndication to Google Base, Oodle, VAST and Edgeio.

A generative artwork that explores how advertising uses and manipulates language. Real corporate slogans are remixed and randomized to generate invented slogans, then paired with Flickr images, generating fake advertisements on the fly.
Learn a lot about your web site with this mashup. Check the incoming links, the directories a domain is in, its PageRank, and more with this domain-info script.
A democratic approach to search. You can search the internet, vote for a particular result and also comment on a particular site.
Like tinyurl, but for maps. Create a map, add routes or points of interest, and get a short URL to share it or come back to it later.
Spendfish uses the Amazon API to find deals on amazon.com.
A place to find your house in Spain.
Wide collection of Arabic media including TV, radio, movies and clips.
Slick music information mashup with photos, videos and news. Search or browse artists by name or genre.
The top 25 crimes as reported by Time magazine are plotted on a map with useful information and photos about each.
Create sets of media related to fashion, particularly leaning towards coverage of fashion events, and share them with other members.

Get real time stock quotes of your favorite stocks n your mobile phone using SMS, WAP or Email. Use the keyword quote followed by the ticker symbol. Provide multiple ticker symbols, like quote goog yhoo.
Makes Tribe.net forums mobile. Read latest posts on the Tribe forums on your cell phone using SMS, WAP and e-mail. Use the keyword tribe and provide the tribe name.
Compare two images and pick the winner in this HotOrNot-style voting mashup. See pairs of photos of men, women, cars, cats, dogs and more. Note: some photos not safe for work, NSFW.
Using the FeedBurner API this tool draws a graph of your sites feedreaders over a period of time.
Livecontacts friend finder application for connected Windows Mobile PDAs and Nokia Symbian smartphones. Know where your friends are and plot your position in Google Maps.
Generative fiction with Google Maps and Flickr.
Using carpark information and map information from OneMotoring.com.sg and Google Maps respectively, users can have a birds-eye view of all the parking costs in Singapore.
Visualize the differences in average list prices and search popularity for any city or county in the US. Enter any two cities or counties and a graph showing the popularity will display.
Get graphical answers to lots of interesting questions based on real estate pricing data with this nicely done Trulia mashup.
See the real estate listings of Singapore with this Google maps mashup.
Aggreated news feeds in a dynamic Flash interface.

mashup: WebLS: The file explorer for the Web
description: WebLS provides an alternative way of browsing the web. It uses the Yahoo Search Engine API to build a file tree for a specified URL and lets you browse through it

mashup: Badger: Web Badge From Any Feed
description: Badger uses Yahoo Pipes and JavaScript to create Web badges out of any RSS feed. Edit colors, change feeds, pages, and headlines and pick up your source code at the bottom of the page.
MauritiusVisit.com allows you to see aerial views, photos and videos of some of the most interesting sites such as hotels, beaches and attractions in the tropical island of Mauritius.
Search any location in the world and find photos, videos, docs, map, satellite imagery and nearby places related to it.
The most fun way to pick a restaurant near you. Enter your zip, enter a cuisine, and let the Wheel of Food determine where to eat today. Inspired mashup.
Rotational velocity of a point on the surface of the Earth.
Search Photos from over 2,000,000 snaparazzi. Buy and sell photos. Using the Fotolia API.
Users from Germany, Austria and Great Britain can swap used DVDs, CDs, Books and Games. On the mashup map they can check out where their swap partners come from.

mashup: Technorati Blog Search via Yahoo Pipes
description: Technorati Search sucks in a Technorati search feed for the query of your choice and hands back a JSON object via Yahoo Pipes, ready to insert inline via the usual methods. With implementation details and source code.

A simple mashup of Google maps and upcoming.org events. It is complete with tag clouds, tag searches and city searches. Currently SF bay area events are subscribed, it is trivial to scan other cities too.
See upcoming events from the Microsoft Developer Network, MSDN, on this Google Map.
An aggregation of web content and virtual marketplaces using RSS and multiple APIs. We just passed 800,000,000 listings.
DARAO is a YouTube viewer for lazybones. DARAO plays YouTube featured movies automatically without clicks.
Google Maps Mashup of donut locations in your neighborhood. Then maps weight loss for later.

OurGlobes allows users of the social network to geotag any photo or video from anysite, anywhere on their personal map. OG Groups allow users to share their experiences in a new dimension. All of the maps are also embeddable on any other site as well.
Using hotel information from AsiaTravel.com with Google Maps respectively users can sort, view and book Singapore hotels.
At MoveTracks.com you to create iTunes playlists called MoveTracks based on your geographic location and any drive you are planning to take.
amaDig is a unique graphical Amazon Browser. Visualize your shopping experience.
See what gets uploaded to flickr.com right now.
Grabs data from Google base and allows you to search, sort and plot records on a chart, map, and calendar.

mashup: Red Sox Fans Guide to Fort Myers
description: A guide for Red Sox fans visiting Ft Myers, Florida for spring training. Created with the Atlas mapping tool. Fans can plot photos on a satellite image of City of Palms Park and comment on businesses found via Google Local Search.
A mashup of Google Maps and Flickr. Double click on a country marker to see popular Flickr photos using a simple Ajax interface. Also includes quick links to Wikipedia entries for each country.

mashup: Yahoo You Witness Photos by Phone
description: Yahoo user contributed You Witness photos are now available on WAP phones through 411sync. Send photos of events through your mobile phone.
Get a recap of popular TV shows on the go. Point your mobile phone browser to www.411sync.com, then use the keyword tvrecap and get a recap of popular TV shows.

mashup: SF Bay Area Tickets by Phone
description: Get the latest tickets availble for upcoming events in the SF Bay Area. Simply use the keyword sfticket from your mobile device, SMS, WAP or Email. Configure alerts and get updates as new tickets appear.
Find Andorra hotels directly on a map, with photos and information.

Cordurl is part maps, part tinyurl, and part social network. Every spot on the globe is represented by a 7-digit geocode. You can subscribe to a geocode to meet your neighbors, find out what s happening in places where you spend time, and share info.

Search BBC for latest breaking headlines anywhere, anytime. Use the keyword bbcsearch and provide what you are looking for. This service is accessible using SMS, WAP and email. Users can also configure alerts to get updates on selected topics.
Instant messenger buddy that works accros all major IM networks, including mobile phones, and offers access to Web applications and productivity tools, notes, reminders, to-dos.

A free college classified site that aggregates listings from niche college marketplaces across the country. Uses Google maps to feature microregional searching, integrated with Facebook, and has Rapleaf buyer-seller feedback system.

A random plot generator with a twist, this site uses the Flickr API to retrieve shots that match the plots. Sometimes the result is a series of amazing matches, other times it is funny how wrong they are.
Complete guide to fishing spots in Hungary and Central Europe. In Hungarian.

Follow high school recruits as they choose which Division 1 college football team will get their commitment. View recruiting information by state, or university, as well as viewing recruits within a 100 mile radius of your zip.
A Chinese wiki service based on Google Maps.

hipoqih.com is a system composed of a Web and plugin for mobile devices that allow recording warnings and URL associated to any geopoint in the planet. These warnings can be show automatically in terminals with the plugin when approaching that geopoint.
View photos of Dallas Mavericks on your WAP-capable phone. Via 411Sync and the keyword dalphotos.
iCommunity.TV is a collaborative broadcast network for local news, built with the intention to promote video as a media for citizen reporting.
Google Maps Mashup showing Victorias Secrets, Lovers Lane, Florists, Movie Theaters, Movie Showtimes in your zip code. US Locations Only.

See who is heading up and who is heading down in the Web 2.0 world. This site uses the Alexa API to track leading Web 2.0 sites and products in terms of reach and percentage change as tracked by Alexa.
Display weather radio stations on map.
A Google Maps mashup showing photos from www.zyeuter.com
Webjam is a platform designed to enable creating an unlimited number of modular websites with a community attached to each. Privacy settings for each module. With an AJAX-y drag and drop interface.

Flip through tagged pictures from Flickr or view them as slideshows with visual effects. Click on the image to see Lightbox effect. Mouse over Lightbox image top right or top left for next or previous image.

Mix YouTube, Google Video and other video sharing services videos into one channel. Create your own TV channel. Watch pre-defined channels and the hottest ones from the aggregated sites. Video search.
Free property listings for rentals and home sales around the world.
Community networking site that allows members to get in touch with their neighbours. The site uses APIs from Nestoria, flickr, Eventful and more to provide local information to users.
The adventure sports route diagrams search engine for rock and ice climbing, caving, canyoning, hiking, skiing, snowshoeing, mountain biking, via ferrata.
Mosoto is a new way to share and connect with your Facebook friends. With Mosoto you can share files, chat with friends and discover people and media in your social network. Social streaming media.
Maps and descriptions of skateparks for skateboarding and biking in europe. User contributed content.
Cool bars, clubs, cocktail lounges and restaurants from around the World. Map with nearby venues.
Search popular products via the Commission Junction network with this application. Winner of the CJ mashup developer contest.
Search map for internet TV news channels. Separate listing features adult channels. NSFW, not safe for work.
Anothr.com is a skype mashup using the Skype API as a server to provide RSS subscritption and notification service.
Using Amazon web services backend, Elasticlive allows to you to easily and instantly deploy an infinite number of servers using a convenient web based graphical interface.
A community driven gender-neutral unisex bathroom directory. Features a Google map mashup and density cloud by city.
Google map Mashup for dutch motorcycle related events. Features altitude dependant grouping of locations.
Malta hotels with integrated map of YouTube videos.
A quick mashup that plots traffic problems in South Yorkshire, UK. It might seem a bit specific, but it was written to help me get home from Hull, avoiding any traffic problems.
SummerOf.com gives you photos from typical holiday locations. But the twist is that you can select which summer you want to see pictures from, like Paris 2004.
Run your own shop with this store in a box. Powered by the Commission Junction API gives it millions of products.
Best sports bars in the US as ranked by Forbes Magazine. Watch the Superbowl or any event in style.
See events coming to your neighborhood via this mashup of Google Maps and Upcoming.org.

Quest utilizes all of the KQED Public Broadcasting media platforms. Interactive site uses Google Map and Flickr mashups to present high-quality television programs, radio spots, blog postings, education guides, and map-based explorations.
One-stop delivery of news and information about the PHP language. In French and English.
An interactive game that challenges users to find countries on a map of the world, then displays videos from that country.
Local car classified search using Google Base combined with a database of city names.
Uses Yahoo BBAuth API to let you use your Yahoo account as an OpenID.
For those who like to be inspired by random delicious bookmarks.
Bookmark all your favourite videos,sightseeing,pictures on a world map.
A mashup like housingmaps.com. It shows the latest flats for sale or rental in Singapore on Google maps.
Online shopping site for men built using the shopping.com API.

Interesting mashup uses the top 50,000 sites as determined by Alexa and del.icio.us tags to organize domains by topic. It can be used to find high quality links in the topic area of your choice that is both topically related and likely to be high-powered.
Highest paid US college presidents as reported by CNN Money.
Browse real estate data by location in Google Earth.
Google map mashup with custom tiles of shaded relief. Nice integration with GeoNames database for place and feature-based searching.
Google Mashup of EVDO network coverage, as reported by users in the field. Visitors can see where Sprint and Verizon EVDO coverage performs well, and where it does not.
A Google Maps mashup that allows you to mark places of interest, add reviews, and share your favorite locations with others.
Units conversion, US and metric, for various measurements, in gadget form for your Google homepage or any web page.
Get a list of top MySpace bands anytime on the go. Simply point your WAP browser to wap.411sync.com and the use the keyword topartist. View bands and their blogs info on the go.
Explore the fantasy world of role playing game Oblivion, The Elder Scrolls IV, using this custom Google Map.

Mashup Camp 3 runner-up winner. Use tourfilter to rack as many bands as you can think of. Listen to thousands of MP3 and RealAudio tracks by bands with upcoming shows. Browse recent music blog listings. Get updates via RSS and iCal.

While sites like eBay and Craigslist have made buying and selling venues more accessible, it remains difficult for sellers to simply sell. Wipbox enables sellers to sell better on eBay, Craigslist and other online sites through a quicker and easier tool.
Search slideShows on imagelooop.com. If you like a SlideShow you can export it to your MySpace account without copy and paste.
SeeqPod Music recommendations mashup for Amazon Marketplace.
New York Subway and Bus Maps with point to point directions. Useful and well designed.
Find NPR, National Public Radio, stations anywhere in the US with this handy refernece map. Integrated markers link to the Radio-Locator.com database of station details.
The Billboard 100 of viral video, tracking and ranking the top 100 videos from Atom Films, Break.com, Daily Motion, Google, iFilm, Metacafe, Myspace, Revver, vSocial, Yahoo, and Youtube each day.
TutorLinker is a tool which helps you find a tutor in your area for your tutoring needs.
Get all the obscenities out of your system with this game. The more profane words you can type in 60 seconds, the more points you will earn.
USA webcams via Google maps. Limited amount of content.
See the top 25 new releases from the iTunes store on mobile phone.
Slideshow of most interesting and recent photos from flickr using the Lightbox Ajax tools.
Winner of Best Mashup at Mashup Camp 3 in Jan 2007. The Hype Machine is an experiment that keeps track of songs and discussion posted on the best blogs about music.

A new way to discover your images. This Yahoo Widget is a slideshow where images move horizontally. You can display your own images, search images from www.imagelooop.de or imagelooop.com. You can upload your local images.

Create a slideshow and add images to it. Registered imagelooop users can also choose one of their existing slideshows. If the slideshow is ready, it can be embedded in your MySpace profile by pressing one button.
TagMaps is a toolkit to visualize text geographically on a map. Check out the sample applications, where we use Flickr tags on a map to build a world exploration tool.

MyPunchbowl.com is a new website that provides an easy, comprehensive, and personal way to plan an at-home party. MyPunchbowl includes a useful mashup of party stores searchable by zip code, displayed on a google map.
Useful mashup that lets you search through Amazon A9, Google Book Search, and MSN Live Search at once. See who returns the best results.

ZoobTube is a mashup that grabs the artist and title of the most most recent song played on Radio Paradise and then uses those as keywords to search both Flickr and You Tube for photo and video content.
Bebo made mobile by using the keyword bebo and providing your id or your friends id. Within seconds see your all the friends photos. This is a WAP only service.

Atlas allows publishers to create high-quality maps in a few seconds. You can embed the maps on your site in any size or format, you can allow your users to contribute to the maps and you can download all your data in KML format.

The American Image: Photographs of John Collier Jr. is an online exhibit exploring the work of John Collier during the war years of the 1940s. Flickr mashups are used to pull in photographs making up the Collection and one of the interactive activities.
Social network for techs with a focus on development and computers.
Randomly displays an item from the list of RSS Atom feeds. Flip through the feed items manually or view them as slideshow. Webmasters or bloggers can also add this gadget to wherever they want.
Draws Notices to Airmen and Temporary Flight Restrictions using Google Map API
Find images on Fotolia using a WAP based interface. Simply use the keyword fotolia followed by what you are looking for.
TheFoundBin.com is the largest online collection of free, map-based lost and found listings. The site allows owners and finders of pets and valuables to post lost and found items for free.
Explore the town of Shanklin on the Isle of Wight. Hotels, businesses, attractions and local information from the Shanklin Directory are combined with Google Maps.
Search over 3 million real estate listings in the United States
Virtual Tours. Real Streets. Beat the crowds and scroll down world-famous interactive virtual shopping streetscapes like Oxford Street in London.

Pediax allows browsing of 50,000 geo-referenced Wikipedia articles on Google Maps. It shows the 20 most popular places in the currently selected map area. On moves or zooming of the map area the respective places are updated.
Molu gets a facelift. It searches in more than 25 websites and thus making it a powerbomb in terms of keywords and tag search.
Geotagged images hosted by Atpic and placed on a map.
London Restaurants, searchable by Tube station and or Cuisine, complete with live booking service.
Flip through random articles from Wikipedia in your favorite language. Currently supported in English, Deutsch, Espanol, Francais, Italiano, Polski, Portugues, and Svenska
Map of the 100 best US companies to work for as rated by Fortune Magazine
The kitchen sink. Internet search, weather, movies, sms, rss, airfare search, image aearch, meebo, amazon search, stocks data, etc.

The internet magazine via-ferrata.de has created a wide selection of some of the most beautiful Klettersteige, vie ferrate, in the Alps. Brand new is the selection of regions and vie ferrate by using Google Maps.

Download and install this map on your own site. Double-click anywhere on the map for details on that location. Geowalk light is made with Flash. So it is easy to install on other websites. A English, French, Spain, Polish and German Version.
Map your travels. Create a personalised map and itinerary of your travels, synchronised with travel photography and blog entries through geotagging.
Japanese site lets you search YouTube videos classified by age and category like music, games, and anime.
to discover the wonderful world of a mathematic formula. Zoom in and enjoy.

mashup: NC State Parks in Google Maps
description: Another NC Start Parks in Google Maps, only this one is in Google Maps itself and not a separate web site. The kml file used to build the map can also be used in Google Earth. Also displays weather from Yahoo Weather in the balloon help.

AuctionSound was created for eBay Trading Assistants to manage all aspects of the consignment business from customer management, listing, auction templates, image hosting, shipping and financial reporting all from one interface.

Commercial eBay research tool for finding new products that make you money on eBay, research your competition, get seller research sales reports, know when to sell, for how much, and what keywords drive profits.

You can use this tool to calculate travel mileage for any number of trips, fetching information from Google Maps. Better yet, if you have trips entered in Google Calendar, you can fetch those events towards calculating mileage.
Map of the tastest growing American states as being reported by Fortune magazine.
Easy way for webmasters or others to geotag their site with geographic meta tags or their RSS feeds with geographic XML tags like GeoRSS.
The Alerter for Pingdom API tool provides you with a Windows system tray icon that shows the status of your Pingdom checks like websites and servers. .NET source code available.
Image search in the 2 million royalty free images in photo bank Fotolia. Also use it to create instant e-cards.
Find the good times. partyGPS makes it easier to locate bars, clubs, and liquor stores throughout the U.S. with Google Maps and user reviews.

Access Yellow Pages from your phone and obtain listings for businesses based on Zip Code. SimpUy use the keyword yellow and provide your zip code followed by the service. This service is available via SMS, WAP and Email.
Find an outdoor place on the map, and link to other outdoor mashups for the place, weather, photos, trip guides, etc. Get coordinates, elevation, state, and country for a place name.
Create maps, share places, tag, bookmark favorite places, add Flickr images and YouTube videos.

MTBGuru.com is designed for bikers, hikers and runners to publish, share and visualize GPS data, along with photos and commentary, creating an ever-expanding free trail resource and community of GPS users.

Commercial auction management and e-Commerce tools that integrate with multiple third-party services including eBay and Salesforce.com. Inventory management, multi-channel marketing, order fulfillment and CRM. Online Performance Analytics
Listpic finds posts to Oodle that contain pictures and allows one to easily browse through the posts by theses pictures. This uses data from eBay, Craigslist and Etsy. Formerly called listpic.
Adds an overlay window showing incoming links to any web page. Requires Firefox and Greasemonkey.

mashup: Shady Old Lady Guide to London
description: Create your own tour of London, add your own locations or choose from our selection of hundreds of hidden, infamous, grizzly or just famous places to visit in London.
Sophisticated world clock for browser or desktop. Hover over cities in every country to see the current time. Daylight map included. Can be integrated into your own web site.
Locate winery tasting rooms in and around North Carolina. Get information on location, tasting room hours, and pouring lists. Add a region or individual wineries to a map for planning.
See dozens of current terror threats or incidents around the world. Includes airport, chemical, bridge, railway, bomb and other incidents. With links to related news stories and searchable database.
My50 lets users create a list of things to achieve in their lifetime. Online since 2002 with nearly 10,000 registered. Places to Visit section allows users to map places the want to or have visited.

AuctionPixie provides automated tools for both buyers and sellers on eBay. AuctionPixie aims to help in eliminating boring and repetitive tasks such as leaving feedback comments by automatically leaving them for you.
A community repository for trails of all sorts. Hiking, Mountain Biking, Running, Road Rides, City Tours, etc. Post Trails, Directions and Photos.
A interactive map of cool boutiques in various cities. New York, LA and San Francisco are the most complete.

Firefox plugin that will identify the people, companies, organizations, geographies and products on any web page you are viewing. The navigation sidebar shows you a meaningful semantic outline of the content.
Comic strip related art in Brussels, Belgium. Includes Tin Tin.
Map based data visualization tool driven by Pentaho open source business intelligence tools and Google Maps.

Get the latest news headlines specific to your current location. Use the keyword localnews and provide your city and state information. Within minutes, get the latest headlines for your current neighborhood. Works on WAP, SMS and Email.

Access all digg.com stories from your cell phone. Go to wap.411sync.com and use the keyword mydigg followed by the user handle. Get back the latest list of stories as well as the digg count. You can also use this keyword from SMS.
A Google Gadget that polls top songs and album feeds from Rhapsody RSS to let users stay on top of news about their favorite artists.
A Google Gadget that lets you search the Rhapsody catalog of millions of songs by their lyrics. You can also use it to find YouTube and Yahoo videos.
Collaborative shopping community site Stylehive uses the Google Ajax Search API to integrate custom search into their site.

Find deals on products and save money from you phone. Use the keyword bargain followed by the product you are searching for. Shop using SMS, WAP and Email. Before buying a product, check if it is already available on sale.
The terrific StumbleUpon service adds the ability for users to select, rate and discover videos from YouTube, Google Video and MySpace.

Environmental Working Groups interactive website and database makes it possible to see satellite images of the physical impacts of mining. The images show not only the impacts of existing mines, but where mining may occur in the future.

Do you know how many quakes occur in Alaska everyday. About 6. And in the Bay Area, sometimes its 5. Use the keyword quake and find out where the latest quakes are happening world wide. This service even reports micro tremors.

MLS IDX mapping solution for real estate professionals. The link currently shows housing data from SoCalMLS, but housing data from many other MLSs across the country is also available for real estate agents brokers licensed in those respective areas.
Documents the June 16th, 1976 uprisings in Soweto, South Africa.

SofaTube is a specially designed web application that lets you browse and watch videos from YouTube and Revver in your living room where viewers are usually sitting far away from their standard or high definition television.
View incoming flights into 7 major US cities. Altitude, speed, heading and flight path are all interactively displayed on the map. Be air traffic control.
Get a listing of all the real estate on the go. Simply provide us the zip code and see the available housing. Get this listing on your mobile phone using SMS and WAP.
Monitors Rhapsody for tracks played and automatically submits them to a users Last.fm profile.

Windows Spaces is mobile. Read your friends Spaces on your mobile phone using SMS and WAP. Simply use the keyword spaces and provide handle of the user. Configure alerts to find out what your friends are up to.
Slick interactive visualization of the relationship between music artists using the Last.fm and Amazon.com.uk APIs. NOTE: As of Oct 2008, this site appears to have stopped operation.
Italian real estate mashup using Google Maps with geolocation and advanced search.
Get the Daily deals from Windows Live Shopping on your mobile phones. Simply use the search keyword livedeals and save on on the go. Use SMS, Email or WAP.
Dutch mashup that searches multiple auction sites and links to Google Maps to locate the item on sale.

An interactive worldwide map and directory of hotels, airports and holiday destinations containing over 100,000 listings. Be sure to see their World Capitals Map with hovers that show flags of every country.

Now get detailed weather forecast on your WAP capable phone. Visit wap.411sync.com and use the keyword weather followed by your zip code. Instantly get back the detailed forcast as well as any alerts.

mashup: Are You an A List Bloglebrity
description: A Technorati-powered widget that determines the celebrity list status of a blogger.
Italian real estate mashup using Google Maps with geolocation, map search, announcement images and location view, satellite zoom, and RSS feeds.
OiHoi lets you search multiple search engines using just one site. Includes Google, Weather.com, IMDB, and others.
Combines FDIC Bank branch data with Google Maps. Includes flexible search by zip, city and address.

A place where you can share interesting photos and stories about animals that live in this new jungle we call town, city, backyard, or even our bodies. Faunapolis purpose is to document these wild creatures with geolocaion, visual, and time information.

The RDF book mashup makes information about books, their authors, reviews, and online bookstores available on the Semantic Web. This information can be used by RDF tools and you can link to it from your own Semantic Web data.
Site builds a web cloud based off content which ties directly to a product search using the Amazon Search API.
FishNY is a website dedicated to sportfishing in New York State. Our goal is to map all of the best fishing locations in the State.

Checks the current website you are on against the PhishTank database. Blocks the page if it is a known phish. Available as an extension for Seamonkey, Firefox, Flock, Mozilla and IE and Opera as a greasemonkey script.
A motorcyclist community site leveraging the google maps api for route plotting and sharing. Provides true-road routing and turn-by-turn directions. Also lets you export routes as GPX files.
Aggregated classified search functionality.
Get the latest front-page headlines from Newscloud on your mobile phone. Use SMS, Email and WAP.
Speed reading for news. This site takes popular news feeds and extracts key terms. They are listed in order of popularity within the last 24 hours.

mashup: NY Times Where To Go in 2007
description: The New York Times mashup of the best travel destinations for 2007. Map markers link to full stories in the Times travel section.
Shop for products, sales, discounts on Windows Live from your mobile phone. Simply TXT the product details or shop using WAP and Email. Configure alerts and get updates on new deails.
This was my first mashup since leaving Ordnance Survey. But I wanted to add an extra bit, so there are several layers which can be turned on and off plus embeded Flash video in the marker pop-up
Search for products on eBay and get instant real time listings on your mobile phone. Search using SMS, WAP and Email. Configure alerts and get notified as new products appear.
As seen in MAKE Magazine. Seven different searches plus bookmarking, all inline and proxy-free, via the Yahoo search and MyWeb APIs.
Total Iraq coalition casualties, civilian deaths, US dollars spent, and the latest headline image from Yahoo News, all in one tiny widget.
A mashup to help consumers locate a PS3. Provides retail addresses, locations, shipment dates, and local eBay auctions.
This web designer directory adds a Google maps mashup to locate your local designer or programmer listed in the smallbiz3000.com directory.

Online Music by Artist. For each artist on song-list.net, users can see a list of songs and which albums they appear on. The site links directly to the online music providers iTunes, eMusic, Rhaphsody and Napster, that have the song in their catalog.
Nationwide map listing thousands of garage sales pulled from Craigslist and its own users. All sales take place within the next two weeks.
Simple JavaScript app to find bookmarks from del.icio.us.
Youtube, google video, metacafe, and other good, new videos to your browser. Search for new and top rated video content homepage. Via ilovevideoz.com.

mashup: Connecting Consumers and Businesses in Cities, Worldwide
description: WowCity.com is a mashup thats also lots of things wrapped into one easy to use website. The site provides search functionalities to find business listings and classifieds within a city and also an accounts system for members and business advertisers.
A web of Bangkok Thailand on Google maps. It allows users to create custom map with markers and routes.
Christmas lights and decorations in your local neighborhood. Users submit their best Christmas decoration photos and are mapped to a Google map.

EpiSPIDER is an application that plots emerging infectious disease information from ProMED Mail, combines it with country info from the CIA Factbook and PubMED, extracts location using natural language processing and plots them on Google Maps.

Create and find bicycle routes for your area. Total distance and elevation graph are calculated as you create the route. Live traffic cams, photos from the ground, known routes, topo maps. Weather feeds for selected cities.
As the title implies, this mashup track zeitgeist data as trends geographically. Also let you plot your own trend searches.

Very nicely done interactive map of current world and local news mapped. Double-click on the green markers for more levels of detail. Comprehensive listings, good responsiveness. Data drawn from global and local sources via Topix.net.

This site displays all vote locations in Amsterdam for general elections in the Netherlands. It also shows which locations are best accessible for people in wheelchairs. All information is only available in Dutch.
Custom Google Map of the board game Perplex City. Search features help you find important game locations.
EveryTrail allows users to visualize and share travel and outdoor activities by mashing-up GPS data and photos on Google maps.
Example of how to search by address to find points of interest in your area based on Where2GetIt that requires no javascript.
MapMyEvent is a portal that delivers map information for any event along with information about hotels and landmarks around it. You can use Mapmyevent to generate customized link for your own events.
A bot for Skype public group chats. Written in PHP5. Among other things it can archive chats to the web and do Google searches from inside a chat. Source available.
Overlay of 1923 map on Virtual Earth using MapCruncher. Shows the history of Seattle Municipal Railway s Division C, the streetcar line that once connected Burien with White Center and Seattle.
A look at Political Turkeys as reported by CNN.
Pearl Jam fansite with links and pictures pulled from various web services.
Offers price comparison for online deals. It aggregates deals from a variety of bargain hunting websites into a slick price comparison engine.
A crush system for Facebook. Tell the system who you would like to become better friends with, date, or have a fling with, and if they feel the same way, you ll be sent an e-mail.
Interactive Guide to the Ports and Mooring Places of the Upper Adriatic.
Pray In Time provides most accurate and reliable timetable of Athan time for millions of inhabited and uninhabited locations globally.
Your grocery list as mashup. Use a barcode scanner and this service to keep track of your running grocery list. Uses data from the UPC Database web service.
Basecamp widget for the Yahoo Widget Engine. Manage your Basecamp projects from your desktop.
Visualized newest interests and buzzwords in Japan. Sources include YouTube and Yahoo.
Uses Google maps API to show affordable accommodation locations worldwide.

Winner of the 2008 Mashup Camp 6 best mashup contest. Mapdango combines many APIs to create an uber map mashup with lots of ways to explore content from from WeatherBug, Flickr, Wikipedia, Eventful, and Gruvr.
A community-based website for finding and sharing outdoor photography locations such as landscapes, panoramas, wildlife, wildflowers, waterfalls, cityscapes, canyons, and others.
Twin Cities stores, restaurants, hotels and more. Organized by category to make it easy to find new destinations in Minneapolis and St. Paul Minnesota.
Enter a sentence or phrase and Speak will attempt to speak it back. Uses Trynt web service that extracts word definitions from Wiktionary.
Displays all Montreal subway statons and lines. Markers are placed very accurate. Can display lines separately.
On-demand service offering management infrastructure and community building tools for API providers. Uses the Amazon S3 and EC2 APIs as part of their infrastructure.
Discover restaurants around where you live.
Retailer of overstocks and closeouts uses the Google Checkout API.
Displays book sales on an interactive map.
Exact distance pedometer using Google Maps, built by a marathon runner.
See live UK travel news and alerts from the BBC on a Google Map.

GeoSpot consists of a huge directory of geographical spots, like for example theme park, animal, living, shops, bicycle, kids and fun. Languages are Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Swedish or Danish.
Average weather for thousands of global locations in easy to read charts. Temperature, rainfall, snowfall, humidity.
Great collection of road biking rides in and around Salt Lake City, UT.

YouTorials is an assemblage of free video tutorials collected from YouTube. Users can search or browse through hundreds of videos from how to solve a Rubik cube to how to break-dance. Uses can submit their own videos and subscribe via RSS.
Torrents is a BitTorrent Search Engine powered by TRYNT and Yahoo.
CNN Money list of the top 10 most expensive colleges in the United States. Not necessarily the ones you would expect.
Two-player plug-in game for Yahoo Messenger. Finish the round with fewer shots than the other player to win. There are 50 levels in the game.

mashup: Google Maps to Browse Warcraft Cards
description: Google map mashup with cards from the World of Warcraft card game. Browse around the screen, zoom in, and explore all the Heroes of Azeroth cards.
This shows photos of Flickr in Google Maps API Interface, not on map. You can search by tag, text and username.

Canadian apartment, house and condo locater service with a Google Map of rental listings. See comprehensive listings of apartments and houses for rent including photo galleries, a searchable map and amenity details.

This word-hunting Google Gadget has been XXtended with the UrbanDictionary and WordNet APIs. Now you can guess slang, proper nouns, and more. Plus, read the definitions of every word you guess correctly.
MapLib.net is a free service that allows users to upload pictures that may be as large as 6000 by 6000 and create their own custom Google maps.

Search Zillow for estimates from your cell phone using SMS, WAP and Email. Configure alerts and get notified real time as estimates change. Simply use the keyword zillow and provide the address of the property.
Floating Link Preview is a tool which displays thumbnail image preview of the web page related to the link underneath your mouse cursor. Uses data from from thumbshots.org.
Add, or just read, your daily horoscope, zodiac bio or chinese zodiac bio to your Blog, MySpace or Web Page.
Converts virtually any URL into Adobe PDF. From 9-Interactive.

Tracegps.com lets you search and share your favorite outdoor trail by importing and exporting GPS data and Google mapping them. Use it to send files of your walk, bike ride or running trail or find a new hike or city tour nearby.

Introducing a different way to shop the eBay listings for the most searched for products being auctioned. AuctionCloud shows popular keywords used by eBay users when searching listings. Real estate section uses Zillow API for zestimates.
French real estate prices. Charts, maps, median prices. Time line of prices over time. Housing data from France.
Find pick-up spots using this collaborative map.
Free searchable collection of stock photography powered by Wikimedia Commons.
Treemap visualizations based on del.icio.us tag data or user data.
Rate what you ate. A community-based restaurant review guide where users can rate the restaurant and the food. Everything is contributed by users including restaurants, menus, tags, links, etc.
Map of Toronto lofts for sale
A cycle route in to Paris from Charles de Gaulle Airport. Uses Google Maps markers which also display route directions and are linked with photographs taken on the ground.
Maps, videos, photos, news, social networking for the action sports community for riders, skateboarding, snowboarding, skiing, surfing, bmx, mountain biking, motocross and wakeboarding.

A real estate site that gives you quick and easy access to information on any property in the US. eppraisal.com data is updated daily and pulls from a database of about 70 million homes. Integrated maps and estimated home valuations.
A look at the 25 most unsafe cities in America.
Search Yelp.com from your cell phone using SMS, WAP and Email. Simply send us what you are searching for and where. Within a few seconds, you will obtain user recommended results.
Very cool overlay of NOAA nautical charts on top of Virtual Earth maps engine. Charts can be made translucent.
A web site about Nokia that use Google Maps, Search and Video APIs.
Find and map a variety of local information including blog posts, art gallery reviews, real estate listings, police reports.
A sufer blog that hosts a surf spot locator that uses Google Maps and Flickr API.
Chart your love compatibility with up to five potential mates.
Visualize the most important incoming links for any URL. Visualizations can be generated using Yahoo Inbound Links or Google PageRank.
Flowser is graphical Amazon Browser. Type in a product name and see a visualization of the search results by product type.

A promo site for Penguin books, tracking the tour of a woolly mammoth across the UK. Vistors are invited to share their photos of the mammoth via Flickr, and post opinions. Photos are referenced by city, opinions by postcode and presented via GoogleMaps.

Search Yahoo Answers using SMS and WAP. Send your question and get back a list of related questions and answers. When you use SMS, you will get back a list of questions that match your search criteria along with a WAP url that you can visit for answers.
Online bed and breakfast directory with listings worldwide, travel gift certificates and Blog.
Visual Search Maps powered by Google, TRYNT and Yahoo.
GoOffCampus.com is a resource intended to help students find rental properties close to campuses all over the US.
Free things to see, get and do in London.
Combines YouTube videos, Flickr photos, Last.fm albums and Amazon books, grouped by Wikipedia category.
Meta search engine mashup built as a high-school project. It allows you to create your own search engine where you can choose from 30 sources you want to include in your results.
An Australian Real Estate Search engine. Found results are displayed in Google Earth and on the Google Map.

Create time-based subtitles for any YouTube video, a la closed captioning. These captions become publicly accessible, and visitors to the site can browse the set of videos with captions. Think of it as a subtitle graffiti wall for YouTube.
Maps US IT contract jobs matching keywords. Search companies, rate companies, view company ratings, save searches, save jobs, attach notes to saved jobs, and add private jobs.
Great for runners, hikers, bicyclist and anyone else interested in how far they ran, walked, biked, or traveled. Map, save, find, and share your routes.
Early Miser is a mashup built on top of Shopping.com, Yahoo Shopping, Amazon, and Ebay. It offer comparison shopping, custom product lists, custom product feeds and tagging.

Helps users find RSS feeds and autogenerates OPML files. Uses Windows Live Search API. Facilitates selecting feeds from root weblogs or comments feeds per user selection with support for international markets.
Park reviews for national and state parks. Includes option to mark favorite places to share with others.
Tour of California Cycling Blog covers 100 mile bike rides. GPS satellite data, route profiles, pictures, and more information is available.
TripAdvisor has mashed up millions of hotel reviews with Google maps for a hotel search that sorts by user-generated popularity index and allows filtering by price and availability.
Recent school shootings mapped. Compiled from infoplease.com
Interactive map that can be used to find a veterinarian near home or while traveling by Pets Best.
Hangman game for Flickr tags. Guess all the letters of a tag and see 4 photos.
Share MusicMobs or Last.fm playlists in Rhapsody. Uses XSPF, XML Shareable Playlists Format for playlist integration. This links to MusicMob blog post with examples.
Like TinyUrl.com but for Google Maps, for example http useamap.com lotto . You select the tag name. One click to create a map. No login needed. Free. Just launched on 9th October.
Map of the Top 10 paid women as reported by Fortune Magazine.
Search for slang definitions on Urban Dictionary using your mobile phone. Use SMS, WAP and Email. You can also use IM clients like Yahoo, MSN and AOL.
A mashup site where you can leave your digital footprints that are of emotional value to you. You can post photos and videos by form upload, email or MMS.
JobNeters contains a Google Map with jobs based on their cities.
Mashup that helps you discover and share GPS tracks and waypoints on the web quickly and easily.
Simple Amazon search interface that filters items to show only things eligible for Amazon Prime free shipping.
Using Google Maps API plus Google KML API to render my blog in a Geo context.
Recommendation engine that uses YouTube as a source for videos.
Shopwiki helps users find the best deals on the internet. Search for products on the go from your cell phone using SMS and WAP. Simply use the keyword shopwiki and get the best deals online.
Japanese mashup combining videos and Google Maps.
MyStoreRewards integrates with the eBay and PayPal API to deliver a turn-key buyer reward program.
A Google Maps and Hellenic National Tourist Organization mashup with information about mountain refuges in Greece. With links to tourist site details.
Dagbladet.no uses Google Maps, global geocoding, ajax and global geocoded weather forecast for this experimental weather service.
The Amazon API and RSSBus combined to create a wishlist widget. With this widget, not only will people buy you things, but you can get paid when they do.

Genuinely useful mashup that can help you determine if you are paying too much in rent. Enter an address, apartment size, and rent. It maps nearby units and shows a meter of your price versus min, max and average.
Searches Google Base and maps vehicle classifieds.
Mashup of Local Halloween Events. Google Maps, Yahoo News, Yahoo Local, Flickr, Upcoming, HostIP.
A mapping tool for property managers that they can add to their site.
Discounts and rewards from a wide range of programs including AAA, AARP, Upromise, Ebates, Amex, Visa, Delta SkyMiles, American AAdvantage and more mashed up to a comparison shopping API.
Google Maps mashup of the Detroit Tigers players and where they are from. Popups include photos and links to detailed stats.
Plot, save and share running routes.

A real time map of where an eBay seller has shipped items. The map provides credibility to small online sellers and gives potential buyers a sense that the seller has conducted business in their geography.
Create personalized T-Shirts with your own coded messages.
Music mashup that allows searching of data from Amazon, news from Yahoo, and blogs via Technorati.
Search for activities, things to do, recommended eating and cheap lodging for any city in the US. Search from your WAP capable phone.

GIS Jobs Clearinghouse and Google Maps comes together in GIS Jobs Listing Map. This map was developed by terra IMS in collaboration with the GIS Jobs Clearinghouse. Terra IMS geocodes job listings and displays them on a Google Map.
The latest web buzz on Premiership football.

A map mashup for the Gold Coast of Queensland Australia, showing accommodation and attractions. Simple application using custom icons, single xml file, selectable grouping. Aims are to build the map content via user submission to the forum on the site.

The Sky Clock shows what is happening along the ecliptic in the sky over your head right now. Specifically, it shows you where to find the Sun, the Moon, the five planets visible to the naked eye, and four bright stars that happen to travel near them.
Local search resource for travellers. Enter your location and type of business or address. Covers wide variety of locations.
A combination of Hot or Not with funny dance videos.
See the Forbes Magazine list of the Drunkest Cities in America mapped.

This features the ecological datasets of the Partnership for Interdisciplinary Studies of Coastal Oceans. Users can pick an organism and see its distribution and abundance. Users can also view survey site metadata and species lists.
Database with dive centers, dive boats, dive shops around the world.
Ask Vox is a community question and answer website, where users teach Vox, the website character, to answer questions with voice.

Ever found yourself listening to a song in a restaurant or a club or at any place and don not have access to a PC. You can find out details of the song right away. SMS a few words from the track and we will get back with track, album and artist.
Earth Album is a google maps and YouTube mash-up that allows you to tour the videospace of the world via YouTube tags.

Scenes From the City is a great mashup. Find the locations of iconic Made in NY films with the Yahoo Map made for the 40th Anniversary of the Mayors Office of Film. Lots of ways to search including director and scene type.
Google Gadget that lets you run Google Map searches directly from your Google homepage.

Uses Google to find out how popular and sexy celebrities are, and shows images from Yahoo Image Search API. Finds celebrities which are similar in popularity and sexiness. Warning: not always safe for work.
Event tickets website. Can view eBay listings on interactive seating maps, and have events that you cannot attend flagged via the Google Calendar API.
Official Yahoo Map widget for Yahoo Widgets.
Forbes list of the most Trusted Celebrieties in American. Mapped with links to Google Videos.

RinkAtlas provides door-to-door directions to ice rinks in North America. The database currently includes over 1,800 ice hockey and figure skating facilities in the 50 U.S. states and Puerto Rico. Rinks in Canada will be added in the future.
This mashup uses the Amazon API to give reviews and ratings on thousands of products organized into handy categories ranging from computers, electronics and home goods.
Maps all of the timeshare resorts in Orlando with their contact details.
Contextualizing and situating the list of prisons and the human rights abuses in Tunisia. Mashup of database data with Google Maps, YouTube, Flash animations and Yahoo Q Beta search.

GuruLib is an attempt to help organize home libraries. GuruLib fetches all cataloging information such as author and actor list, synopsis, genre, front cover etc. Either via Amazon database or from over 530 public or university libraries around the world.
An education search tool which enables you to search by: Location, Career, Industry Salary and provides personalized searches to save for future reference. Utilizes Flickr, Google Maps and YouTube.
Use maps to locate professionals and vendors to help organize and provide services for a wedding. You can also create a personal Wedding Atlas to share important information about a bridal party.

This web application called the StainedGlass Collage, first detect region of interest in your digital photo and then organize them similar to laying out a stained glass window. It also allow user to download and upload images directly to Flickr site.
Search San Francisco Bay Area real estate listings on a map. Currently tracking over 36000 listings in 157 cities in the bay area.
Creative on-demand print service that lets you turn your Flickr photos from virtual content into physical content like all new Mini Cards.
Find out what major motion pictures are filmed near you. Results are displayed in a Google map. Click on movie names to get movie details or buy it on Amazon.com.
Collection of online maps using Google or Microsoft maps, street level to whole of the continent, including place name and address search, geocoding and link to map service.
See the most talked about videos...currently tracking YouTube, MySpace and Google Video.
Flash-based interface for searching for Flickr photos and YouTube videos by tag. Initially created by Ted Patrick for an Adobe Flex demo at Mashup University.

earth album is a google maps flickr mash-up that allows you to tour the world visually via top-rated flickr photos. Visit the red houses of Norway, swing through the mountains of China, then fly south to the icy Antarctic, all with a few clicks.
deliSearch allows you to do a Yahoo search through a delicious users bookmark collection. Think Rollyo, with search rolls from delicious.
Rate basketball dunk video clips from YouTube.
This Google Maps transit mashup takes an independent ride-guide for the San Diego Trolley and mashes it up with Google Maps.
Great visualization of Google and Yahoo search. Type in a search and see a graph connecting the matching results across the search engines.
It s a non-commercial city portal with a Google Mgap of Torun, a beatiful, medieval Polish town.
Chinese business mashup for the UK. Around 6000 Chinese businesses listed and mapped.
Nice integration of library data like what you have checked-out or are waiting forinto an automatically updating Google Gadget. Initially for Ann Arbor District Library. Talis mashup contest winner.

CameraPrices reviews, ratings, prices on 1000s of camera products. Browse the directory to find the best deals and cheapest prices. Check out the blog, polls, news, articles, and photography community for more camera information.
Not an exciting mashup but I use four different APIs to deliver fresh, useful, or interesting content to this British Columbia travel site.
Compare new homes, home designs, builders, land estate, house plans, via Google Maps in Australia.

Texsy automatically underlines product-y phrases on a web page, and creates a mouseover ad with related products and prices. The ad clicks are connected to the Amazon, Ebay and Shopping.com affiliate programs.

Peer-to-peer collaboration engine built on the Skype API that converts mainstream productivity applications such as the Microsoft Office suite from static standalone tools to interactive, collaborative platforms.
Shows the results of Indeed job search on a Google Map.
