Search Google and Yahoo at the same time.

This map shows all UK trains currently on approach to a particular station. Data is fetched from the National Rail website. The yellow pins are stations, the red pins trains. The trains move in approximately real time.
A youtube clone with added ability to download the video source from server to PC.
Simple tool for adding an interactive store locator mapping to your website

A map of contributions to 2006 Massachusetts gubernatorial campaigns. Uses the Google Maps API and data from the Massachusetts Office of Campaign and Political finance. One of the most extensive use of data with layering on Google Maps.
B2B integration looking to deliver the benefits of a high-transaction-charge value-added-network, a VAN, without high on-going transaction fees. Built on Amazon Simple Queue and Storage services.

Millions of Flickr photos have been geotagged and placed on a Yahoo Map. Uses the recently added Geo features of Flickr. Add a special tag for photos from Upcoming.org events and they will be linked to that page automatically.
View the latest photos from Fashiowire on your WAP capable phone. Fire up your mobile browser and point to http: 411sync.com. Simply use the keyword fashionwire.
A hot-or-not style dance rating site based on YouTube videos tagged dance.

This Google Maps mashup lets you see an outline of one part of the world overlayed on another part of the world. For example, you can sketch an outline of New Jersey in the Reference Map then overlay the outline over Japan in the Comparison Map.
A mash-up of the most creative videos found on Google Video, YouTube, Blip.tv and other video sharing sites.
A straightforward and clean interface to YouTube via their APIs. Workplace safe.
Mashup with searchable US Golf Courses, weather data and details golf course information.
Chinese Google Maps mashup that allow people to share maps.
Guide for businesses and service providers in Switzerland with community integration.
Find mashed up maps in your locale: city, state, country, or the world, sorted by categories. Updated daily with your suggestions.
A tag-based search engine that combines results from Flickr, delicious, Technorati and Google News.
Service for you to collect, organize, and share information for shopping, travel or any other research.

Mashup showing locations of 200 places mentioned in the Bible. Going for accuracy they try to pinpoint the locations of the ruins of ancient cities instead of using the locations of modern cities with ancient names.

A Google map based interactive guide to the Bournemouth, Dorset, UK area. The map shows attractions, food outlets, pubs, and clubs. Routes mode lets you plot journeys and calculate distances. History mode displays a map of old local photos.
A dynamic network feed of geo-tagged Flickr photos in Google Earth.
Everyone in the US knows that if you dig straight down you end up in China. Except you will not, but instead will end up swimming. Use this dual map tool to see where you go if you dig.
A nice way to see the any location side-by-side in Google and Yahoo Maps. Even dragging one map drags the other.
Search for city properties and view listings via Google Maps.
Google Maps mashup with searchable US Golf Courses, weather data and details golf course information.

WikiWalki lets you search, draw, and share your favorite outdoor trail by importing and exporting GPS data and Google mapping them. Use it to email a cool map of your walk, bike ride or running trail to your friends or find a new hike or city tour nearby.

Get real time listings from Windows Expo Live on your cell phone, using SMS, Email and WAP. Just send us the zip code for the location and what you are looking for, i.e. product details.

Cool way to create and save your own hybrid maps using several mapping APIs. This mashup layers Google, Yahoo, MS Virtual Earth, and Terraserver maps into one interface - similar to the way Photoshop layers work.

A collection of stuff to do with Flickr image manipulation, community based photo search engine and a system to print photos on shirts, mugs, and stickers.

View all your MySpace friends photos on a WAP capable phone. Enter your ID or your friends ID to see the photos. Click on photos to see friends friends.

description: 5 planes taking off one after the other from the same runway in Atlanta. Click on the numbered markers to see the sequence. Not sure if they are same or different.

A free frequent-flyer mileage and point tracking site on the internet focused solely on tracking and managing rewards. Tools and services to make managing and redeeming miles and points easier.
10,000 sheep created by online workers. An Amazon Mechanical Turk application. Each worker was paid 2 cents US to draw a sheep facing left. Buy your favorite. Unlike anything before.

Setup wish lists of items you d like to purchase, customize them with pictures and themes. Give them a password or leave them public and open them up for commenting. OS X users can use a dashboard widget to make a wishlist, and share it when its ready.

Small flash app lets users write short stories, get auto-generated illustrations from Flickr photos, and play around with the results. Nicely done.
Use this WAP based interface to search for Events, Movies, Venues or lookup anything in your neighborhood. This interface can be used from any WAP capable phone.
A useful worldwide travel guide in German and English. With embedded data from Wikipedia, Flickr and Google News. Double-click anywhere on the map for details on that location.

Citysearch and Google Maps and Dodgeball and Yahoo Mobile Maps equals Mashup to plan bar-hopping routes, late-night food. With sharing and mobile integration.

Nice, searchable database and map of renewable energy projects from around the world. Here is an opportunity to celebrate and learn about the impact individuals and organizations create a renewable energy community.

A cool Google Maps and Tour de France mash-up: Displays drivers data live on a interactive map. And you can can even follow the bike position. Heart beat, speed, stress points, distance, power and current position are tracked.

Help us build the best source for healthy living and local news by submitting your tips, events and links so that we can all learn to live a more eco-friendly lifestyle.
Flickrball is a fun six-degrees-of-separation scavenger-hunt game, using Flickr thumbnails and tags for clues.
Alternative interface into the Amazon catalog. Java applet with price sliders and other filtering tools.
Discover and share your favorite bicycle routes. Bikely helps cyclists share knowledge of good Australian bicycle routes.
WebCottages is a directory of self catering holiday cottages and other self catering holiday accommodation from around the UK.
Browse the vineyards of Oregon via this comprehensive map. Search by location, varietal or vineyard amenity.
Indian bride and groom data from around the World and selected cities in India, via bharatmatrimony.com RSS feeds.
Find missing children with this Google Map combined with data from MissingKids.com.
mashfot is a one-page view about photography. You can find links, news and photos on this site.
Specialized search interface for eBay. Filters more junk, finds misspelled items, see 30-day feedback trend for sellers. Winner of honorable mention in eBay developers 2006 challenge.
Useful mashup that lets you see who has been donating money to which political party by zip code. Good combination of raw data, charts and maps. Data source is The Fundrace Project.
The Google Maps API lacks a Geocoder. This extension integrates free geocoders, for non-commercial use, directly into Google Maps.
Provides detailed map of all US zip codes, powered by google map.
Subscribe to a Flickr page, getting email notifications whenever you upload new photos.
Intelligent agents based marketspace constantly aggregating top deals and rebates for a wide range of products.
Explore the relationship between Flickr groups and photos with this useful groups browser.
This is a mashup that allows you to visualize geotagged resources on a map. Import your del.icio.us posts or Flickr photos, share your collections and read RSS feeds.
Excellent visualization of current daylight and nighttime regions around the world. Use the Options bar on the right to tune the settings.
Browsable database of crime reports for Berkeley, California.
Jauntlet is a tool for travelers to add travel plans and maps to many popular sites including MySpace, Facebook, and Blogger.
Workout diary and community with integrated Google Maps to let you depict running routes. Account required.

MyGuestmap allows your visitors to add pins to a map showing where they are and leaving a message. Create a map to allow your website visitors to place pins, a bookmark-map where only you can post, password-protected maps, and upload photos.
Last-minute vacation rental listings. All properties available in the next two weeks. Browse listings on a Google Map.
A one-click price checker. A handy bookmarklet to quickly compare prices for any product. Uses the Amazon API.
Very interesting mashup technique from Microsoft Research, MSR. Shows how any type of map image data can be layered on top of a Virtual Earth map. This example with bike trail maps.
Map of recent and archival news by country via New York Times RSS feeds and human rghts news by country via hrw.org feeds. Map also includes CIA Factbook data and Flickr images.
Explore UK radio and television. Extensive search options. Uses data from BBC Backstage. Data available in multiple formats: RSS, iCal, JSON.
Multiple ways to browse random images from Flickr: all, interestingness, photostreams, groups, etc.
Takes a BBC Programme search and converts the results in to iCal format for use in Google Calendar.
Google Maps mashup of the Iles Sans Fil WiFi network in Montreal, Canada. Note: loads slowly.

Eventsites allows users to create a mini-website for their event complete with description, a Google Map and photos from Flickr. Eventsites is unusual as a mashup in that the entire site is built using only AJAX and it stores no data of its own.
Map of the top high schools in the United States as reported in Newsweek. May 8th 2006 issue.
UK Local Knowledge - Using data from the directory enquiries database plotted onto a Google Map.
Delicious Mona allows you enjoy your favorite news feeds on your mobile device. A mobile Story Player you can bookmark articles of interest back to your desktop.
List of webcams in Czech republic.

mashup: Bed and Breakfast Hotels in UK
description: Large UK-based hotel, guest house, bed and breakfast hotelier managed directory.
Nice mashup of the NOAA Weather Service API and Google Maps. Enter an address and get detailed forecasts.
Mashup of a popular online sudoku player and Flickr. Sudoku player courtesy sudoku.com.au.
Comprehensive real estate service: home search, valuation tools, how-to guides, and agent finder.
Online map application in which you can do a virtual tour of the earth with other online buddies. You can see where they are wandering and have have IM chats with them.
Local Alerts, Local News, Yahoo Traffic, Google Maps, NOAA Weather mashup. Alert mashup includes CERT, earthquakes, tsunamis, Avian flu...
FIFA, World Cup Soccer 2006 map. Latest team news via Yahoo FIFA 2006 World Cup Soccer RSS feeds and Goolge News feeds.
Very good, up-to-date gas price search with Google Maps station display.

RDF Calendar, which is a typical Events handling application, now supports Google Calendar API. It can retrieve events information from Google Calendar, eventful, and upcoming.org, can can map events.
Apartment rental service with reviews by renters for renters. Search by zip code, see pricing reports, and comparison of ratings on noise, parking, safety, etc.
Showing Supinfo, a graduate school of computer science, in different cities in France, China, Canada and the UK.
Google Maps and Google Video mashup. Select tourist sites from around the world on Google maps and see a video of the location.
Mashup of Google maps, Amazon and Stuffopolis. Here is a snapshot of where my stuff is around the world right now. Each marker is a friend. Click on a marker and you see what stuff they have.
JigDo combines Google Maps with the most popular trading website in the Netherlands: Marktplaats.nl.
New York City greenways, bike paths and bike lanes plotted on Google Maps.
Sophisticated home valuation tools. 65 million listings. Extensive data on comprables, many search and sort options.

A map of homicide locations in New York City from 2003-05. Includes date, address, motive, victim description, and suspect description. Published on NYTimes.com on April 28, 2006. Data is from the New York City Police Department.

Auction XVCD searches the item information through the eBay API and create a single chart. On the chart, the X axis represents the end time of the items in the auction, and the Y axis represents the price of the items. Requires xfy desktop tools.
Golf course and hotel locator for Myrtle Beach. Good coverage of the area. Warning: loads slowly.
iLoveInns is a Bed and Breakfast locator. Search by location or by a region to drill down. It also has gift certificates, a shopping cart, my favorites and other features.
This creation tool targets those who want to create their Google maps mashups and host the HTML pages on their web servers. You own the files you have created.
A Flash hybrid of Flickr and Google Maps. Worldwide photos mapped.
Join MapGameDay.com on April 29th as we live map the NFL Draft. View drafted players by NFL Team, Hometown, and College.
Tag your photos and place them on the Google Map by uploading them on Panorama Explorer. Search photos by geo data or just exploring the map.
Area based plots of US Census Bureau data.
A mashup of Google Maps and every New York City location used in filming the movie Ghostbusters and its sequel Ghostbusters 2 that a person might be likely to visit on a trip to Manhattan.
This useful mashup helps you find good quality, free online course material from schools worldwide including Harvard and MIT. Both video and audio content available.
Make your own directions with Route Builder. Begin by navigating to the start of your route, click a point to start, the click others to get total distance.
Odd and funny street names charted.
Get local news for your zip code with this mashup of Google Maps Yahoo Geocoding Google News RSS Feeds.

MapGameDay.com is a community site that allows fans to create map markers to show popular campus locations and create custom game day maps: ticket locations, parking, tailgate party, stadium photos, etc.
Map of the top US medical schools are reported by US News. Pop-up markers show MCAT scores and average tuition.
See casinos and other places to legally play live poker on a map. Find the closest rooms sorted by distance, get driving directions and the casino web site.
Top Business Schools in US as reported in US News and World Report: GMAT Score, Avg Tuition, Avg Salary.
A shopping service that gives a unique view into the Amazon catalog: Line charts show you price and sales rank over time.
Plot a path on a map and the distance is calculated. Locations across North America are supported. Handy measurement tool for running or walking.
Google maps based Gay Bar and Club finder. Great maps markers and customized navigation.

My Del.icio.us Recommendation Snippet is a recommendation link list generator extracted from site owners bookmarks archived in del.icio.us. If you tell your del.icio.us ID to the site, you can get the site owner s bookmarks as a recommendation.
A commercial MySQL database of zip code boundary data. Demo allows entry of a zip code with boundary plotted on a Google Map. Data available for purchase, rates on main page.

mashup: Old UK Maps Scans on Google
description: A set of old, 1 inch to the mile, out of copyright, UK Ordinance Survery maps displayed on custom Google Maps. An overlay is provided so you can compare then and now. Coverage as of April 2006 is approx 20 percent of England and Wales.
Enter 2 or 3 addresses and find centrally located restaurants to them. Marker popups include address and phone number info.
BillBiter UK is a simple Amazon custom storefront.
Great way to find Flickr photos by color. Select colors diretly or use the slider to adjust lightness and darkness. By Jim Bumgardner.
Learn about the unknown hazards around you - the toxins you may be breathing. PlanetHazard maps over 86,000 companies throughout the US that emit hazardous air pollutants. Excellent mashup.
Online image editor with basic editing features and Flickr integration.
Explore relationship between artists. Idea based on six degrees theory: no artist is separated from another by more than six other artists. 3rd place winner in Amazon developer contest.
Fun flickr mashup that lets you add cartoon bubbles to photos.
Find vegan restaurants in NYC with this mashup. Markers help differentiate how vegan-friendly each establishment is.

GeoWhitePages.com provides a free people search service that displays its search results on a map. GeoWhitePages allows you to view U.S. Census data by state, city and zip level of the areas your friends and family live.
Community based way to find and rate hotels when travelling with your dog.
World Port Source provides interactive satellite images, maps and contact information for 645 ports throughout the world.
Interesting combination of Google Maps with elevation data to show the impact of rising sea levels. Try it for your own town.
Content discovery using the Yahoo content analysis API to figure out what a given page is about and then APIs from Yahoo News, Technorati, Delicious, and Flickr to find related content.
Browse Boston brunch choices via Google Map.
Drag and drop DVDs recommendations. You put them into buckets for those you love, hate, or have not seen. Then based on your choices the site makes recommendations to you.
Comprehensive map of UK schools with comparisons of student scores and search capabilities. Marker drill-down brings you to Dept of Education and Skills site details.
Mashes Google Toolbar Buttons with Wikipedia, Yahoo News and Google Search to provide extra info, news and search.
VCarious is a community-based travel portal. Explore the world via dynamic travel guides, create journals, upload photos, and use other social features.
A meta site bringing in the latest funny things people have overheard from a range of sites into one place, along with relevant images and blog links.
Sharing platform for social groups which integrates mapping, photo sharing, link sharing and other services.
Shows the positions and status of Jabber - GTalk users and allows personal places to be marked and commented.
Waterloo Student Housing to help college and university students find rental housing and sublets. Combines UW housing database with Google Maps.
Map of Pacific Northwest venture capital funding including Seattle, Portland, etc.
Fun way to turn Creative Commons licensed pictures from Flickr into digital postcards.
Select your starting and ending locations, then this application will show you the tube route.
Good map of the Boston Subway system with detailed marker popups.

Oishii is kind of a del.icio.us mini-zeitgeist. oishii: ephemeral pheromonal del.icio.us-ness. It polls the del.icio.us front page every 5 minutes, and returns all sites bookmarked by at least 30 people.

trendalicious is a near real-time view of website popularity trends as reflected by the del.icio.us social bookmarking service. All URLs posted by a minimum of two people in past sixty minutes are displayed, ranked by the total number of recent posts.

NCAA Mens Basketball Championship on Google Maps. Includes locations of Winners, Losers, Venue. History of the Championship games from 1939-Present. Many ways to search and sort including year, highest or lowest Score, nail biters, and widest margin.
Adictive photo puzzle game. Match two pictures that have something in common in the picture. Your goal is to match the photos that have these tags in common. Harder than it seems.
Create photo slideshows with music. Site allows you to add Flash to flickr, myspace, xanga, and Blogger

Multple ways of looking at maps, Images, Google Earth KML files for about 1,500 early gothic sites in Northern France, using Google Earth, Google, Wikipedia, Flickr, Clusty, Mapquest. The original data comes from the work of Dr. John James.
A Google map that plots The New York Times column 36 Hours. This column offers a weekend-long itineraries different North American cities. Click markers to browse columns from the past 3 years.
Nice exploratory interface for finding holiday homes and tourist attractions across Europe.
Browse landmarks and other locations in London with this application that combines Google Earth, Google Maps and Wikipedia.
Show in real time ultralight aircraft position on google maps, you can also see the cockpit. You can show your plane too.
The Weekend Warrior Hike Finder for Los Angeles and surrounding areas. Warning, can load slowly.

Track your packages with Google Maps and RSS feeds Track UPS, FedEx, USPS, and DHL. PackageMapping.com really works and is free to the public. See where your package is as it makes its way across the map. Check it out and bookmark it
Podcast transcript search and transcription service built using the Amazon Mechanical Turk API.
Content based visual image search application for Flickr. Look for an image you like, then Find Similar photos either by subject matter mode or color and texture mode.
User driven search where users contribute listings, reviews, pictures, tags, and more. Toronto is first city setup, includes mapped traffic conditions.
Birth Cities of Oscar winning Best Actors and Actresses mapped out on Google Maps. Covers from 1928 to present.
An online image editor that integrates nicely with Flickr.
Follow the progress of CBS television show The Amazing Race via the Goolge Map mashup.
Use this handy Jacktracker mashup to follow the TV show 24. Incorporates images and various plot details. Uses the Wayfaring.com features such as discussion boards for each waypoint.

Freeform radio station WFMU is holding a pledge drive marathon in which anonymous points are automatically added to the world map when its globe-spanning listeners submit their pledges. Listeners can also add comments.
Get detailed weather information from hundreds of weather stations via this rich map interface built on the Weatherbug API, Microsoft Virtual Earth and Flash popups.
A site is designed to help anyone thirsty for a proper pint to sort through the many pubs and night-spots of Dublin. Expansive, up-to-date database.
Bookmark the world from your mobile phone. It is Sharewhere.

Popular urls to the latest web buzz. Combines over 15 concensus filters into a one-page view. Good looking, Ajax-ish interface. Includes Digg, Flickr, BoingBoing, NewsVine, del.icio.us, Reddit and others.
Compare book prices before you buy with this handy multiple book price comparison service. You can even feed it your wishlist and get comparisons on them all automatically.
A meta-search engine using tagging services such as RawSugar, delicious, and Technorati

mashup: Where I Had My First Kiss
description: Share your fondest or worst memories of your first kiss on this community and mapping site. Top level map shows most recently added kiss locations on a world map.

Combines the del.icio.us online bookmarking service with Google Mobile. This allows you to browse through mobilized versions of your del.icio.us bookmarks from your phone browser or other limited-display browsers

Private intranet and outward facing website for the community living at the former Hartley Jam Factory, London. This website gives local residents a web presence of their own and aggregates all resident blogs into a jam-factory-specific portal.
Geocode addresses in bulk, plot multiple locations to a single map. Built using Yahoo Maps and Yahoo Geocoding API.
Utility application built using the eBay API that allows you to display your eBay auctions on your blog or website.
The Apprentice on NBC starts a new season this week. This maps shows the hometown of each contestant on Google Maps with their current status of either Active or Fired.

On Sunday 21 May 2006 thousands of communities around the world will come together in solidarity to light candles and remember those who have been affected by HIV AIDS. This map plots those locations.
View locations made famous in the Seinfeld sitcom. Includes the Soup Nazi, the Diner, and Nathans Coney Island.
Gives an RSS feed of who from your top 50 artists in last.fm are coming to your town.
A do-it-yourself Goolge Maps site. You can create maps, upload photos, add comments and ratings. Explore maps created by other users.
Mashup of events from Upcoming.org with local parking facilities. Advanced reservations are also possible at some locations.
Puts Skype Presence icons on a Google Map. From Japan thus can be slow in US.
Search through MLS listings in the SF Bay Area via this Google Maps mashup.
Upcomingscrobbler brings together Last.fm and Upcoming.org to tell you where you can see your favourite bands perform live.
See locations of the venues for the 2006 events with good links to details from the official Olympics site. From Remo Madella.

mashup: Ming Campbell for MP Campaign Map
description: Maps the speeches, messages of support and upcoming meetings, from www.flocktogether.org.uk, of Ming Campbell MP, candidate to lead the UK Liberal Democrats.
Extremely basic street-to-GMaps lookup for Ireland. Proof of concept only. Uses Lycos Route Planner for geocoding to street level only.
A Google Map showing the headquarters of the 100 best US companies to work for as ranked by Fortune Magazine. Marker popups give details on each.
Sophisticated interface for exploring the birds of North America. Combination of USGS and Audubon Society data. Required Flash 8.
Canadians, find your ideal urban apartment. Covers most major cities including Toronto, Vancouver, Montreal and Halifax.

mashup: Dude Where is My Used Car
description: Find the perfect used car near you with this nicely done mashup of eBay Motors and Google Maps. One of the finalists in the MashupCamp competition.
Windsurfing and Kitesurfing locations around the world, using a Google Map as the index for a Wiki.
Slick podcast app that combines band event data from Eventful with MP3 tracks. Type in a city, get MP3s, discover a band you like, and go see them.
TagCloud is an automated Folksonomy tool that searches RSS feeds you specify, extracts keywords and ranks them via font size in a visual cloud.

If you ever had problems ordering camera supplies from a vendor in NYC, then this map might be of interest. It plots the locations, along with photos and comments, of dozens of vendors. Not always reputable ones.
A cool blend of digg.com and del.ico.us See live updates of what is being dugg and what is being linked.
Displays Google search terms in a tag cloud. Uses Yahoo Term Extraction API to group terms together. Greasemonkey script available.
Uses the Amazon API and an Ajax-style UI to retrieve CD DVD covers from the Amazon catalog. The second version of Albumart.org adds music, video, and lyric search, in addition to albumart search.

Doctor Who - unlike Star Trek which always used the same rock for its location filming - was surprisingly varied in its choice of quarries. This mashup shows where they are all and includes a kml for Google Earth.
Take full 360 degree photo tours of popular Toronto landmarks like the Air Canada Centre, Rogers Centre, and CBC HQ. Good quality, large images.
A set of graphic visualisations for your del.icio.us account that allow you to browse, search and select tags, as well as viewing posts matching them.
Creative use of GPS, mapping and Ajax technology to show the current location of buses in the University of Michigan area.
Jorg Pfeiffer is on a road trip from Berlin to Southeastern Europe for the German magazine Der Spiegel. Users can post ideas on what topics to cover and places to visit. In German.
Enter a word and watch the flickr photo stream. Click to interrupt stream and try another word.
A lightweight Flickr viewer. You can search and browse photos by users, contacts, photosets, tags, or groups. If the photo is geotagged, it can also be mapped.
This nice graphing application shows you the count of del.icio.us tags applied to a given URL over time. By Terrell Russell.
Wiki and mapping site allowing scuba divers to share their favorite dive sites and advice. Good interface.
A travel blog where travellers can create blogs about their journeys and map their travels.
A Google Maps interface to a database of thousands of hang gliding and paragliding sites around the world, with a feed to show the same in Google Earth.
The eMiniMall advertising banners are built on top of the shopping.com APIs.
Mac desktop application for batch uploading of files to various photo services including Flickr, Smugmug, and Textamerica.
The TurnHere video service chronicles different neighborhoods and places across the country through the use of Internet video films. This map plots their locations.
If you are interested in the game business, you can use the GCDB searching and mapping tools to find companies near you.
Unusual use of the Google Maps API to control a non-Google map, in this case from the game World of Warcraft. It behaves just a like a Google Map using zoom, pan and drag controls.
A local search mashup using your IP address to attempt to fix your position. Includes info about your IP address.
Use this album maker to build an album and a slideshow of your Flickr photos. It can generate HTML code for you to embed to your blog or web site.
Compares all 6 Amazon international stores, adds shipping to the user country, using user local currency, as updated daily using a webservice, and keeps a price evolution chart.
Worldwide vacation rental listings direct from owners.
Use this comprehensive index from HDTV Magazine to find television stations broadcasting in HDTV for all major US markets. Map gives details by station including power information.
Innovative prototype for exploring Flickr photos. Point the application at a feed, like CNN, it then renders the news in photos by matching tagged photos to words from the news.
Nearly 200 Hindu temples in America on Google Maps. The site title, Stuladarshanam, means birds eye view in Sanskrit.
Windows desktop application for managing photo scrapbooks. With photo service upload capabilities.
Desktop application for managing photos on the Smugmug service.
musicmap is a visual music search tool for finding the albums similar to the ones you know.
The New York City streets are full of interesting and potentially useful things that have been thrown out. If you see something good, snap a pic, send to GarbageScout where others can go and get it.
A very fun Flickr game in which you view a set of ten images and try to guess the common tag. Time based scoring.
Toronto Live Club Hub helps locals and visitors find out where to find live music in the Toronto area via maps and integrated links to club listings.
A visually rich interactive Flash tool for exploring place based on the geotagged photos at Flickr. Search by user, tag and collection.
Find good music and drinks in the NYC and NJ areas with the map that plots data from the Crooked Beat venue and calendar database.
Good interactive map of the Washington DC Metrorail.
See the path of your network connection using traceroute and this mapping tool. Uses Java applet.
Find drink places in the greater Portland, Oregon and Seattle, Washington areas. Includes good listings of brewpubs and vineyards.
Find public libraries in the US and Canada. Data for more than 20,000 libraries available. Choose Yahoo or Google Maps.
Compares relative popularity of spellings or concepts based on web frequency. An experiment in sidesifting the Web for useful patterns of information.

Book trends for publishers using the Amazon API. Retrieves current and historic sales rank data for Amazon book titles, displaying trends in graphic and numeric form for each analysis and decision making.
Generate money on your website or blog with MotionMall s service. Allows you to customize banner ads for your target audience and displays bestselling products using the Amazon API.
Map of Ireland with drink prices, parking spaces and petrol prices.
Visualize news stories with this application built on the Yahoo Search API. Hovering your mouse over images shows article snippets. PHP source code available. From Rasmus Lerdorf.
Search Flickr for geotagged photos and then plot them on a Google Map. Nice nested map-within-a-map.
Experimental navigation tool for exploring the space of related Flickr tags. Type in one start tag and dive into tag space. Requires Flash 8.
An nice explorative Flash-based interface into Flickr photos. With tag search, interestingness sorting, user tabs, and related tags.
A guide to Bed and Breakfasts that makes extensive use of Google Maps.
View the source location of various podcasts. US and international podcasts listed.
A mashup of Google Maps, geocoder.us, and over 800,000 street level photos arranged by latitude and longitude. Very nice Crusin Mode simulates driving down a given street.
News, pictures, music, videos and gossip about your favorite celebrity. Built on Amazon, eBay, Wikipedia, and Yahoo Search.
Resource for hikers that combines Amazon product data with online resources for camping and trail information.
This page answers the question: Where can I go for under a certain amount of money It displays airfares under a user defined amount of money on a Google map.
Surf predictions and forecasts for surfing spots across the globe. Use the Google Maps interface to get a surf forecast for a coastal prediction.

Novel use of Yahoo Image Search to test your memory. Type in a search term and 28 tiles appear. Click on tile to see an image and as quickly as possible find the tile with matching image. From Nisse Bryngfors.
Create your own Google Maps with photos, comments, directions.
Type a word or phrase into this fun Flickr application and it will return a set of images spelling-out that word, ransom-note style.
Nice search and visualization tool that lets you surf Flickr s tag space. Flickr tags are keywords used to classify images. Related tags shown based on clustered usage analysis.
Track visitors to your website using Google Maps.
Find places to stay via this interactive map. Hotels in London, Ireland, Canada and US.
Appraise your Seattle-area house by seeing prices of recent home sales plotted on this Google Map.
A contributor-based wiki for things to do and places to goin and around Boston.
Maps of breweries and bars across the US. With city-specific maps and directories.
Map of wine shops in New York City. With brief summaries and links to their web sites.
Rental property statistics for major metropolitan areas.
This nice del.icio.us enhancement allows you to see which of your del.icio.us bookmarks are used most frequently. By DeWitt Clinton.
Build a Virtual Pin Map of the places you ve been.

This is a Google map of unprotected open camera streams obtained from Google searches. The IP addresses for each camera s url has been mapped to its Geo-location. Sometimes loads slowly. Some cams NSFW.
Find the best petrol prices in Ireland via this interactive Google Map.
retrievr is an experimental service which lets you search and explore in a selection of Flickr images by drawing a rough sketch. Very interesting.
Washington DC real estate Google Maps mashup maps vacant property and past property sales. Over 70,000 sales records are accessible. See what your neighbors paid.
When you gotta go, but you want to find just the right place, then search here at Urinal.net. Lots of photos in the archive. Both US and international.
View eBay auctions on a Google Map. Enter search keywords and a zip code to find local auctions.
Full MLS real estate listings using Google Maps. As of October 2006 also offers data provided by the Zillow API.

Helps shoppers capitalize on price guarantees on recent purchases. Add your purchase information and they will watch for price decreases and automatically notify you if price falls below your purchase price.
Comparison shopping site with deal, rebate and coupon information. Customer reviews and product information from Amazon.com and Epinions.com.
Platial enables people to find, create and use meaningful maps of Places that matter to them.
Data Mining 101: Finding Subversives with Amazon Wishlists, demonstrates how your wishlists might be used by government agencies to profile you based on the books you read. By Tom Owad.
A flight planning tool for pilots based on Google Maps. Shows airports near your current location, with colour coding for weather conditions reported in METARs, as well as TFR outlines.

A prediction market for Amazon products. Each new product added becomes a stock . If a product s Amazon s sales rank improves, its stock price goes up. And vice-versa. Traders buy, sell, short, and cover.
Use Rollyo to roll your own search engine. Create personalized search Rolls, share them, and search others. See Rolls created celebrities and add search tools to your site.

A real estate search engine that aggregating nearly a million property listings searchable with a GoogleMap-based visual interface. Site has budding online community of buyers, sellers, and service providers.
For history buffs and school kids, a mashup showing where presidents first ladies were born. From George Washington through George Bush.
Comprehensive NYC real estate search site. Includes data on public school information, market data, stats and trends, details about neighbors and neighborhoods, building and neighborhood photos.
This Google Map shows the path of solar eclipses across Earth s surface. The northern and southern limits of a solar eclipse path are plotted in pink while the central line is blue.
50 random World Heritage Sites on a Google Map. Each time you reload it shows another 50 random sites. With embedded photos and links to details on each site.

School Performance Maps provides a bird s eye view of public school performance in California. Data from California Department of Education, Academic Performance Index. The 1-10 is statewide rank school, low to high.
UK site with Google Maps to help find dine-in and takeaway food. Menus and readers reviews online to peruse.
See the location of elaborate Christmas lights displays. Readers can add comments and vote for favorites.
Displays volcanos of the world on a Google Map. Data from the Smithsonian Institution, Global Vulcanism Project
Click on two points on the NYC Google Map and the program will display the shortest subway route between those two points, including walking time.
Apartment listings in NYC with Google Maps.
Real time Google maps of current parking availability in the San Francisco Bay Area.
Mapping community site that lets users create and save maps consisting of waypoints and routes.
Database of over 11,000 airfields and airports across the world, from major internationals like New York, Paris and London to more out-of the way airstrips like Antartica.
Online running log service with local search and sharing using Google maps. Running log has nice graphing features.
Amazon books combined with Windows Live Local. It allows users to find books on Amazon based upon geographical locations around the world.
Google Map of the London Underground.
Find beer and more with this comprehensive listing and map of retail establishments in Toronto and the rest of Ontario.

This mashup uses 2000 Census data and Google Maps. Each zip is color coded by population density. Adding a lot of cities to the map makes it resemble election results. There s also a search function to see where your hometown ranks with other cities.
A website plagiarism search tool that uses the Google Search API.
Very nice map featuring locations of photos from the book Birds of Central Park.
Gothamist Maps are a great way to see what is going on and where right now in NYC.

PackageMapper shows you a map of your FedEx, UPS, USPS package routes. Enter a carrier and a tracking number to see your package s progress plotted on the map. Sign in to enter a list of packages and see their current locations on a table or map.
A virtual tour of New York City using AJAX and Google Maps. Navigate through the streets of New York using thousands of pictures, viewing hundreds of descriptions and details on history.
Real estate listings from eBay plotted on a Google Map.
Meta search tool from a group of students at Allegheny College. Results from many search engines and social services.
Musipedia, The Open Music Encyclopedia, uses Amazon Alexa to provide the ability to search the web by melody. Give the engine a keyword or melodic contour, and it returns similar music.
Save on shipping with this Yahoo Maps eBay mashup to show auctions within your local zip code.
View the lines and stops of the metro system in Naples, Italy.
Mashup of Google Maps and Rocky Mountain venture capital investments
Example Yahoo Map with overlay of Local and Traffic information. With link to article on how this was programmed. By Dan Theurer.
Comprehensive searchable gazeteer based on Google Maps. Referenc guide has full world coverage.
Flash-based interface to Google Talk. Allows you to chat without a client install. Gtalkr also has its own API.
Online tool to generate code for Google and Yahoo maps. Does not required knowledge of the APIs or JavaScript. Share your own maps and explore maps created by others.
PHP source code for combining Salesforce.com and Google Maps. Note: suitable only if you are a Salesforce customer.
Geology.com uses Google Maps satellite images for exploring several of earth s meteor impact craters.
View reviews of stores, restaurants, bars and venues placed in context on a Google Map.

Okta s enterprise-grade identity management service enables companies to accelerate the secure adoption of their web applications, both in the cloud and behind the firewall.
Save between 7 19 on hotel costs. Proprietary full visibility audit finds missed discount savings, cheaper nearby preferred hotels, and uncollected commissions.

Taxi Magic is changing local travel through the power of mobile technology. Use your smartphone to book, track and pay for your rides, and leave the expense reporting to Concur. Rides booked with Taxi Magic are automatically added to your Concur report and a trusted eReceipt is generated for your records.

Through Cvent Concur Travel, companies can gain visibility into meetings and travel costs to reduce associated costs. These tools help you collect the data needed to understand the current costs situation, and then help reduce costs by automating the entire meetings and travel process.
The GroundSpan Concur platform was uniquely developed to accelerate the automation of ground transportation reservations from Travel Agencies and Corporate Booking Tools.
Limos.com simplifies the process of booking a private car with a full integration into Concur Travel; no corporate relationship needed.
The SpendTracker Concur Connector allows Concur users to initiate a fuzzy search within Concur for HCP O records stored within SpendTracker and its related third party master databases.
Decision-ready due diligence information and world-class risk and compliance protection allows organizations to identify banned or suspect entities and strengthen fraud protection.

Centrify for SaaS eliminates password sprawl with single sign-on ( SSO ) for Concur and thousands of SaaS apps and Zero Sign-On ( ZSO ) for mobile apps while giving enterprises centralized control over access to ever-increasing numbers of SaaS applications.

PingOne , Ping Identity s Identity as a Service, connects people to the cloud simply and securely. Only PingOne enables standard-based single sign-on (SSO) and automated user management to Concur while ensuring identity information is safe and secure behind your firewall where it belongs.

By enabling Gogo in your Concur Travel Corporate Profile, your travelers will enjoy the ease of 1) purchasing discounted Gogo products directly from Concur Travel during the booking process, and 2) expensing them in Concur Expense.
GroundScope is the leading global managed ground transportation service for corporate clients, available through Concur Travel to provide integrated business taxi reservations.

CIBTvisas is the fastest and easiest way to obtain a travel visa, passport and other documents for travel anywhere in the world including popular destinations such as China, India, Russia, Brazil, and Australia.
Intelligent Price Tracking dynamically monitors price variations on airfare from ticketing through departure, sending instant alerts when savings are significant enough to re-book.
The Park N Fly Network gives Concur users the ability to reserve off-airport parking the same way that air, car, and hotel are reserved.

TripLingo is an award-winning mobile platform that helps Corporate Travel Managers ensure travelers are safe, productive and happy during their trips abroad. It helps travelers learn essential phrases, understand the local business culture, and help them communicate in a foreign language.
MedPro s industry leading connector allows real-time access to the 13M record MedProID database via Concur to facilitate accurate HCP data capture for transparency reporting.
Real-time access via Concur to the world s largest database of unique, telephone-verified HCPs, HCOs and affiliations with a full set of licensure identifiers in over 70 countries.
Directly transmit attendee HCP spend data captured in Concur to the Consummate platform for aggregate spend reporting and or remediation with minimal configuration requirements.
Real-time access to HDSverify s compliance database in Concur. Simple, fast accurate return of HCPs and HCOs.
More time selling, less on data entry. Manage call activities and expenses in your mobile CRM. Single point-of-entry and easy data transfer simplifies reporting and reduces risk.

ExpenseConnect is a packaged cloud-to-cloud integration product that eliminates the need for your organization to manually download and manipulate files for integrating data between systems. Built on a flexible data mapping backbone, ExpenseConnect securely allows you to define the data mapping from Concur to Intacct.
Taxback.com and Concur have designed Fast Track VAT to allow Concur clients to easily benefit from a VAT reclaim process without the headache of the data gathering.

With the Concur Connector for NetSuite, you can easily integrate our expense management system into NetSuite Financials, giving you greater visibility into how money is being spent so you can make better decisions about control and costs.
Analyze domestic foreign VAT on expenses in Concur with VATConnect. Extract expense data to file VAT reclaim tax reports. Contact us for a free analysis of your reclaimable VAT.
Cloud-based time tracking software that helps organizations increase the productivity of their workforce through insight into their most scarce resource employees time.
Effortless expense capture into Concur through text messaging.
Automatically send expense receipts to Concur when you send a gift card from Tango Card apps in your CRM, CS suite, web, and mobile.
Expense integration that leverages pre-defined analytics to identify potential fraud, waste and abuse within your T E program.
Maps T E data to specific accounts and customers so you know exactly what you re spending to land- and maintain- a customer. It s simple to activate and requires no custom coding.

ExpenseConnect is a packaged cloud-to-cloud integration product that eliminates the need for your organization to manually download and manipulate files for integrating data between systems. Built on a flexible data mapping backbone, ExpenseConnect securely allows you to define the data mapping from Concur to Intacct.

Whether it is international or U.S. domestic state-to-state travel, borderFile automates the collection of travel data, the calculation of compliance metrics and the sharing of reports and dashboards with key stakeholders in your company.

The Concur Connector for Workday automates the HR, Financial, and Payroll and updates between Concur and Workday. It completely eliminates the manual processes to keep all your applications up-to-date and error-free.

Visage MXP is the mobile expense module for Concur Expense. It enables Concur Expense to do for mobile expenses what Concur already does for hotel, air and other business expenses which is to completely automate the process of getting expense entries into Concur Expense ready to be submitted by the user.
When you enable Evernote integration, Concur automatically syncs your images to your Concur Receipt Store. Giving users the ability to capture, access, and find photos everywhere.

TripIt automatically takes all your trip details and creates one truly helpful master itinerary that s there when and where you need it on your mobile device, sync d with your calendar, and online at tripit.com. Travel booked through Concur is automagically populated to your TripIt account. Any travel booked outside of Concur (TNC), will be tracked by TripIt and passed back to your Concur account.
Say goodbye to itemizing your hotel bills E-receipts from all major car and hotel companies bring your receipt data into Concur to automatically create expense entries.

Tab Clock helps you stop wasting time online It tracks your tab usage in Chrome, gives you and a partner results, and lets you set goals and keep them

BOL is a Google Chrome Extension that allows you to talk with other visitors to sites that you like to visit. When you visit a site that you would like to talk to about, simply click the microphone icon next to the address bar and click Discuss . Allow permissions to access speakers and talk away.
A web-based zero platform call center service that runs in the cloud . Anyone can create and serve a call center from an internet-connected browser.
A mashup of Google Maps and Wikipedia. Click on the map and a dialog window opens which retrieves information from Wikipedia for that country.
Take a photo with your camera phone and send it via MMS using Snappr. Your image will appear on TwitPic and be posted on Twitter automatically. No 3G or internet connection is required.

Making the act of planning easier. Uses a combination of email and SMS to communicate around a particular event.
View and comment on Portland Oregon city council agenda.

Watch.io is a fast video search engine for free movies and full episodes online. Search across numerous sites with a single click. You can even include Netflix or Amazon Prime in the results. Watch.io is a great alternative to the new Netflix search interface. Query thousands of Netflix videos filtered by name, cast, director, rating or year. View results in 5 distinct views.

Find the closet free wifi, public library, or walgreens by texting 512 782-2513 with your command and postal code or airport code. Commands are wifi, library, walgreens, and help. Eg. wifi 78702 . Or walgreens AUS Walmarts and ATM s are coming soon. Textable helps you find a few important things nearby quickly.

Text (415) 729-3599 with any food or beverage and it will tell you important nutrition facts in seconds. This application uses the awesome DailyBurn service to look up over 400,000 popular meals. Give it a try

Federal loans, state loans and grant resource. Users can click on an interactive map to view the loans and grants available in different states.
Discover related artists based on a particular artist you enjoy, sort of a quick Pandora style suggestion. The key aspect is that it s universally accessible by SMS.
Image galleries built around currently trending phrases on Twitter using Flickr photo search.

A Google Maps, Foursquare and Twitter search API mashup that allows lovers of Toronto to tweet their favorite location or thing to do in Toronto. The application captures real time tweets or tweets that include references to a database of Toronto-centric locales. Real-time foursquare checkins are used to map where hotspots are at any given time.
Google Places on the map. See the same area in Foursquare and Facebook Places

I Am A Footy Fan uses the FanFeedr API to provide news on teams and competitions on its website and managed Facebook pages. By using FanFeedr s API to select the most relevant content sources, I Am A Footy Fan provides a breadth of coverage that can t be found anywhere else.

Urban Hunt r is a unique social photo challenge game. Play at home or on the go. Simply snap a photo and send it to Urban Hunt r. Each week there is a new game and a photo challenge. Earn points by submitting photos and having people vote on their photos.
A money manager reporting dashboard. Built using the Presto JackBe mashup platform and sources are spreadsheets (alternative to database), Groupon API and Oodle API.

Blackberry app for sending printed Enthusem mailers. With Enthusem, you can send personalized printed greeting cards as easily as sending an email. Your printed cards can include a unique website address that links to online content. Blackberry Apps site requires Windows.

Uses the Instagram API to put photos head to head to determine the best pics. Use all public photos, or drill down by user and determine a friend s best photo.

Descriptions may include content from Wikipedia. With the exception of some images, Wikipedia content is licensed under the GNU Free Documentation License.
CustomSongSender.com is a service for sending Valentines and Birthday songs to your friends.
Check in to your favorite board games. Uses Facebook for identity, Freebase for the database of board games and Google App Engine to provide the platform.

Online secret admirer. You post a message to your crush and your crush will only be notified on February 14th at a time you specify. Your crush will get a message either through SMS or email with a link to see your message on February 14th.

Zen-SMS is a customized Zendesk integration that automatically sends SMS notifications to your customers when you close a ticket. The customer telephone number (and other details) are pulled from custom fields in the ticket to compose the SMS message. An email confirmation is sent to you, confirming the SMS message that was delivered.

Yippr brings you the most popular videos of the day from different sources. If you click on the image you will get a lightbox and you will be able to see the video on the fly. If you click on the link you will be taken to the details page.

DebateWall is a new type of blog where your comments are actually the post itself. In blog comments you can find really valuable information pointing out the two sides of a story instead of the single opinion of the author of the post. Debatewall take those comments to the main scene, to actually be the post. Because it s a crowdsourced blog, a percentage of the profits are donated.
A site to get any information about automobiles such as images, video, questions and answers.
Share your Netflix queues quickly, easily and anonymously. No registration or authentication, just a quick copy paste.

Match 2 Friends allows your friends get the right date for you in a secure way avoiding embarrassment. Secure dates; your friends can only match you with their friends so you have always at least one friend in common with your match. The more friends that like your match the more secure the date, so you will never get a date with a total stranger. Zero embarrassment; you can like a match anonymously and wait for your match to also like you without him or her knowing that you like her or him. If both people that are matched like each other then they will be notified after a random amount of time so neither can know who liked the other first.

Twilio Home allows you to remotely control your home devices via phone calls (SMS coming soon). Not only do you get an audio confirmation that your device or appliance was turned on off, you can pull up a website and get a visual confirmation as well. Home automation made easy and fun with Twilio.
JockPedia contains a huge database of athletes from around the from world. Includes a short bio, latest news, pictures and highlight movies.

This application was developed for the art program at the new San Jose Airport terminals. Each of the dozens of digital art installations at the airport has a unique code. People at the airport will be able to call a number, enter a code and hear a curatorial comment on that piece.

Call-Forward gives you a virtual telephone number for relaying voice and SMS. If you have friends, family and colleagues who live far away, you can maintain your close connections by having a telephone number that is a local call for all of them.

Bassicly is an App that utilises multiple APIs to provide a service that allows people to listen to bass orientated electronic music in a seamless interface. Bassicly was created as a result of frustrations with listening to the vast amount of musical content available on YouTube but not having an easy to use interface to do it with. As well as being able to play music from YouTube, you can make it scrobble the tracks you are listening to in real time to Last.fm.

Call tracking, (native within salesforce.com) by connecting salesforce.com leads and contacts to their respective campaigns when a prospects calls into a promotional phone number on a marketing campaign. Also enables the representative to hear which campaign the caller called in about, before the call is connected, with no computer required.
Check your email via text message a service provided by Telephone Data Management and uses the Twilio API.

A social bookmarking site and Facebook application. The entire site and all of it s features are available through the Facebook application. The site also uses the delicious API to allow users to import all of their delicious bookmarks into ocell.us easily. Beyond this ocell.us uses the Twitter API to allow people to bookmark links from tweets automatically.
Simple phone conversation recording. a free service and conversations are stored on Twilio s secure servers.

TWBE plays a continuous video stream from the videos suggested by user s friends on twitter. With this application you can create a web television out of twitter messages containing YouTube video links. You can easily skip boring videos, see TV-format videos and have all the video functionalities provided by YouTube itself. TWBE was developed by four students (Ebrisa Mastrodicasa, Lorenzo Baracchi, Thomas Mantegazzi, Yotam Sharon) as part of the SAIII course offered by the university of Lugano.

The Snowman of Babel lets users text or call in and request a translation of their favorite holiday greeting in a random language along with a cool fact about that holiday.

Merry Twilsmas allows you to manage your wish list by SMS, as well as see what other people want. You don t always think about new ideas for yourself when you are in a position to write it down for later, but whenever you have an idea, just text idea your idea here to 732 400 XMAS.
ForgetfulApp allows you to send an SMS with a specific time and reminder message. When the specified time comes around, you ll get a text message with your reminder.

Humans vs. Zombies is a giant game of tag. This website is the official site of Stony Brook University s HvZ game. We use Twilio to communicate with players in real-time so that they don t have to run back to a computer to update their game status.

SeatSimple allows reservations to be made by automated phone messages to a business s point of sales instantly. Book appointments via website or Facebook page, without the need for an internet connection at your point of sale.
Export your delicious bookmarks as an XML file.

Touring To Australia FREE Online Itinerary Planning Portal designed to promote Australian tourism industry. Using this tool travellers can Search, Get Directions and Build Dynamic Itineraries virtually FROM and TO anywhere in the world. And you can search for Australian Tourism businesses within the map and contact them directly. What are the key features of this free online tool --Over twenty thousand Australian tourism listings. --Search locations and businesses on the map or along the journey route. --Search tourism businesses within a radius of any Australian location. --Plan trips from anywhere in the world. --Ability to create multiple Itineraries. --Email notifications and alerts. --Fully integrated global time zones. --Interactive maps with street view and draggable routes. --Free access for public use.
Enter your First and Last name and see two random videos based on those keywords.

Dropped Call Alert lets you easily publish dropped call and data outage notifications to your twitter account. Instead of sending the data via the carrier s app you can share the problematic locations in a Web 2.0 way and let people construct maps of phone and data outages.
Free music video playlists. Enjoy MTV, YouTube and Vimeo music videos in single playlist.
Play a Pong-like game with robot versions of your Facebook friends.

A tool box to compare two things. Provides contextual content, reference, images, suggestions and a library of common and uncommon comparisons across any domain. Provides rules of thumb and allows visitors to participate like a wiki.

surf2gether.com lets you experience the web together. Invite your friends and use synchronized apps with them. Watch Youtube videos. Listen to Grooveshark music. Upload and view documents together. (powered by scribd.com) More apps coming soon...
