Bulbul is a smart Twitter bird that lets people get answers to questions on Twitter. Ask any question in plain English to smartbulbul and it will gives you the perfect answer in minutes .
Instant search for YouTube, Digg and Flickr. Once YouTube video is playing you can still view photos and news from Digg.
This application will give you a (random) song each day (writes on your wall). You can also share a song with any of your friends.
Go on a photo voyage. Start at a location and see nearby geocoded photos. As you choose new photos, you travel further from your starting location. Where will you end up
A Flash-based interactive map built using the MapQuest API. Hotels, activities, and package deals are shown among other POIs to help Travelocity users explore, plan, and experience their destination.

SongFight is a facebook game where users listen to songs and try to guess who s the artist. It s completely user-generated. Each user can create his own quizz and promote it. Songs and metadata are retrieved from Last.fm and EchoNest.
A mashup for the band Limp Bizkit. See their concert history on a Google Map and watch recommended videos.
Subscribe to XML feeds based on one s location.

This app is a mashup of Google Maps, an already existing Tropo application for Delaware transit locations and Phono. Since all of the Phono, Google Maps and jQuery pieces run in the client, there is no server-side logic need to make this application work. It s all JavaScript.

Uses the Wordnik API to retrieve random words. Then creates short URLs for users with those words. Instead of generated gibberish, it uses English words to make the URLs memorable and repeatable, in addition to short.
Displaying open data from major Canadian cities (ottawa vancouver toronto etc.) on a map.
Mobile mashup: city forums. Places from Foursquare forums from Disqus. HTML5 mobile web application (iPhone, Android, Samsung etc.). Requires users to share their location.

mashup: Browse, Search, and View Delicious Bookmarks
description: The mashup provides a way of searching for delicious bookmarks by keyword and or username and viewing bookmarked pages without leaving the site. It also presents with popular bookmarks view as a homepage.
Text2Play is an example in how to use Comet to build a real time web application. With Text2Play you can controll the Youtube player by Searching, Playing, or Pausing a video via SMS.
Real estate flyer microsites using Google Maps, Great Schools and Walk Score.

Starting with official Government-backed information about state schools in England, Schooloscope tries to tease out something interesting from the dry tables of statistics. It shows the school on a map by making the map the background of the page.

Ohrwurm is German for Earworm: A tune that is stuck in one s head, especially as unwanted or repetitive . Detects those kind of songs and automatically lets the world know about them via twitter, facebook, etc.. Uses Last.fm as the basis for the listening analysis.
Twitter organized, with spam filtering technology to filter spam tweets. TwitGrids organizes celebrity tweets and trending topics into Twitter grids.
Promote your Twitter account with milliontweetpixels. Add your Twitter picture, Twitter infos and Twitter account page to milliontweetpixels wall.
Everything Nashville, search or browse through Nashville classifieds. Nashville classified searching made easy.
615 Nasvhille - Search and Browse everything in Nasvhille, classifieds, all Nasvhille
A job search engine to make job searching easy.
Subway Path Finder is a Flash-based route finder for a number of subway systems around the world, such as LA, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Barcelona, Madrid, Moscow, Tokyo and Mexico City.
MusicLink.fm is a mashup between Amazon, Grooveshark and Facebook that lets you stream full albums for free. MusicLink also lets you see what your friends are listening to.
A real-time map visualization of Foursquare check-ins shared on Twitter.
Displays all of the farm shop and farmers markets in the UK. Search by postal code.
Calculate the driving distance between cities in km and miles.
Uses Google API to go instantly to I m feeling lucky result below the search. It s inspired by Google Instant and YouTube Instant.
Shows all the world s graffiti spots with site image histories. Upload you pics or find whats near you. Shows current StreetView of a place, to see the status of the graffiti when Google drove by.
Mustard Seeds Africa is a non profit organization based in Kenya. It uses the Cownt Us API to provide a look at the other visitors currently on the site.
Thounds Radio is a fun way to listen to Thounds library.

TribeHR supports Single-Sign-On from Saleforce through Salesforce s Web Tab feature. This feature is helpful if you are a sales-driven organization and would like to make it easier for your team to log into your HR website from within Salesforce.
Find classes near you or online. Simply tweet i want to learn followed by a subject. We ll reply with a link to where you can find classes and other information about your subject.
Find out where and when you can vote for in the Swedish election.
Sounds from around the UK are geocoded, added to a map and made available for listening. Curated by the British Library, the sounds are contributed by the public.

Organic Resume Search Engine. Kabroo searches resumes from Indeed and provides download access. Restrict the search by file type (Word doc, PDF) or only see resumes from .edu domains (most likely students).

Users can navigate to California counties through an interactive map and see the trends of population, income, unemployment, new housing units, etc. over a number of past years. The application plots diverse metrics on the same chart to allow users to compare and contrast the patterns of growth and decline in various categories and the relationships between them.
A belgian restaurant search engine using the google maps api.
This is site is a simple mapping tool that displays California State Parks, Fishing Spots, and Boating Facilities. The information was obtained from Data.ca.gov
A complex cartographic representation of a journey through Queer Carnaval Space. Reads Flickr in georss form and passes it to both the Google Feeds slideshow and Google Maps v3 API.
Bills itself as a smarter Twitter widget.
Choose a point on the earth, then see its opposite point. It s as if you dug from that point straight through the earth to the other side.
User reviews, video reviews, images and details about cameras.
What is happening in your city. Streetmavens shows feeds of what is happening in your city and allows messaging, conversation. Photos coming soon
eSurvey is a mobile form management application, and through its integration with Box.net, users can upload their forms and results directly to a Box account.
EchoSign is an online electronic signature service, and through its integration with Box.net, Box users can send files to be e-signed with EchoSign from within the Box environment.
Create a poll, let people know and tweet to vote
Mixing the information from twitter and sending it to Facebook.

RateMyStreet is a mashup of Google maps and street view to crowdsource the walkability of every street in the world. How walking friendly is your street Use our walkability app to find out and add your own rating.
Shopensteinr uses the Amazon eCommerce Service API to visualize purchasing relationships between generic and specific product queries. It was designed to be used as a consumer research tool.
Visualizes waves in your inbox as trees or timelines. Uses the Javascript InfoVis Toolkit for the tree visualization.
A client to search Chart Lyrics API. Translate the lyrics using the Google Translate Service. The client is implemented with JavaFX, so you can run it in any supported OS (Windows, Linux, MacOS).

Autorifi is an automotive news aggregation service, also an automotive database. Autorifi will figure out which automakers and automobile models are mentioned in every post, so people can pick up what they want quickly and save the time.
This Mashup using Twitter and Google Ajax Search Video shows you the last 20 trends in Twitter illustrated with a video when available. This helps you to best understand what s hot in Twitter. Enjoy
Customizable widgets leveraging the FanFeedr API with an easy-to-use form. They are included on the Forbes and SF Gate sites.
Control the plane with the mouse, wheel for up or down and fly over Google Maps.
IFaceSearch is a face search engine based on Bing images and Google images APIs. Results are combined, filtered and ordered to provide more accuracy.

Improves the tasks of retrieving, organizing, and collaborating on content on the web. Translations, geographic maps, annotations or web fragment cutting integrate into your personal workflow. Everything you do is kept in shareable Contexts.
Shows realtime music buzz on Twitter. Find out who the most popular music artists on Twitter are in realtime, how many times they have been tweeted and what people say about them.
Search for great new and old properties near you. Using the power of google s real estate knowledge.
Our mash up takes your geolocation from twitter and sends it to google latitude

An interactive 3D community portal to downtown Plymouth Michigan. It allows the business community, municipality, local school system, non-profits and newspapers to contribute content about what is happening in the local community.

Lalalocal aggregates local news and blog content with emerging interactive and social networking tools to provide users with a unique view into the city they love and advertisers with the targeted reach they crave.
An iPhone app that mashes up a variety of different data for Congress including videos, twitter feeds, office maps, click to call, find legislator by GPS, recent votes, websites and committees.
Sell Simply is the simplest way to buy and sell anything.
Embed video search in your uCoz web page and let your users search for videos and watch ones you ve selected without leaving your site.
Recipes from all your favourite cooking sites displayed for you in one place.
Web based music player, similar to iTunes or Winamp. No need to download anything. Songs live from Youtube and Soundcloud.

Remindium is a simple SMS based application to help you remember to do things. There have been many occasions that I, or somebody else has said remind me later this afternoon but to only forget about that reminder.
Simple reminders delivered to any destination, day or night.
Allows you to keep track of new mentions or replies to your Twitter user instantly. We ll send you a notification as soon as a new mention shows up.
World Cup Mashup combines twitter posts to show the public s predictions of World Cup scores.
Takes all your favourite online information and displays in it one spot. Similar to igoogle or netvibes.

140Call makes it easy to send reminder and wake-up calls to your mobile phone. With a simple tweet to 140Call, you can set up a wake-up call that gives you the weather in your city, and whatever you need to remind yourself to do.
Voted on by visitors. The kitchen with the most Ugly Points wins. The Grand Prize winner will be selected one month after the date that total number of contest entries reaches 400.

With drop2phone, you can send SMS notes to a drop and also receive notifications when someone has added something to the drop - so everyone can know what s going on and immediately reply with their own comment via SMS.
Find your secret crush by text message. Enter the phone number of your crush and see if you have a match. You can either respond by text or go to our site to add multiple crushes at once.
PoxPay lets you pay with your voice through your PayPal account. This is done using voice biometric technology to uniquely identify and authorize purchases you make.
A digital receptionist for your mobile phone, RingThink takes calls, forwards those on your whitelist to you and takes a message for everyone else letting you know by SMS.

TeachStreet helps lifelong learners find great classes and teachers, empowering teachers with robust online tools to manage their teaching businesses, and enabling schools to more effectively generate leads for their classes.
Need an excuse to get out of an annoying conversation On a date that just won t end Ask rescu.me to SMS or call you, and get outta there.

Sometimes you need to quickly gather information from the people around you. Rather than writing it up on a board, folks can text their data, and it automatically gets pushed to our database where you can export it to csv.
Create conference calls through a simple interface. Get a toll-free number with support for multiple conference rooms, create rooms with a specific purpose and track the number of participants.
Allows customers of ripstyles to call to get a variety of departments in the company including automated order tracking over the phone.
Wiki by phone gives you access to wikipedia articles via any phone.
Allows professors to connect with their students when students need them the most: a class cancellation.
Users with Cloud Call Me can call each other without revealing their phone numbers online. Each phone number is kept private and never revealed to other users.
Lets pet owners post their lost pets and be called if one is found in their area and allows people who have found a pet to be contacted by someone looking for their pet anonymously.
Music recommendations and explanations for about 40,000 artists and bands. Uses linked data and semantic web techniques to make connections.
Voice reminders sent directly to any phone.
Office is an iPad application for editing Microsoft Word and Excel files. Its integration with Box.net allows users to load and save files from Box from within the Office interface.
You add a link to a picture of your friends, and they get a mustach.
Add photos from Flickr to your uCoz site.
Your Picasa photos on your website.
Get the most viewed, most popular, most responded to, or most discussed videos in any category, such as Comedy, How To, People, Entertainment, or Music. You can specify a region and a time range.
Square Root Calculator that uses Google Chart API formulas.
Synthesizes the complex SunLight Labs Transparency Data API into a manageable query tool.

Multiuser conversational game using Google Maps as background. You can play in 2d (Openlayers) or in 3d (Google Earth Plugin). You can enter, talk with other users logged or with virtual users, look at one direcction, take objects, enter to the buildings.

Mappyfriends is a location based recommendations network that shows your friends where you have been and recommends you places to go. Mappyfriends enables you to search your friends experiences in order to create your own.

Cool online music player. Alternative to Lala or grooveshark. Over 8 million songs streaming all free. You can create your own playlist and share it with friends. Fully integrated with Facebook (friendsandmusic app).
Search The Web is a mashup that makes searching the Web easier by combining the best search engines convert into one.
Provides constantly updated news as well as crime reports, real estate transactions and more about the Wilmington, North Carolina, area.
Find your friends in a map, inside your social network. Post events, photos and videos in map.
Find any of 6,300 stores that carry the Android phone.
A historical library of Academy Award-nominated films. A visual carousel with information from Wikipedia and Amazon. A cover-flow style interface to film history.

You can search various microblogging sites like Twitter, Digg, Youtube, Yahoo answers etc. On the homepage, we list the most popular keywords and trends that are being searched by the people across the world.
18,000 Starbucks from around the world, on a clustered map. Can filter by store type.
Centralized environment to efficiently manage your online advertisement campaigns no matter which network you are using for your messages. Open source.
A useful command for the Firefox Ubiquity addon. finds movies by titles and actors. Loads movie trailers and descriptions.

Gigs and music events happening in Edinburgh and Glasgow, Scotland. Browse by date, artist, venue, town, and get live updates via Twitter. Three APIs are used: Last.fm, MusicBrainz, and Cloudmade. The code is open-sourced and available on Github.
Hotel and experiences search mashup.

Music Festival Info is a directory website for music festivals from around the world. The website allows you to search by festival name, genre, location and date. This information is useful for those who love travel music festivals.
Yoga Accessories shopping using the Amazon.com catalog.
Explore events near you all around the world on a Google map.

Tweet a tune is a mashup of Twitter, Tinysong and GrooveShark. Enter an artist or song title and find out who is listening to what on Twitter, and listen with them via a GrooveShark link. Easily stream and listen to the song people tweet about.
Make your Twitter stream audible with TweJay or listen to a Twitter search.

This map and graph displays over 1500 marine vessel observations in Southern California. Vessels can be filtered by type, activity, and date of observation. Additional layers include Marine Protected Areas and Areas of Special Biological Significance.
This Chrome extension lets you browse through the games under categories such as Action, Sports, Racing, Strategy, Puzzles etc and lets you play games right from the extension.
This mashup uses the YouTube Data API and Player API. It lets you use a YouTube playlist to play Power Hour.

A news aggregator that aggregates popular links from popular social networks. Newzupp continuously crawls through the social networks to pull out the latest stories. The home page is a mashup of such links.
Create and share online mixtapes by choosing individual tracks or getting one created automatically based on an artist that you like.
An attempt to make the Twitter search experience more fun and engaging as well as provide additional functionality.
A site that filters the news from 7 tech blogs based on whether the news is sxsw related or not.
A desktop Twitter client for Windows. Uses Chirpio for anti-spam and Yahoo Map Image for geo data and its own internal API for finding people to follow.
Download TwitLoader and experience easier posting of your media to Twiiter.
WordPress Commission Junction Working Together. This WordPress Plugin is for search, analysis and promoting. You can manage your CJ account from within your WordPress blog.
A mashup using Google Maps and Flickr. Finds images taken from Canon cameras with geo-locations.
Geo Event Finder is a Mashup that allows to locate musical events around the world using interactive tools on the screen as searching by artist name, city name or selecting an area over the map.

PicTell is a Geolenz Panoramio mashup. Geotagged photos are requested from Panoramio and are annotated dynamically and on-the-fly with rich, contextual descriptions from the Geolenz contextual geocoding services.
A repetitive learning tool for young minds ...and a refresher course for more refined minds.
The Link Inspector lets you get in-depth information about all the backlinks pointing to your site. It will even search for new backlinks that you are not aware of, good or bad.
This is a simple plugin for Wordpress to create a widget of Bing Maps and insert maps into your posts.
A blog post and demo describing how to use web services from within Salesforce (Force.com platform) to retrieve data from a third party (in this case Flickr) and render that data using jQuery.
Find out who clicks the bit.ly links that you tweet.
The online network for Sustainable Action. Combines multiple social APIs including Facebook and identity services like RPX.
A dashboard for online marketing for small to medium sized businesses. Connects with Google, Yahoo, MSN, and Facebook so that advertisers can manage their online advertising from 1 account.
Interact with American Idol.
Using Google Translate (Text to Speech) and Facebook, Status Speak allows you to listen to all your friends latest status updates for a given time period.

mashup: Someone Random: Random Chat for Yahoo and Jabber
description: An IM bot for Yahoo Messenger and Jabber clients that lets you talk to random people. Just add the bot to your buddies and message away.
Free Website to create thematic maps on GoogleMaps

Free trip planner tool to plan your trip on the map, show your route, points of interest, upload photos and keep your travel diary online. Publish your trip to your Facebook wall to share with your friends.
The infovisualization shows the real-time emotions of the social web by classifying user contributions according to the methodology defined by Plutchik.
flickRate is an attempt to enhance Flickr s favorites system, by allowing users to rate photos on 3 topics: aesthetics, originality and fun.
Basic Telepheed features allow you to listen to current trending topics, local tweets in your area and more tweets from any user.
A free social networking micro-blogging service that allows sending and receiving updates known as a Whisp, which can contain up to 300 characters. Contact people via SMS.

mash trends takes the latest trending topics from google trends and twitter trends and uses the keywords to display breaking related news stories. A great example of a google twitter mashup with twitter statistics.
Exploring new possibilities in microblogging. Tweets become overlays on images in a new look at the Twitter timeline.

Allows users to access their Box.net accounts from within ExSafe, a document viewer and editor on the BlackBerry. Users can view and edit documents in their Box.net accounts then save them back to Box.
An album art search engine that displays results in an attractive collage of images. Larger album art is also available in a lightbox. Find the album art your music collection is missing today.

Watch TV and tweet about it. Chitter allows you to watch streaming television and simultaneously read and post tweets about the shows you re watching. It s a real-time backchannel with comments about live music, news, sports and entertainment.
A Box.net iPhone app which allows access to all of your Box.net files from your mobile device and allows uploading of images to Box as well.
Locate geotagged Flickr images, Tweets, Foursquare tips and YouTube videos using custom controls on a Google map. Isolate by business, point of interest or intersection.
Overlays statistical data on a map of Australia. Uses Google Maps Flash
A mashup to enable users to access info, news and photos of a musician in one place, and access lyrics where applicable.

Tinkrbox makes sense of internet hyperlinks by converting links to actual content so you can access the content right in your Tinkrbox.It also allows you to put together different types of media such that users can concurrently see and hear about a topic
Mobile web app. Integrates an iTunes library, videos from YouTube, lyrics from LyricWiki and similar songs from LastFm. Recently added photos from Yahoo s BOSS API, Eventful concerts, and Twitter.
Displays tweets from global news service and encourages visitors to share their thoughts.
Travel search portal like iGoogle. Find flights, hotels, weather, maps, photos, videos, news and more. Now moved to http: www.placemix.com
Get a small counter image from your Google Analytics stats.
Relisir the source for information on upcoming albums from bands and artists uses Clipta Video Search to pull in related videos on album pages.
Totally redesigned Costwalk is a product search engine. Compare prices on products from multiple vendors. Get user reviews, detailed specs, store ratings and reviews and faceted searching.
Search any keyword or product from Amazon, eBay and Google. A search engine and comparison site.
An attempt to put Digital New Zealand on the map by parsing placenams in the text.
A demonstration of the new Digg writeable API. It demonstrates how to digg and bury a story without leaving the site, and the OAuth authorization.

No one likes getting tickets because they forgot to move their car. If you have a Twitter account, use the service to call you and remind you to move your car. To get started, just friend Ticksuck on Twitter.
A simple interface for watching tweets that include a nowplaying tag. View music tracks mentioned on Twitter in real-time and listen to the songs in a YouTube player.

Mashup of Layar augmented reality browser, Joomla CMS, CareerBuilder, Google Maps, and the Twitter API to display over 1 2 million Points of Interest (POI s) in the USA. Recently added layars for job and local events.
An online menu management system for small to medium restaurants. Provides Web, mobile, PDF and text-to-speech menus. To hear a demo dial (877)490-4909 Restaurant Code 36.
Mashup of various music resources on the web giving you information on any artist track combination. And also checkout the lastfmvideoclipper link.
Shop online for electronics, video games, books, music, clothing, jewelry and more.
Display a slideshow of the place you are going on vacation. Countdown shows days until the trip. Photos are loaded via AJAX and animated as a slideshow.
A fast way to browse Wikipedia categories.
Lets users browse videos by combining tags together, it s like channel zapping with keywords. Watch while you browse, resize, find unexpected stuff, share.
Searches Twitter posts for an expression, then pulls the twitpic links from any results, and creates a page of the images using the Twitpic API.
Ringerous lets you post to your Posterous blog by phone. Your recorded message is added to the post with an embedded MP3 player for easy playback.
A free, daily email of scores and news for your favorite teams with a personalized tracker. Provides you with a quick overview of the sports world, including analysis, insights, humor and previews.
A map of all the baseball stadiums in the US Canada from Rookie to MLB and Indy too. You can turn on and off the different levels to see only the levels you want to see.

gtalk Jabber bot to show latest stock value from nasdaq. Add nasdaq-talk appspot.com to your Gtalk jabber friend list. After this you can ping it for the live stock by entering company symbol (eg. goog,aapl,adbe etc)
A media observer for street art and graffiti. Integrates images and videos from Flickr, Photobucket, Vimeo, YouTube, Zoomr and other sites.
View videos that people are talking about on Twitter. Sit back and relax while watching the videos that people mention in their tweets and which are retweeted the most.
Curates a subset of Amazon s beauty products that are recommended as safe cosmetics.
With the help of this app you can determine your location on a map. You will be assigned a number, which uniquely gives the position selected for 1 or 2 months.
Tourism network to share hobbies. Users can add points of interest on monuments, restaurants, hotels and other things that are of interest to them.
Free safe DNS server with malware protection by Google Safe Browsing.

An interesting way to explore all the things attacking, and being attacked. Content on The Attack Machine is automatically generated leveraging Evri s deep linguistic analysis of news, blog and other web content.

mashup: Africa in Style by Trek Holidays
description: Booking capable website for multi-day adventure tours to Africa. The site is built on the Sentias Content Server with a customized Rezgo XML API parser interface. The website connects to the Rezgo API for content, availability searching, and booking.
Twitter users can influence the site by including specific hashtags in their tweets. The site responds to the hashtags in realtime and updates its content accordingly.
Track new releases for books, movies, music, and video games. Add authors, actors, directors, musicians, publishers, etc. to favorites and get notified when new releases come out from that list.

Digg-style voting for places. Discover and share places, from the hippest bars to upcoming eateries. Every venue is submitted and voted on (buzzed) by people like you. If a place gets enough buzzes then it appears on the front page.
MagenPro is the integration between Magento ecommerce and Doba drop ship products.
A simple click-to-vote site dedicated to uncovering the best video games for console platforms and game genres. Powered by the GamePro API. Pew Pew-pewpewpew Zap
Turkish earthquakes with embedded widgets. It uses Google Maps for location display.

mashup: Local Twitter Trends with Google and Yahoo
description: This application find local twitter trends for your city. Just click on the map, and the trends will appear. Also uses the Yahoo Term Extraction API.

Once the user clicks the Locate button, the application will display a bubble on the google map with current weather,current time,headline news,and events related to the queried location and location photos..

Our mashup recipe is very simple: 5x Twitter News service accounts, 1x Yahoo Geo, 1x Open Calais, 1x Google Maps, 1x Google Search and a little bit of Wikipedia. Mix all ingredients together with care. Hope you enjoy.
This tool takes the incoming links for a URL from Yahoo Site Explorer and creates a 3D representation, allowing you to quickly see the domains with the most links
This demo finds local music events and plots them on a Google map.

description: This demo uses the MaxMind service from a Flex application to plot a users position on a 3D globe rendered by Away3D Lite.
List artist events from Last.FM on a map. A student project from The University of Technology, Sydney.
The National NEMO Network s Google Maps mashup of low impact development (LID) practices around the United States.
This is a lovely gadget for your desktop. As your CPU usage changes, so does your Smiley.
Jewforme is a simple Jewish dating site that integrates Facebook, Twitter and other social tools.
Create a unique Mug featuring all your friends profile-images. It is an easy and fun way to show the world who your best friends are. Besides coffee-cups we also have glasses and beer-mugs.

TweetCall is a new way to reach out to your customers via Twitter. Prompt your followers to tweet their phone number to a hash tag (topic) of your choice, and we ll instantly call them with a custom audio recording. Formerly called TweetCallMe.
Tracks conversations about Jewish dating on Twitter.
Amazon affiliate store. Consolidates offers on products from Amazon.com merchants into one page to help shoppers find the best deal.
Allows subscribers to grant access to visitors, allows visitors to leave voice messages, and allows you to create passwords for frequent guests from a web interface.
Find out who flies where with Flightm8 s unique map view. Useful if you don t have an encyclopedic knowledge of airlines and airports.
Mashup containing extensive information on Brazilian soccer teams including Flickr photos, Twitter streams and YouTube videos.
Doodle Source gathers all Google logos worldwide the second they are changed and keeps an archive where you can browse older Doodles. You can even sort them by country, title and or date.
Online ebook and bookstore. Book reviews and summaries database. Search, read and buy books on The Book Stash site. Available in English, French and Spanish.

mashup: Halifax Metro Transit Google Map, Trip Planner and Schedules
description: Complete Halifax Metro Transit bus and ferry trip planning with Google Maps for the Halifax, Dartmouth, Bedford, Sackville and surrounding regions. Fully accessible bus and ferry schedules.

FixMyCity DC provides a tool for reporting public services issues (downed trees, potholes, etc.) to the city of Washington D.C. and received an honorable mention in the Apps for Democracy competition.
Uses the data provided by the site to crowdsource which fantasy football players you should start. NOTE: Site is only up during football season
Early beta version up in production, many many features in development. OtherNumber is a Virtual IVR PBX built on Cloud infrastructure.

Makes it easy for people on dates to crowdsource getting out of awkward social situations. Sending a DM to EscapeMyDate initiates the call for help. Winner of most votes for Women 2.0 Startup Weekend SF 2009.
Do you use FriendFeed all the time, yet are afraid of missing trends We will send your feed summary consisting of popular posts to you email on a daily, weekly or monthly basis.
Tracks Amazon product pricing. Graphs the last 30 changes, as well as all-time pricing. Allows you to set up email alerts for when a product hits your desired price.
Helps you find local groups and events. The site focuses on bringing like-minded people together and encouraging real-life meet ups.
Find approximately when you started posting to FriendFeed.

Schedule your FriendFeed posts and send them automatically when you want. You don t have to be online to post to FriendFeed. ffScheduler does it for you. No need to sign up. Login with FriendFeed account below and schedule your posts to the future.

Mapping your twitter location. You can embed it in your blog or website with following code (replace id at the end of the url with your twitter id) iframe code available at http: www.mibazaar.com 2009 08 twitter-status-map-updated.html
Centralized information storage, sharing and archiving for your business or department. Integrates APIs from Google and Zoho.
Fetches the geolocalized tweets around Tokyo and creates live heatmaps of the activity.
Provides subscription-based and on-demand information alerts to your jabber based IM (e.g., Google Talk). Just add loonybot appspot.com as a buddy in your IM.
A Twitter app that lets you post and get tweets about your daily commute, such as delays and other critical information. A great way to share important information with other commuters.
Multiple scatterplots, multiple selections, and map markers
Serving personalized news via Twitter.

Attempts to match currently trending Twitter topics with relevant images and news stories. Uses Twitter to get news, What the Trend to get them explained, Flickr to get the images, and Yahoo News for the news items.
CarSearch is a used, new, certified pre-owned vehicles search site powered by Google Base API.
Snippee lets you read, share and discuss the news and social snippets from all the services you use.
Travel site that integrates all your travel items into one dashboard and map. Make each travel item and anchor and re-sort the data around the new address without starting your search over.

A simple solution for describe a location using the wall publishing feature, easy updating your latest location by integrate your Google Public Location Badge for updating your latest location automatically using Google maps application on your phone

World radio explorer. Adobe AIR app uses a vast list of stations combined with a map interface so you can discover, listen to, and switch between thousands of stations effortlessly. Search by country or genre, or just by clicking on a location on the map.

mashup: Bulgarian Properties for Sale and Rent
description: Site with Bulgarian Properties for sale and rent using Google Maps.

BidSwish is a visual interface for eBay auctions. Designed for simplicity it lets you search and see auction listings in animated collage or grid. Double-clicking goes directly to eBay listing. Easy, quick, fun
View weather information in Scandinavia. Uses the Norway Weather API.

mashup: Get Better Diet Info: PubMed and Amazon.com Ratings
description: Ratings for diet research articles from PubMed and products from Amazon EC2. Relates research articles to products and reviews by extracting tags and showing stats. With OpenID support.

OptiRoute allows you to provide a set of points via a GeoRSS feed which are then displayed in the optimal order to visit those points. GeoRSS is used to collect points from Bing Maps collections and Google Maps my maps.
Find the cheapest prices for mp3 songs and albums from Amazon.com and iTunes.

This dumps all job listings for your search onto the map all at once. So you can see things like where the highest concentration of job demand is. Most job search map mashups only let you page to 10-20 results on the map at a time. This displays the MAX.
Spanish telephone directory featuring Google Maps, Flickr and Friend Connect.
Customized RSS feeds from Authentic Jobs. Find and filter jobs by type, location, company and keywords.

Fedtastic is a dynamic portal to government information that features a unique menu structure which facilitates visual access to the data. It is also modular and expandable. Menus are external to the program as are the modules that process the data.

mashup: I would have liked to be one of you
description: Steal statuses and names of your friends on Facebook.
Searches Upcoming for events using Ajax.

Create a unique T-Shirt featuring all your friends profile-images. It is easy and fun to show the world who your best friends are.
Sitting in our Library, Kalle tells us each time we get a website visitor and gives book reviews using Amazon s API: enter an ISBN, or scan it using your webcam. All activity is Twittered, too.

If the real-time web is a massive cocktail party conversation, then The Summarizer is the party s authority. It semantically connects the real-time web and traditional media to one another with their common threads, entities and topics.

Tracks breaking news topics and allows you to tweet these news topics on Twitter. Also you can find the related topics, e.g., it can tell you that topic New Moon is related to Robert Pattinson and Kristen Stewart.
Meetme is an application that lets users to select a meeting point between two locations using Yelp.
Get directions, find a great restaurant and grab a drink before you see your favorite team or artist.

SemanticTweet - where Twitter meets the semantic web. SemanticTweet is a simple web service that generates a FOAF RDF document for you from your list of Twitter friends and followers. It does this using the Twitter REST and geonames APIs.
Create and modify custom search engines including Google AJAX Search.
XY Shop provides a price comparison facility to our customers so that they can buy the product at best online available price. XY Shop is becoming popular online shopping site around UK and Europe.
Watch the video module on the bottom-right side of all Daylife topic pages. Built using the VideoSurf API.

A podcast maker that provides easy creation of podcasts including your favorite YouTube videos. Media players and devices such as iTunes, iPods, or iPhones etc. can play the movies from podcasts subscribed by ListPod.

This map clusters POI in real-time to manage a database of over two million placenames from the US Geological Survey. Uses Spatial Databox service to provide coarse clustering, with visualization and final clustering within the client.
A Shizzow Google Maps mashup that maps all the places in a city that are tagged beer on Shizzow.
A PDF book search engine.

A map that color codes points of interest (POI) concentration. Base map has a little over two million POI. Uses Spatial Databox as back-end to delivery real-time data aggregation.
A Shizzow - Google Maps mashup that maps all the places in a city that are tagged espresso on Shizzow.

Online shopping for computers, electronics, digital cameras, books, DVDs, music, tickets, games, software, toys, and sports.

1700 US cams and 5000 worldwide. Found unprotected cams all with live thumbnails.

Sell your friends the products they already want to buy. Your store collects data about the products your friends have been viewing and creates the ideal affiliate store for you and your network of friends.

An interactive tour data base with lots of routes - bike, hike, cycle, walk, horse riding - mainly in Germany, Austria and Italy. Anyone can add his own routes and images of top spots around the world.

A dashboard on London today. A mashup of twitter messages, Flickr photos, Google Maps, and videos from YouTube.

Search engine that joins the results from Google and Yahoo using Google AJAX Search API and Yahoo BOSS API letting you to search on Google and Yahoo at the same time.

Integrates Taglets.org with Facebook to send one-line notifications when someone comments on tags you are following on Taglets.org. Provides a Taglets-enabled notes-like app for posting keyword-tagged notes.

A book navigator. Browse through tons of books while viewing their cover images. Uses Google Book Search Data and Book Viewer APIs.
A community for people to discover and share their passion for books. It provides an environment where people can collectively discuss books and share their collections with the community.

Based on the date of a special event in your life, this service announces tweets your event with a link to your Amazon wish list, allowing your Twitter followers to buy you stuff off your list to help you celebrate.
Get inspired by who s acting to help reach the Millennium Development Goals. Uses semantic APIs including Reuters Calais and uClassify. A world finalist in the 2009 Imagine Cup competition.

socialConnect is a platform that uses the Social Actions API to search Social Actions from across 50 sites and provides tools to the user to promote the Social Actions on various networks like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and Blogger.

Tagging app for OS X - uses last.fm tags to help create smart playlists by tagging in iTunes. Synchronizes between last.fm and iTunes. Works with Spotify too, and retrieves lyrics for currently playing track.

Provides image hosting and distribution. Serves your image right off Amazons S3 servers. Thumbnailninja automatically creates usable thumbnails for your images and shortened URLs for easy embedding in IM, Twitter and other services.

Add a Fast Forward button to your browser. Pressing it forwards you to the top page people visited next. It is like Amazon recommendations for webpages. We mash up attention data to figure out what is popular on the Internet.

a Twitter mashup which uses location data provided by iPhone Twitter clients.

Version 1.0
OMM provides a fast and safe solution for migrating objects and entities between Oracle E-Business Suite instances. Built for Serena Mashup Exchange.
Music information and community member communication spaces are offered this social music mashup site.
Childrens playgrounds and additional information about entertainment in Germany.

A social network where users can predict the future together by sharing information and opinions. See if the ZiiTrend community can predict the future better than any individual.

mashup: SVID - Search, See and Share Videos
description: SVid, an AOL Truveo Video mashup contest winner, lets you search, See, Share Videos: watch videos in 3D elliptical orbits; view related videos in a fractal; tag videos; drag and drop videos into your own albums.
A search engine for sports fans. Pulls in sports and team links, news, photos and videos from all over the web. Uses multiple APIs including Yahoo BOSS and AOL Video.
A handy toolbar and plug-in that automatically scans Web pages and converts all phone numbers into clickable links that initiate phone calls.
Connect to site visitors or email recipients with a simple HTML hyperlink that users click to automatically call you without revealing your real phone number.

A feeds aggregator organized by topic where posts are auto-tagged with semantic terms. Post, share via Twitter or mail, vote, bookmark and create search or semantic alerts. Add new feeds, subscribe to existing ones or submit OPML files.
Shows YouTube videos on an interactive timeline based on keywords you enter, e.g. Barack Obama or Chocolate Rain.
3Styler for Facebook lets you search for videos; send invitations to watch videos to friends; create your own video searching profile; manage playlists. Winner of AOL Video mashup contest.

Capture frames from videos found using Truveo and convert them into animated GIF files; add effects such as greyscale and flipping, add text, and translate text. Mashup contest winner built using AOL Truveo Video API.
Enables Web site visitors to leave audio comments or testimonials that can be heard by others through a nifty module that is placed on a blog or Web site.

Call any phone number in North America for free. dukaDIAL was built to demonstrate creating voice mash-ups with the Jaduka API and the Jaduka Web-initiated calling service.
Puts news headlines from Daylife in an interactive timeline, flipbook, or map view.

Interactive timelines shows the top story for each day, in each category, since the day Digg launched. All this data is organized on the Dipity timeline, list, map and flipbook views. You can also do a keyword search to find all the matching stories.

A tool that translates RSS feeds into 24 languages. Use Mloovi to generate an RSS feed in the language of your choice. Your users can subscribe to the URL and see your blog in their language when it is updated.
An alert system by mobile message and email that allows you to receive alerts when the finance feed of Yahoo changes for your specific ticker symbols.
Slick open-source Muxtape clone that uses the SoundCloud API.

SiSense provides common-sense business intelligence software that assists in visualization, analysis, dashboarding, and reporting.
An interesting mix of USCIS immigration data which shows job locations, salaries, etc. Special focus on H1B-visa jobs. Can be used to compare your salary to other people.
Mashup of TringMe and Twitter. A Phweet is a short URL that makes conversations and conference calls possible between Twitter friends.

Serena Business Mashup lets salespeople remain in Salesforce.com while being kept up-to-date regarding the status of their requests for discount approvals.

The aim is to integrate user-submitted, multimedia elements into existing news stories. In order to investigate whether the use of multiple sources gives the news story a more balanced, honest and up-to-date view of the news story.

Uses an Ajax interface to speed up Amazon.com buying decisions. It has side-by-side product comparisons, automatic currency conversions, historical sales rank and price charts, and price and sales rank email alerts.

Garage Sale Organizer is an application to map out Garage Sales in your area. Registration is required. Also features export formats in XML, GPX, and most GPS formats.
A mashup using two StrikeIron APIs, Zip Code Information and Population Demographics By ZIP Code, plus Yahoo Maps to give detailed information for a specific US zip code.
Integrates YouTube video location footage with Google Maps. Click on the map marker to see a video from that location.

Theorie M is an artistic project mixing Internet, mobile phone, movie, cartography and urban spaces. 2D codes, tagged in the town of Paris, are linked to a movie visible on a mobile phone. A Google Map localized the tags painted on the Paris sidewalks.
A Google Maps mashup of coffee houses in New York.
Subtitle inserter web tool in YouTube movies. Jimaku means subtitle in Japanese.
A map of wireless networks and their coverage in the centre of Bristol UK.
Simple mashup of random flickr user photos and a database of Creative Commons licensed sounds.

Allows you to track and plot the growth of public Flickr groups. Graphs displaying growth of a group are updated daily and can be linked from external websites. Group statistics can be syndicated via RSS ATOM feeds and exported as CVS and TSV.
A community site allowing you to share media from other social web 2.0 communities.
Interactive theme your own gangsta map using Yahoo Flash Maps and Google Video. Mashup Camp 3 contest entry.
Combines Isle of Wight road traffic information with Google Maps to provide the location and information on roadworks now and in the future.
Aa example application built using AOL tools that allows you to browse a friends feeds. AIM ID required.

Gigul8r helps musicians get their gigs online, so they can share them on Web sites, Myspace, podcasts, and printable posters. Gigul8r takes the work out of listing something online by making tour listings as easy as typing in When and Where.
Comparison shopping service. Uses the Commission Junction APIs for affiliate program integration.
Extreme and action sports videos from Google Video and YouTube. Features kitewing videos.
Get your daily dose of news, blogs, photos, discussions, bookmarks and videos related to the new iPhone by Apple.

Here is a fun little hack with MyBlogLog, the addition of del.icio.us tags. You will be able to tag your visitors and immediately see what you and others have had to say. When your readers click a tag they will see instant inline search results for users.
Keep abreast of upcoming Salesforce.com events with this integrated Google Calendar.
See Amazon music with YouTube videos. Useful site. Cleanly implemented.
View where your congressperson has traveled, how much it cost and which private interest paid for the trip. Part of the OpenSecrets.org Congressional travel database.
Integrates with RapLeaf via their API allowing users to own their reputation and take it with them where ever they may go.
Interactive golf search engine Find golf courses, golf clubs and golf buddies around the world. Golf Finder has an interactive golf map for searching.

Sophisticated online shopping service that searches the most popular online stores in one place to show buyers the true market value of products they want to buy. Over 50 trillion historical sales analyzed.
Displays Boise area real estate listings on Google Earth and Google Maps. Each listing is mapped with roof-top accuracy and the property lines are drawn.
Virtual destination guide that allows user customization, gps data upload, tagging, and searching.
Easy to use mashup for finding Free and Pay WiFi hotspots in the US. Search by address or browse by double clicking on the map. Extensive listings.
Basic mashup that combines news from and on Africa with weather info and photographs.
Astronomy and space focused mashup of Google video feeds (YouTube), del.icio.us links, Digg stories and global news.
Listing of the most popular FeedBurner feeds in France. Data as of December 2006.
Sortable listing of major crimes in Grand Rapids Michigan placed in the Google Maps interface.
Japanese YouTube player like a TV. Auto searching pop movies in Japan.

Build your own personal music video channel. Data from your Last.fm music profile to create a continuous playlist of videos from artists you listen to. Friends and neighbours feature allows influence from others.
Masup of VATSIM and Google maps to make virtual flight tracker.
Lists art in public spaces in some cities around the world. In English and Dutch.
A map pinpointing all of the music shops in and around the District of Columbia.

Mashup of ClearForest and Google Calendar. It places an unobtrusive icon at the top of each day. Click icon for snapshot of people, companies, products and locations in the news. You can drill down to the original news article.

Find the connection or six-degrees of separation between topics. Mashes RSS feeds with the ClearForest API. Offers REST and SOAP interfaces so you can build on top of it. All connections exposed through RDF so you can to build the Semantic Web.
MetaWeather is an automated weather data aggregator that take the weather predictions from various forecasters and calculates the most likely outcome.
Hungarian Real Estate listings with Google Maps.
This word list is updated throughout the day. By viewing the tags, it gives you an idea of what is going on in the world. Think of it as the News Headlines but shorter

An elegant interface combined with a simple focus on one thing. Who is hot today. Hype-list finds the people within entertainment, business and sports news and presents the hot names in an appealing and functionally simple interface.
Use this mashup to turn your Pocket PC into a remote control to search through the Rhapsody catalog, queue up songs and control the Rhapsody client software all from a WiFi connected handheld.
Track and make eBay bids without opening your browser. Streamlines the auction process, searching, list management, and alerting. Also integrates with buySAFE to show if seller is bonded with them.
Each state has a link to an individual page that displays the 7 wonders on a map. An overview page for the whole Unites States is provided. Each entry has link to appropriate Wikipedia entry.
The FlickIt web service lets you dynamically generate thumbnails of anything.
Map of Reformed Presbyterian churches in North America.

Travel Tassie allows you to plan and book your Tasmania-Australia travel requirements. For those of us who cannot decide where to go and stay, or are unsure as to what is available use the Trip Builder to suggest a unique trip.
Combining eBay motors with Google Maps UK to allow users to visually locate where cars are based.

Power RSS is an RSS aggregator, which enables you to classify content in the article. The Power RSS will skim through the article and pick out the relevant articles, by analysing your interest categories.

Uses the Amazon API to esily find covers and sleeves for music, books, dvds and games. The search capability is extended with an option to search for multiple items in one go, by inputting terms as a list.

Mugshot keeps track of what you and your friends are doing on the web in one easy location. Includes a free desktop client and embed for third party sites. Supports all the major social media services with more being added every day.
Browse open webcams of the world on a Google Map.
A mashup to help consumers locate a Nintendo Wii. Provides retail addresses, locations, shipment dates, and local ebay auctions
SAP application for Zone optimization using MapPoint 2006 and Virtual Earth 3D. This link goes to a Microsoft blog post with video showing more about the application.

Exit 39 takes datefeeds from merchants with affiliate programs and allows webmasters to create targeted product ads where the webmaster receives 100 percent of the commissions from sales generated from the ads.
A window on the lives of Bristol folk, exploring quite literally the locations where people Live, Work, and Play, mapping the triangle of their lives across the city.
Service for rating professors on campus. Now integrates with your Facebook details and friends. See which profs tend to give As and which give Fs.
Custom homepage builder that uses Ajax to let a user layout and customize a page with relevant information. Includes pre-built modules for Flickr, YouTube, Amazon and hundreds of other popular sites.
The Topicalizer now sports yet another function called Semantic Web Creator, which builds a web of related terms for a given term by making use of the Google API und Wikipedia.

Tagbulb simplifies tag search by aggregating content from various sources like Flickr, YouTube and many more. Users can browse by content type like images, videos, blogs, bookmarks, podcasts, products, books etc.
Westin Hotel promotion using geotagged images and sounds featuring tourist spots in major US cities.
Loads news feeds, extracts meaningful terms and searches for related news, blog and discussion pages. Allows the user to browse the news by articles or by entities.

Save time and keep up on the latest Web 2.0 news right from one browser toolbar. The Free Web 2.0 Toolbar aggregates the best of Social Search, Social Bookmarking, Social Pics, Social Video and Social News websites.
This is a bookmarklet which submits the current URL in your browser and checks it against the PhishTank database.

AdWords Management for the rest of us. Automatically monitors and adjusts pricing so that AdWords campaigns have better results, meaning, more sales and lower cost. It runs automatically so that customers do not even need to log in.
An online shopping community where users contribute, discuss, and rate deals found online and get paid for their contributions.

The Sun Labs Snapp Radio is a mashup of Radio Paradise, last.fm and Flickr. When you listen to music from Radio Paradise or last.fm, Snapp Radio will collect images from Flickr that are related to the music and display them as a slide show.

Moodgeist is an experiment to show what is currently happening in the Skype Land and the Skype community collective state of mind. It tracks the text that Skype Users put in their mood. From this it extracts YouTube URLs and shows them.
Hyper Search, a experimental web query engine. Seeks to use intelligence based not only on keywords but also by extracting the appropriate types of information from the resulting pages.
Mashup using AOL Video, Google Video and Flickr API.
Netzwelt.de is a German online magazine. They mashed up free and legal promo MP3s on the net with Upcoming.org tour dates, Amazon CD reviews, YouTube videos and akuma MP3 download store.
Image catalog of every known baseball carte de visite format photograph using Google Maps.

View thousands of flickr photos while navigating a Google map. Fotoland allows users to create tags on the map and then imports photos that are associated with these tags from flickr. Very feature rich.
Search local auctions and classified listings (craigslist) and see where they are located on a map view.

Allows anyone to create heat maps they can embed in their website in one line of code. The user can either define the data by painting markers onto a map, or by pasting in their latitude, longitude, rating data.
Findmesomewifi uses Google Maps to display the locations of wifi hotspots, wordwide. Many sources listed via large database.

Send Me a Pic allows users to search Flickr images and create a customized image that is personalized for any mobile phone. Custom images can be text messaged to user s phones by simply entering the phone number.

mashup: Worst Places to Take a Dump
description: Map of some of the worst bathrooms in New York City, with photos.

A social bookmarking network for recommending websites, services, products, videos, music playlists and rss feeds. The site adds content from YouTube, Yahoo Videos, Faces, Amazon.com and other services when appropriate.
Blinksale is an online invoicing service with an API. It is also a mashup that uses the Basecamp API to integrate client data.
Your one stop shop for all of the latest and greatest bLaugh.com comics: most recent list, system tray menu, comic viewer and desktop wallpaper. Windows only.
Make your 30 Boxes or Google Calendar talk.

From the Well Connected project at The Center for Public Integrity, the Media Tracker is an online database that, aside from mapping broadcast towers, provides an array of data on the reach and influence of companies that control the flow of information.
Australian news stories plotted on maps. Uses the MetaCarta API to extract place names.
EventMaps is an Event Calendar listing of events in and around southeast Michigan.

Rrove lets you keep, share and discover places. Save addresses so you can easily revisit them. Make your locations public, write reviews and create sets for your friends. Find new and interesting places recommended by others.
Google Map mashup for tracking places and things of interest in the UAE.

Heat maps of mashed up traffic congestion statistics from the Bureau of Transportation Statistics with Google Maps and GeoIQ. The heat maps shows where the traffic congestion is and the score tells how concentrated traffic congestion for two cities.

A free, browsable database of Houston crimes. Crimes may be viewed by offense, date, neighborhood, police district and beat, zip code, and political district. Uses Google Maps and Houston-area GIS data.
Rapidly create a sig and display recently played music on Myspace or your own website using your Rhapsody Listening History RSS Feed information.
Vibely is an online social street guide developed to bring friends together, announce featured events in the area, and help people in their localities meet up.
Optrata.com mashes up your profiles from all over the web. Displaying your latest updates from all of your different accounts on one easy page.
Get real time Bay Area traffic from 511.org. Simply use the search keyword 511 and provide the freeway. This service can be accessed using SMS, WAP and EMail.
Barebones interface for finding Indian restaurants.

mashup: NY vs SF Census Heat Map
description: Compare demographic information analyzing property values, population, education, income level and more with integrated Yahoo Local search points. Data Limited to NY and SF.
Game that gives you a dozen HotOrNot photos of women or men and you have to guess their age or their score. After that you can meet them if you like.
A rich, dynamic mashup of Australian real estate websites onto the virtual earth map. Users can store favourites, and view full property details using lightboxes.

The maps on this site show the location and details of thousands of earthquakes. Specific maps have been created for regions where there is substantial earthquake activity, including New Zealand, North America, South America, East Asia and Australia.

Shows off the new features of Virtual Earth 3D. Users search for, or load via GeoRSS, interesting views within Virtual Earth 3D and then share them out via E-mail links. The first live application using the VE 3D map control.
Specify an area and locate golf courses on a Map.
Type an address and see current traffic conditions on a map.
View random profiles by gender from HotOrNot.com with this Windows Live gadget.
Allows people to communicate with other Skype users without the need to know their language, translates in real-time, and speaks your chats as well.
Save bookmarks and tag them. Vote bookmarks, comment and discuss. Make new friends and share your favorite tv caps, video clips and screen captures.
Use of Google Maps on the campaign trail. NJ congressional candidate Paul Aronsohn uses this map to show to local towns visited, 51, and doors knocked, 4354.
Search for all things Citrix.
Use this Windows Live gadget to browse photos in photo albums on Windows Live Spaces. Just specify the name of the space. You can also browse photo albums from randomly selected spaces.
A social network aggregator that lets you see what is happening in all your networks like Facebook, Friendster, Hi5, LinkedIn, and MySpace in one place. Uses the Dapper API.
Crime Tracker makes public crime data of Sacramento easy to access. Enter your address and you see all the crimes in your neighborhood over the past three months.
A Feed to SIOC RDF conversion tool. Can input Atom, RDF and RSS feeds.

Outdoor Vancouver is a guide to sports and recreation in Vancouver BC and the surrounding area. Find club listings, articles, trails, photos, maps and more covering a wide variety of activities such as hiking, mountain biking, climbing and skiing.
Google Search in 2 separate languages. Also, as an option, Babelplex can automatically translate your query.
A site that will automatically determine your net worth. Real estate valuations based on Zillow.
Get a geographical location of a given IP and display it on the Google Maps.
Your sexy search assistant. Flash based interface as experiment via Windows Live Search.
Fundoo Web is a mashup search tool to retrieve information from several sources at once: Flickr, Yahoo Answers, Yahoo Search and others.
Simply reports the PageRank of a URL.
Location-based task management. To-do list product Remember the Milk now allows you to plot your tasks on Google Maps. Nicely customized.

Map Compare allows you to evaluate which mapping service is best. All three maps are locked together so panning, zooming and changing map types will effect all maps the same. You can also use the tab pane to try out various map features.
Amazon Prime search engine. Search Amazon for only those products that qualify for Prime or SuperSaver shipping.
Take to the skies as an eagle soaring over this slick interface to Google maps. Circle under clouds to catch thermals.
Maps the addresses of your Windows Live Contacts from Messenger, Mail, etc., using Virtual Earth
Geotag your Flickr photos using Google Maps. Tries to do as much as possible client side, so that server round trips are eliminated or reduced where possible leading to a more responsive feel.
Compare prices from stores and with Ebay. Shoppers can also suggest gifts to others and get RSS feeds to keep up with price changes.
The random day out generator. Pick where and the types of things you like to do. Watch it build your itinerary for the day.
999 Search provides a meta search engine. It aggregates results from Google, Windows Live Search, Yahoo Search.

GEOPESCO roughly translating to Where I Fish. A social experiment for anglers all over the world. Using the Google Map API to precisely pinpoint their fishing reports, allows recreational anglers to share and discover.
Uses Live Search linkfromdomain and site operators to find the intersections of two sites, say most digged pages on youtube, or most metafiltered pages on NPR.
QuickyWiki blends the depth of Wikipedia with the ease and speed of Cliffs Notes. QuickyWiki extracts focused bits and pieces of lengthy Wikipedia articles.
A simple real estate mashup.
News aggregator with friendly keyboard shortcuts.
Mashup of NFL team stadiums. Combines team schedules, scores, news, and photos.
Location based service, where you can find maps and places like restaurants, bars and movie theater with show times for Brazilian cities
The First MMO Real Time Strategy on Google Maps. Take over the world in this real time Risk-like game based on Google Maps.

Over 500 new home communities in greater Phoenix Arizona, by over 50 new home builders mapped. New home buyers can see all communities in a single page, and get brief info on each community. Popup also allows users to visit the specific community URL.
Uses Amazon and Google APIs to track the success of the competing next-generation game systems: XBox 360, Wii, and PS3.
Quickly Create Zazzle products from any image found on the web.
A social network for people to gather and show their support for the NSPCC.
Restaurant guide initially limited to Philadelphia area.
Search for videos from across the web with this rich application built on the AOL video search API
Music video viewer for Last.fm users. The music video can be seen from the chart of Last.fm very easily.
Plots the location of upcoming Grand Prix races, taken from Google Calendar, on a map.
Ultimate Frisbee tournaments, pickup games, and more.
shopping.com and eBay comparison shopping mashup. Price comparison with shopping.com as general listings and comparable eBay listings. Additionally eBay auctions.
Mashup of GoogleMaps, YouTube and Flickr.
Map of breaking news in New York City. Constantly updated.

mashup: Greater Cambridge Area High Tech Cluster
description: Mashup of the CIR database of high tech tier one companies in the Greater Cambridge area with Google Maps API.
View popular deal threads from FatWallet and SlickDeals forums in a form of a tag cloud. More popular threads have larger tags.

The Album Cloud is like a tag cloud but uses images instead of text. It takes your top played albums and sizes each cover based on the number of plays. It includes links to similar users and can be embedded in other sites.
Gainers Losers (Movers Shakers) - website traffic comparison in 201 countries. Uses proprietary algorithm to find steady growth in number of unique visitors over 1-year and 5-year periods. Useful.
Search eBay listings and see location results plotted on Google Maps.
This is an online game. Visitors add words to the sentence which is to be continued. The words added can be clicked and tag search results from Flickr and YouTube are shown.
A place where users share their fishing experience with others, whether your fish is a trophy bass or a tiny minnow. So go ahead and add your fish to the map.
Yahoo Widget that searches the Amazon products database based on product name and category.
Recommendations channel on Passado is a new feature that allows users to pick their favourite Books, Films and Music, write reviews, read reviews and even buy items online. Integrates with Amazon.
Spirit And Place Event Locator. A mashup using Microsoft Virtual Earth and ASP.NET AJAX framework. This is based on some of the initial constructs by Jonathan Hawkins.
10,300 Starbucks Coffee locations from across the world
Page Six meets Google Maps. Track celebrity sightings in NYC with this map or if you have seen a star around town you can submit your sighting of A-listers.
Christian Colleges and Universities endorsed by Lakeview Church of Christ.
Vote and submit the funniest videos from any of the major video sites: YouTube, Google, Break, Metacafe, etc.

Grupthink allows anyone to explore open-ended topics and questions with everyone, and allows everyone to add answers or vote on existing answers. When that answer is a book, music, or movie, buy it directly via Amazon.
Takes normal Google search results, makes sure the pages exist and have your search terms on them, and shows you a preview when you hover the mouse. Uses a secure Java applet.
Mashup of Google Maps and more than 20000 hotels and motels in the USA.
hypediss.com is an entertaining remix of news and style aggregation and public taste battles and social networking. It is all about opinion.

Musiclocated is the place where music gets located. It is a personal, non-corporative project that intends to geolocate musicians, musical places and more. The main goal is to provide a tool for musicians to allow them finding other musicians nearby.
Sample application demonstrating the Google Ajax Search API.
Golf Course finder with street and satellite maps. Also lists green fees, dress code, and other relevant information.
This webapp for bloggers to create content-rich blog posts. Type in keywords, select content, and it returns the HTML. Returns relevant data from Flickr, Yahoo Maps, Amazon and others.
A do-it-yourself website creation and hosting service designed to enable users to easily create sites using web services such as Blogger, Flickr, YouTube, Del.icio.us and BlueDot.
Searchable listings of apartments and homes in major US cities displayed on Yahoo maps.

Bring digg.com v3 directly on your desktop. Browse all the topics and categories. Share news with friends or watch your digg news in a slideshow which is personalized news based on your favorite topics.
Takes your 25 most frequently used tags from Bluedot, and shows you related blog articles, as provided by Findory. Firefox only.

We have just started a new mashup of small business and home worker resources in Calgary, Canada. Our mashup is combining the maps with Google Calendar for conferences, events and shows about small business in Calgary.
Mashup of Flickr, YouTube and Amazon. Find photos, movies, items of Japanese anime, comics and games.
Bikramfinder is just what the traveling yogi needs: Bikram hot yoga studio locations and reviews. It s a valuable travel companion when you re in a new city and want to practice with the locals.

This gadget allows adding a graph for ZIndex, which is derived from median prices of homes sold, for a specific location such as All of the USA, any state, any city or zip code. It can be added to the Personalized Google Homepage, Desktop and Pages.
A community based Google Map for finding the best gas prices in the San Jose, CA area.
Carbon Emissions Map for UK showing emissions down to square km level. Source of emissions is also shown. A simple emission reduction todo list for individuals and communites is included.

A combination of eBay motors, mobile.de and Kijiji search results within an area around a specified postal code. By click on the map button GoogleMaps with your location as fixed point is displayed and the cars location as second point.
Rich mashup that brings back the good old days of music album liner notes, bio, and other background for what you listen to. Builds on last.fm, Flickr, Amazon, MusicBrainz, and Wikipedia.
News aggregation service with geocoding for regionalization. Includes finance, sports and other topics.
Uses the eBay API to create a very quick and easy way to list things on eBay.
Displays current traffic speeds along major freeways throughout California.
Check out Creative Commons licensed photographs from Flickr. Find Photos by their colors and rrate them.
Matches music reviews on Pitchforkmedia.com with Rhapsody Playback and Discovery. You can hear content from the latest reviews, or go back and peruse over 2000 past reviews.
Search interface to Flickr for finding photos by location. Photos can be displayed in a gallery view or on a Google Map.
Rentalio is helps you find for vacation rentals. It is mash-up of Vast.com API with ambition to extend it to other useful sources of information for its users.
Real Estate map search tool.
Take a peek at what others are watching on the top video sites.
A Google Maps app on the 7 wonders of the world with Quick-Zoom functionality. Ancient, the Medieval World, Modern Wonders, Natural Wonders and Underwater Wonders.
Mashup of US National Weather Service data and Google Maps.
Locate and book UK airport hotels with this mashup.
Sprenzy is a new comparison shopping site with millions of products and reviews from thousands of stores. Built on Shopping.com API. Sprenzy is not a store and does not sell any products.
terra IMS has a gallery of map mashups based on the Google Maps API. Various mashups including Oregon DMV Locations, Real-Time Earthquakes, World GDP, World Leaders Map and US Senators Map.
flickrmeets is for matching events to photos to places. A place to add members to groups and easily set up a place to keep your events together.
Track the latest hurricane on a Google Map: forecasts, observed tracks, refinery and oil rig positions.
The Cloud Search is a tag cloud meta search tool using Google Search API.
Historical and modern tourist attractions, nature reserves and points of interest on Romney Marsh, UK.
Top-1o style lists of cross-referenced songs, artists, albums, films, actors, directors and reviews. Searchable and available to buy online via Amazon and eBay.

Spleak is an Instant Messenger based Chatbot as a fun and cool virtual girl. You can chat with her all day long on MSN Messenger. She plays games. She makes jokes. She can give you all kinds of information. Add spleak homtail.com as a MSN buddy to try.
See the top 10 items in various retail charts, and purchase them via a link. The page content is customizable on a per-user basis.
Based on Kieden, this combination allows Salesforce.com customers to manage the entire Google AdWords process from creating ads, placing bids, through to tracking ROI.
The Buzz is a no-nonsense, user-review driven web site that does not require registration or need complex searches to find what you want, you just click, read, compare and purchase.
Maps out the UK rail stations providing FastTicket locations, TIPLOCS, STANNOXs and many other related details.

This blog attempts to follow handbag fashion and also report the growing number of handbag thefts across the UK, and hopefully other countries in time. Everyone knows at least one person who has had their bag stolen out in a restaurant, bar, pub or club.
Search and browse through NYC parking garages to find the best prices.
Guide to all 156 beaches in Sydney Australia using Google Maps.
Graphs a blogs popularity over time. The popularity statistics are gathered from Technorati using the Dapper service.
Mashup that aggregates movies from various video sites including YouTube, MetaCafe, Veoh and MySpace.
See where your Facebook friends are from.
Free streaming radio from the Golden State. Uses clustered map markers.
Bumpr is a free service storing track logs from your GPS device and rendering those track logs as time-based Google Maps for you to share.

KMaps provides one view across location aware content. Whether you are On the Go or sitting by your desktop, you can now access Location Services and view Location Aware Content from both KMaps enabled phone and your desktop browser. This is the first ste
Maps and descriptions of trails for hiking and biking in the US. User contributed content.
Plots flickr photos on a Google Map by geocoding the city name.
Combines TV schedules for 50 channels in 6 time zones with IMDB, Amazon and Wiki data. Uses the SIMILE Timeline API to render TV listings visually.
Real estate website using Google Maps to help people list For Sale By Owner, FSBO, homes for sale.

Siam Soundtrek is working to preserve the heritage sites of Old Bangkok. To draw awareness they have established a Google Maps mashup on their website and samples of their Mp3 tour through the heart of the old city can be downloaded right from the map.

Free ad-supported web service for publishers that highlights words on a site using Ontok UrlInfo API backend. When users mouseover the inserted links, they see ads and search results from other APIs like Amazon, ebay, Shopping.com, Adsense, and Yahoo.

RouteSlip.com is a new website for cycling enthusiasts. You can map out your favorite rides, print out route slips, create elevation profiles for your rides, manage your training log, and interact with other cyclists.
Thinglink.org is an open database where makers can register their work for free and create labels for their products. Here are pictures of objects registered with thinglink and thingtagged on Flickr.
geoTract.com provides a central commonplace to share experiences and interests in the form of maps mashed with chatting, blogs, friends lists, favorites lists, and general locations.
Browse flickr photos by the camera model they were taken with. Interesting idea.
Bumble Search is a Firefox extension that mashes up the Web by integrating content from Amazon, BBC, del.icio.us, eBay and other sources.
A modular, tabbed interface Ajax application, supporting a growing number of custom plug-ins.
Map mashup showing all the locations from the Da Vinci Code book and movie including the Rose line.
Displays the hometowns of the Tanglewood Music Centers 157 fellows, who come from 18 contries and 5 continents. Options include viewing by instrument field of study, or entire class plotted at once.
Use this movie mashup to learn about points of cultural, historical, and criminal interest in Miami.

Map application for the 64 member sites in 8 countries in the Americas, classified according their importance to shorebirds. Sites are mostly estuaries, beach complexes, intertidal areas, salinas and salt lakes.

FrenSync.com is a platform for users, the frens, to collaborate and disseminate information readily using maps,photos,tags and videos. It provides many features such as SnapShots and SyncLinks to allow users to share through personal blogs and websites.
Collection of indie rock videos from YouTube. With corresponding links into Last.fm music.
Google Map of Boston T with search.
This mashup was banned by the French courts. Greenpeace created this to show where Monsanto was genetic engineering maize. This link takes you to the Greenpeace report and the mashup.

NOTE: Jan 2007, this site seems to need a password to access. A Google Maps mashup focused on the Middle East conflict. Use the map or chat rooms for information or check the last agency News and have a look at the Conflict Map.
RockstarApps allows users to create an share interactive maps through a simple to user desktop style application.
UK local search engine.
Provides landlords free advertising of their rental properties.
