A new travel community where you can add your favourite spot and share it with others. Moderated to ensure quality. Includes over 20000 hotels.

Shazou FireFox extension that mashes up Google Maps and MaxMind GeoIP API. Shazou was developed as a tool to improve the awareness for people surfing the internet about where and who they are interacting with every click of the mouse.
A WebGIS application for integrating, visualizing and analyzing seismic data. It also shows the strongest earthquakes of the last day, week, month, year in the world and Greece.
Search fatal crashes by zip code, driving directions, custom drawn polygons on Google Maps. Search results include crash details.
Mangez Mangez is a social networking website dedicated to sharing information about local restaurants. Rate and review restaurants, share your favorites, track. Allows easy mapping of restaurants.
SCANBUY Shopper is a Shopping Assistant for your mobile phone. The application allows the user to search for online offers while in a store using the barcodes barcode on the products.
Enter a word, and Google Images will spell it.

Free online tools for gathering, sorting, presenting and digesting of scientifically oriented information. Interface for PubMed searches, MeshTree, interface to nutritional database, news- imagesearches, feeds, clipboards and QueryMaker.
Using mashups to reach new heights, or new lows, in security. Uses HotOrNot pictures to create a visual captcha system. Prove you are a human. 2nd place winner at Mashup Camp 2.
W. Quotes from our fearless leader. A new MSN Messenger robot.
The site integrates CraigsList real estate data with GoogleMaps for major cities around the U.S. Can filter by photos, show area schools and has a NY subway map overlay.
Shows 76 Changwats in 6 zones of Thailand. Provides information in Thai.
Social bookmarking site for recipes with mapping interface.
Global amusement and theme park search. Extensive database of parks with browsable map interface.

Fireisland.com uses the Flickr API to pull images based on submitted tags. We use this system to pull relevant pictures based on Tags that are associated with Fire Island New York a popular New York beach vacation spot.
Map based site that lets users add a listing and pinpoint the exact location a pet was lost or found.
Nice interactive map of the Berlin Metro System.
Maps Washington DC data and statistics including boundaries, service requests and crimes.
Book finding service using z3950 library information and Amazon web services.

Named after New York s East 41st Street, Library Way, E41ST provides an integrated interface for Browsing. At Amazon, and looking up at your Public Library. Winner of Adobe Flex Developer Derby in Mashup category.

A movie review mash-up. Combines data and services from Amazon, del.icio.us, TRYNT and Yahoo. In addition to the listed public web services a number of feeds are also consumed from Cinema Blend, Movie Web, Movies, Netflix, and Rotten Tomatoes and Yahoo.
Example mashup of google spreadsheets, taking amazon book results and creating a new spreadsheet through the python api.
Google Map of CowParade sculpture photography in Boston. Community-driven.
All 2 million of the USGS datapoints are mapped out in paged results. Over 60 different types of locations including lakes, rivers, craters, glaciers for all 50 States.
An International News Map built with the Microsoft Virtual Earth API. Click on any region on the map and national news for the country is loaded.
Commercial service that allows you to deliver your services and expertise over Skype-based calls. Provides call initiation, billing and management.
Select a Washington DC police precinct and get recent crimes plotted on a Google Map.
A collection of elongated pennies mapped.
Mashup of Google Maps and YouTube videos.

Golf Bonk is a mashup that lets you access a variety of golf course information on a Google map. Use the map to visually locate courses in your area. Many of the courses listed on Golf Bonk have high resolution imagery. You can annotate them as well.

Providing the ability for the Outdoor Community to journal, map, and share their outdoor activities with one another. Journal Entries are organized by most popular, most recent, activity, and are full text searchable. GPX and KML support are provided.
Google Maps, Yahoo Local Maps, and Windows Live Local all in one location. Search for businesses, get directions, explore and discover using patented lensing technology from IDELIX.
Find movie times, compare them quickly between theaters, all on top of an interactive map-based interface. Purchase tickets at many of the theaters listed.
Map shows where dozens of distinct Birds and Mammals have been spotted in the Village of Northwood on the Isle of Wight, UK.
Craigslist Housing plus GoogleMaps mashup for Honolulu, and other cities.
Browse the most popular news stories by category using Yahoo Maps.

tourb.us is a social search site for live music. Track your favorite bands, via email, RSS, iCal, get reminders before concerts, find tonight s shows in your city, import favorites bands from iTunes and Last.fm, post reviews and photos of shows.
A map of proposed and existing windfarms in New Zealand.
BackLinkr lets you easily show who is linking to your site.
Search 97,000 MLS listings in the United States.
Google Maps in ASCII characters. Very retro, very creative mashup.
Search YouTube videos through this Japanese search interface.
Use this service to obtain all the lottery results for the current date. This service is available accross all the US states. Just send the state code and get all the latest results back.

Import your MySpace friends into TagTooga, organize them in to groups, re-export to create custom friend spaces for your MySpace profile or blog. You may also create a friendroll for your blog or website.

PhoneBackr is a mashup that acts like a searchable reverse telephone directory. PhoneBackr simulates the functions of a reverse telephone directory using search data and various APIs. The results are then rendered on a Yahoo Flash Map.
Mobile-optimised version of Upcoming.org allows quick searching of events,venues metros. Where available, small maps of the venue is displayed using yahoo maps.
News Fino is a popularity based news ranking system. Each hour News Fino identifies the most popular breaking news, business news, entertainment news, sports news, technology news and political news.
WM 2006 Information Mashup with all WM cities and countries and additional data. There are also all official team news and cup news viewed which are available via RSS.
TagBrowsr allows an alternate way of browsing Flickr photos by combining and viewing tags, sets, pools and user information.
Muscle car fans can find the cars they want via this good eBay and Google Maps mashup. If you need that rare Shelby this is the way to find it.
NZFlats.co.nz uses the Zoomin API to Mashup rental New Zealand property listings on the Zoomin mapping system.
A mashup of the 3,000 Tim Hortons locations across United States and Canada.
Allows you to plot multiple Yahoo Services, in multiple categories, on a Yahoo Flash map.
Patients awaiting hospital admission in Irish hospitals. Figures are from April 2005 to April 2006. Google maps used for 35 hospital locations in Ireland, Ruby on Rails for development.
Watch the housing bubble deflate in SF and Silicon Valley. Charts, map, median prices. Timeline of prices over time. Housing data from SF Gate. Great mashup.
DrawDoc makes links about each important keyword found by Yahoo Term Extraction to result of Wikipedia or Yahoo or Google and show pictures which are related to the keywords.
Interesting community-based project to map the chemistry and quality of UK tapwater to provide an interactive map for fishkeepers to learn how safe their water is.
A mashup service designed to increase AdSense revenues. Alternate URL Ads replaces non-paying PSAs with paying contextual geo-targetted ads.
Enter a area code and exchange in order to get that location mapped. Good utility mashup.
Carte de la circulation au Quebec par le groupe de geo-informatique quebucois Poly9. Les donnes utilisees sur ce site proviennent du Ministere des transports du Quebec.
Guide to the best underground destinations in Melbourne Australia.
Japaneses antiques and interiors shop guide map.

Connecting a million popular culture dots via the Amazon API. Describe two items and see how they re linked by consumer preference via intermediate items. Choose from books, CDs, or films, and you can mix and match.
NewsBlade builds Business Intelligence Portals for vertical industries and companies. Our first portal is BioTech and Pharma.
French Guide for seasonal hiring. European holidays in lodgings.

Get todays match schedule and scorecard for the World Cup. If no matches are scheduled for the day, then the schedule for the next matches will be returned back. The response will have the time and date for the match along with the Group. SMS, WAP, email.
This Google map is meant to enable organizations scheduling events during the torture awareness month to easily share informations on this map.

mashup: Find WiFi Hotspots by Cell Phone
description: Wi-Fi Hotspot Locator finds the closest Wi-Fi hotspots in a given location. You are closer to the internet then you realize, we just help you get connected. SMS, WAP and email.
If someone calls you pulchritudinous, how do you know if you should be flattered or offended. Get the definition of any English word. SMS, email, WAP.
Use the most popular Korean search engine Naver layed-out like Google.
A portal for casual games related to online shopping in general and shopping, primarily via Amazon.com. Second place winner in 2006 Amazon developer contest. Requires Windows download.
Belgian search engine, in French, based on Google API, Yahoo API, Gigablast XML, MSN RSS and others.

Champagne Houses listed alphabetically and by Champagne-Ardenne sub-region of France. Provides offical websites for the Champagne houses as well as their postal addresses and locations on an interactive map.
A toy that analyses song lyrics and poetry to create a mosaic of appropriate photos. IE only.

Google map of North Carolina with icons for each State Park that link to the official home page and a query into the Dept of State Parks events database. Built for a non-profit supporting the State Parks of North Carolina.

Camraoke is a place where everybody can view and vote their favorite webcam-karaoke video from YouTube. Members can submit and vote new videos to bring them to the frontpage by clicking the Boost Button .
Display of all airports where incidents of pet losses, injuries or deaths have been reported. Clicking on an airport displays a listing incidents with access to the details.
Frisbee Mashup newes photos, events, movies, bookmarks and special feeds are published on five pages, frisbee, dog frisbee, disc golf, ultimate and freestyle.
A dyanamic collection of celebrity photo galleries. Data comes from Yahoo Image Search and Yahoo Search.
World map of video blogs -- vlogs -- and video podcasts -- vidcasts.
floverview gives you a comprehensive one-page view of any Flickr member.
The DVD Wars fought on Amazon. See the battle between Blu-ray vs. HD DVD nicely charted and tracked on this Amazon API app. See which has more available. See which costs more.
Google Map and Yahoo Search News items for country clicked on.
Analysis of search engine position. Uses Google, Alexa, Yahoo, MSN and Hostip.info APIs. Also analyses page code for search engine optimization.
Two command-line shells, one for Java, jSh3ll, and one for C , for managing your Amazon S3 objects.
Six Degrees of Amazon recommended products. Complete missions like Find your way from DeWalt drill to the book American Psycho. Least hops or money spent earns a spot on the highscore. Fun game.
An experimental feed discovery tool.
A social bookmarking search mashup. Allows users to query the various social bookmarking web applications by URL Search and Tag Search.
Get a list of latest new releases from AOL Music on your cell phones SMS, WAP, email.
Mashup for finding celebrity videos. Uses tags from TagTooga with videos from YouTube, Google Video or Grouper.
Get the latest Jobs search updates from Jobster on your cell phone: SMS, Email and WAP. Search for jobs by providing a keyword and location and get results back.

The jSh3ll is a Java based command shell for managing your Amazon S3 objects.It is built upon the Amazon S3 REST Java library and uses modified source code from the Amazon S3Shell. jSh3ll is opensource and runs on Java 5.
Search the web from your mobile phone using the 411Sync WAP Interface.
A Mashup of Google Maps, Geonames and Jobserve RSS feeds. Plot UK IT contracts made available within the last 24 hours. Search by region, keyword, skill. Click on the map to display the jobs. Beta.
Allows you to find your contacts on Flickr in bulk by uploading your address book, and showing any email addresses that match Flickr users.
Get driving directions on your iPod Video, Nano or Photo. Enter starting and ending address, verify, then export. Supports Mac and Windows.

A quick and easy way to find out distance between two locations from a cell phones: SMS, Email or WAP. This mashup uses Yahoo Geocoding API to compute the lat-lon values of locations based on area codes.
Lovento uses Google Maps and AJAX requests to show venues, filtered by tags or venue type.
Use this service to obtain celebrity photos on WAP cell phones. This service has been implemented using the Yahoo Image Search API and the 411Sync Mobile API
Ultimate Homepage is a chronologic aggregator that shows incoming headlines from selected websites like Digg.Com, Slashdot, Wired and Reddit.
Movie Spoiler website combining trailers from YouTube and DVD-Soundtracks from Amazon.
Use this service to obtain comparison shopping information on your cell phone via SMS, WAP and Email. This mashup integrates the RSS feeds from Nextag with the 411Sync Mobile API.

The blueorganizer is the smart browser extension for Firefox. With this organizer the web turns into everyday objects like books, cars, restaurants and movies. Collect things with 1 click, find new information and share what you find with your friends.
For Sale By Owner real estate service. Includes sale, lease and commercial properties. Map based search option.
Julian Bond maps his Skype contacts. Site includes useful commentary on how the map was programmed.
95 percent of UK residential property for sale or to let are listed on this service.
Get Business News headlines for a specific company on your cell phone: SMS, Email, WAP. This uses the RSS feed from Yahoo Finance and integrates with the 411Sync Mobile API.
Kelley Direct Business School alumni statistics map could tell the world where our alumni come from and how many are at each country and US states.
Click on the photo of celebrities like Anna Kournikova, Jeff Bridges and Alex Rodriguez to his or her favorite restaurants, hotels, parks, concert venues, and museums in the cities they call home.
This is an eSideWALK member that has built a mashup using the web services API supplied by eSideWALK.
Support Ticket add-on for Basecamp project management.
Directory of sites where you can buy gourmet food online. Uses Amazon Alexa exclusively, no data is stored on the web server.

This is a mashup of Google Calendar and Rhapsody. In other words, its a fancy Javascript Alarm Clock. It will read your Google Calendar for specially formatted calendar events and when the time comes it plays the track specified. v1 is FireFox only.

The first stock market for buzz-words: words that appear in the news are quoted in real time based on their presence in 3000 news sources based on Yahoo News API. Trendio.com gives an instant picture of what topics are in and which are out.
Tool for placing eBay ads on blogs or web sites to display a customized list of items and earn money. Two steps: Join ebay affiliate program then copy and paste the code into your blog or web page.
Uses the HotOrNot API to find girls and guys in your by location.
Using this service, you can obtain photos from Flickr, either by userid or a tag search, on your handheld device. Your handheld device can be a WAP enabled phone or an IPAQ, Palm etc.

A new site which uses the eBay API to meet the needs of users that feel that eBay has become increasingly over-featured. The site provides a highly simplified view of eBay and only displays eBay listings which are auctions ending in the next 24 hours.
A Windows desktop application for viewing, uploading, modifying, and downloading Amazon S3 objects. Available as source or binary.
Context-ize is a tagging experient that works with del.icio.us and flickr. Sometimes gets intereting results and but sometimes does not find any matches.
Use this service to determine the latest status of your UPS and USPS package from cell phone. Check status using SMS, EMail or WAP. This service has been implemented using 411Sync Mobile API.
Browse world wide HotOrNot users on this Google Map. NOTE: as of March 30 2007 appears to be dead.
See recent hacker attacks on this map coded from a blockhosts script which record sshd or proftpd processes are attacked. IP is reversed with GeoIP Lite.
This is a Google Maps mashup displaying major nuclear and non-military accidents and disasters.
Use this service to obtain a list of happening venues in the Bay Area on Cell phones: SMS, WAP and email.
Use this service to obtain top stories from Moreover on your cell phone: SMS, email, WAP.

Karmadu allows you to give karma points as thanks for good things that others do for you. You can see how your karma score compares to others. You can also send points or browse a map of who has them.
This tiny mashup combines the functionality of Topicalizer with the Google Search API in order to find documents that are similar to a document or text regarding their content.
ZabboWabbo gleans from more than 10 sources for your search to potentially provide broader and more useful results.
The Bowling Green Kentucky Daily News uses Google Maps to plot advertised yard sales. If you buy a two-day classified ad rather than one day they will put you on the map.
A game in which you are shown two Hot or Not candidates and you try to guess which person is hotter.
Using this service, search for local events on EVDB from your cell phone, WAP, SMS, email or toolbar, using the 411Sync Mobile API.
Twain driver that, instead of getting images from a scanner, gets images from flickr and Yahoo Image Search. User can search for images and insert them into many applications that support scanning.
Using this service, search and get the latest events from Zvents on Cell Phone: SMS, WAP and Email using 411Sync Mobile API.
Mixes blogging and geotagging. Create virtual billboard to express yourself, rant or advertise.
Make your own search collage. You upload an image, select a search query, and application will build a collage of the the picture using image tiles found with Yahoo Image Search API.
See where the American Idol 2006 candidate fan base is located. Look on the map to find your favorite American Idol, and when you find them be sure to track them.
The physical Wikipedia. Users pick a Wikipedia article to link to, print out the generated semapedia tag and attach it to a matching physical place. This maps plots photos of some of those objects.

A Google map that plots the course of the Boston Marathon. It also describes communities along the route and stages of the race. Created Brian Hamman of Faneuil Media. The map is running on Boston.com
Track reports of eminent domain law abuse in the United States. Also includes pinpoints for related events: rallies, meeting, protests, etc.

Say4 gets the latest news from an RSS feed of the BBC, puts the title of each one of the headlines into a search of a database containing the full text of the Bible. The results are sometimes surprising.
Get deals from Kayak.com on cell phones -- SMS, Email or WAP -- using 411Sync Mobile API.
Get a rich overview of any backcountry spot. Overlays from Nexrad, Topographic, Aerial and other data sets.

mashup: Crowd Match via Hot or Not
description: Hot or Not plus Wisdom of Crowds. Enter your username and get matchmaking recommendations from The Crowd. Also includes rankings of top matches by location.
A auction marketplace for finding movers when you need to move. Maps show current move locations.
Winner of the Amazon and Microsoft developer contest. Lets children pick what they want for Christmas from custom list of Amazon toys and games.
Mashup of Google Maps API and Upcoming.org events. Good use of Ajax. Currently for Twin Cities only.
Find consumer electronice warranty services by manufacturer search: LG, Goldstar, Sanyo, Casio, Daewoo, Braun, Toshiba. Results plotted on a Google Map.
Mashup technique for adding EvokeTV listings automoatically to a 30 Boxes calendar.
A service for creating RSS web feeds that integrate your Amazon Associates listings into your site.
Interesting application to plot the distributions of fish species on an interactive map showing collection localities.
iPod Radar helps people iPods and accessories as well as iPod news, blogs, links, software and more.
An interesting set of example plugins for AOL Instant Messenger. Note as of Dec 2006 this appears to be unavailable.

geoDesktop based on GMAP2, with thousands of public WMS layers, usable as base map and overlay. Near realtime services: METAR weather, earthquakes, daily terra and tropical storms. Plus MP3 from Freesound Project and geoRSS with news, audio and videos.
Simple interactive map that presents introductory information of all Thailand Changwat, or admin subdivisions.
Local guide for Bilbao Spain mixing Flickr pictures, tags, Google maps and blog directory. Note: loads very slowly.
These US cities have voted resolutions to bring US Army home and out of Iraq.
A mashup of Google Maps and MySpace.
Basic information of all 50 Bangkok subdivisions is presented as interactive map.

RSStalker.com provides XML based RSS feeds to track price changes of Amazon products. Generate a feed for a single product or for an entire wishlist. Add it to your favorite aggregator and you will be automatically notified when the price changes.
Site plots your approximate location on a Google Map based on your present Internet IP address.
A map and search tool for finding churches and ministries in Illinois and Iowa.
Healthia maps mashup for comparing hospital prices and different medical procedures. Displays hospitals and their charges.
Paste an email with full headers and see on a Google Map the path path your email message took as it passed through various servers.
Views of Ground Zero with stories and photographs from Sept 11 2001. From the Sept 11 Digital Archive Project.
Handy data mining tool for Flickr. Search on interestingness, user, and other attributes.
This Google map displays major oil spills since 1960. The spills are searchable by decade and by volume.
Price and feature comparison of new and used office equipment - copiers, faxs, printing supplies. Uses the eBay and Shopping.com APIs.
The Internet Bargain Center used their college database to put together this NCAA basketball finals map. Marker popups show team logos.
Allows you to take flickr feeds and view them as Apple iPhoto photocasts.
What you get when you combine Digg.com, ShoutWire.com and Slashdot.org.
Fun and handy mashup for keeping-up with celebrity sightings in NYC. Readers are encouraged to email-in as soon the celeb is spotted. From the folks at Gawker.
Search marketing service for Salesforce.com
Find scuba diving trip reports with Google Maps.
The ScoreSum game tests how good you are at guessing peoples HOT or NOT ratings. With an added twist.
Unified search interface for finding vacation rentals from across multiple vacation rental web sites.
The Social Guide to Beer with a browse interface allowing you to use a Google Map to find a suitable watering hole.
This mashup of del.icio.us and easyutil.com allows people to find similar sites. It answers the question people who tagged this site also tagged what other sites.
Unique mapping search interface and drill-down, with lots of links to local resources. Builds a US city information profile from over 20,000 cities in the United States.
Mashup of UK traffic data using BBC and Windows Live Local. Toggle for showing Long-term Delays markers is nicely done so the initial map load is faster.
A maps and events mashup using the MapQuest and EVDB APIs. Enter a location to get a map of the area and then find local events.
HIT-Builder allows you to create HITs, Human Intelligence Tasks, for the Amazon Mechanical Turk service without coding.
Purdue University students can determine if IT labs are open and current computer availability via this dynamically generated Google Map.
A dynamic Yahoo Map displaying the physical locations of site visitors.
Another media marketing mashup, this time from Warner Brothers for their new movie with Bruce Willis and Mos Def. Type in your home address and add local landmarks within a 16 block diameter.
Geo-referenced spider collections across North America. Ability to map locations by species and also produce species lists and image galleries by bounding box.
Follow the characters and crimes from the new season of the Sopranos on this map from HBO. Very nice integration of Flash video content and navigation directly into the map.
A project that bashes together Wikipedia, flickr and del.icio.us. NOTE: As of Feb 2007 this site appears to be down.
Find pubs in London by location, tube or postcode using this Google Map.
A proof-of-concept mashup between Salesforce.com and Del.icio.us. Allows Enterprise Edition Salesforce.com users to quickly associate a URL with an account, contact, or lead.
Groupr allows you to view the six most recent photos from all of your own or a Flickr group from someone else.
Mashfu looks for anything interesting around you by searching YahooLocal for places to eat, evdb for local concerts, and Yelp for anything recently reviewed. From Jeff Mashall.
Plot your own jogging routes through London with this Nike-sponsored Google Map. You can also browse routes created by others, search by distance, terrain, location, popularity and other variables.
Interactive guide to the tourist sights of Potsdam, Germany using Google Maps.
Service that uses del.icio.us tags to provide a means for finding tagged audio by genre.
Using the new high resolution map for the Turin events this map shows the locations of the Olympic venues with links to corresponding Italian Wikipedia entries.
This map displays the locations of some of the companies and bloggers actively working with RSS in the Boston area. With site links and trivia. From Adam Green.
See the full events calendar of the Torino 2006 Olympic Winter Games and up-to-date results and medals.
The PodNova service for finding and subscribing to podcasts easy uses uses the Feedburner Awareness API to create their Top 40 chart.
Customized interface into Yahoo Search specializing in video game news.
Extensive motel and accommodation directory. Find information on more than 12,385 motels and 47,831 accommodations.
NOTE: As of July 2007, this site is down. Daily recommendations from the most helpful Amazon reviewers.
If you have either questions or answers, use this Mechanical Turk application to get matched. Earn up to three cents per answer.
You will be amazed at just how close an Arizona fugitive lives to your house.
Replicates MyeBay in a klip for use with the Klipfolio application. Supports eBay.com and eBay.co.uk
This podcast directory and resource uses the Feedburner Awareness API to display circulation data about podcast feeds.
Shows changing set of photographs based on time of day they were taken.
Battle different search terms against each other and see which returns the most results. PHP source code available.
Database of home prices for selected US cities.
Local search engine that displays eBay auctions and Yahoo Local business listings within a specified geographic location.
The United States of Ajax allows you to visit 20,261 Cities within 3,140 Counties in the United States. Data is available for each State, County and City. Dozens of data sources linked.

Mashing up the unconference. Jeff Marshall created this very slick Google Maps mashup for unconferences, gatherings, parties, etc that shows the locations of attendees and draws relationship connections between people.
Check hotel rates and see Google-mapped locations for six US cities and London UK. Map markers color-coded by price range.
Watch a real-time stream of bookmarks being added to del.icio.us. By Alex Bosworth.
Find podcasts then listen to them in an online Ajax player.
Create lists of movies, cds, dvds, any old thing, and share them with friends. Lists are editable and commentable.
Search listings and maps from over 1500 speed-dating events. Includes US, Canada, and UK.
This is a Google map displaying all reported riots and demonstrations that occured in the aftermath of the publication of cartoons representing the Muslim prophet Muhammad in a Danish newspaper.
Police and Fire incident database for many major US metropolitan areas.
World news updated hourly from Newsvine.com feeds.
Wishlist sharing site to evangelize your wishes for the world and connects with similar-minded people.
Use this Windows Live Local map to tour the Detroit area near Ford Field. Use the arial 45-degree photos for close-ups.
A history plus geography wiki that allows readers to contribute items of historical interest and plot their locations. Novel use of Google API for a timeline. Initial dataset is US battles.
Good UK mashup displaying data from BBC travel news, BBC London traffic cams, local weather, geotagged Flickr photos and UK Gatso speed camera. By Dom Ramsey.
See television show locations from BBC Backstage plotted on a Google Map. From Tom Scott.

RouterComp is a shopping comparison and search site for networking equipment. Find the best price for new and used hardware and compare online stores to auction prices. It uses the Shopping.com and eBay APIs.
Techzingo watches Slashdot.org, Digg.com, TheRegister.co.uk for new stories, extracts related tags and displays them in a cloud.
New social recommendation service focused on discovering places in the SF Bay Area.
The handy Mailinator service gives you free and disposable email address. But they get spam too. Lots of it. About a million a day. This shows you the spam source locations.
Share your predictions with the world and see how many others are of a similar mind and what they, in turn, predict will happen.
A mashup of Flickr, del.isio.us and Google Maps allowing people to shoot, tag, geotag and publish pictures from their mobile phone. Note that page is slow load.
Google Maps mashup of Web 2.0 applications showing where approximately 200 web startups are located. By Ryan Williams.
Search for books by ISBN using this simple application built on the Amazon APIs.
Answer the question of where can I go nearby to get rid of all this junk piled up in the corner of the garage. Or, where can I go nearby to donate food, goods, and clothing to a good cause.
Find ATMs by zip code and bank name. Very detailed results.
A novel Flash-based interface to search eBay.
Hide and Seek is a game for MSN Messenger. One player hides in a MSN Virtual Earth Map and the other has to find him. He can ask 20 questions to help clue-in.
Use thumblicious to quickly preview the most popular sites bookmarked on del.icio.us via thumbnail screenshots.
diggdot.us meets frapper on this Google Map.
See where to watch-out by viewing these details of bicycle accidents in San Francisco on a Yahoo Map.
Search through the Amazon catalog with this simple Ajax-powered interface. By Jeff Chausse.
eBay Mashup allowing users to created advanced searches for eBay items and have those items sent to them every day by email or RSS.
Create conference calls for Skype directly within salesforce.com
An experimental discovery tool that searches tags from various social network-type sites including Flickr, Technorati, and Upcoming.
UK property search engine map that lists more than two thirds of homes for sale in England, Scotland and Wales.
Use AJAX tree browser to show the Amazon product catalog in a live, clickable outline. Clicks open successive tree levels without need for a page refresh. Products are shown in a dynamic Ajax popup.
Application for creating fundraising eStorefronts built on the Amazon API. Enables non-profit organizations to raise money through online shopping.
Tag cloud that combines Yahoo s Content Analysis Web Service with RSS feeds from Yahoo News to visualize weighted distribution of keywords found in current news.
A video wiki that mashes up RSS video feeds, video blogs, and podcasts. Members can subscribe to favorite channels, create and share playlists and clips, and export personalized RSS feeds.

Get personalized gift ideas using the interactive query and recommendation tool built on the Amazon API. Indicate person, price range, rate a series of suggested gifts, it learns, then makes recommendations.
Side-by-side comparison shopping. Pick any two products that Amazon offers and see in the same window. Comparison shopping to compare more than just prices. As they say: Shop Smart, Shop in Parallel.
Interactive birds eye view of several famous golf clubs. You can use both Google Maps and Virtual Earth.
Toni Schneider mapped the 10 most valuable Silicon Valley tech company locations and then computed their average location weighted by stock market valuation.
Play a game of pool inside MSN Messenger and Windows Live Messenger.
This Google maps mashup displays location of CIA secrets prisons in Europe. Our source are various newspaper websites.
LCLS is a regional library system that serves 11 counties. These route maps show the libraries on each of the six routes for each day of the week.
Dartmaps shows the real-time locations of the Dublin Ireland suburban commuter trains and plots them onto a Google Map as they move. Watch them go.
Find skiing and windsurfing webcams with this mashup integrating live webcam pictures with the Yahoo Flash API. Nice use a banding widget to draw zoom area.
Great mashup that asks the question: If I dig a very deep hole, where I go to stop Pick a spot on the map and it shows you the opposite location on the globe. Very fun.
A wiki with Google Maps built in for mountain bike trail information around the world. Anyone can contribute their own favorite trails.

Virtual Address Book is a MSN Activity which allows you to share your favourite locations visually. Good drag and drop UI to show the person you are chatting with where anything is via a Virtual Earth map.
Newzingo watches Google News for new stories, extracts related tags and displays them in a cloud. The bigger the tag, the more stories are about its topic.
Auction management services for eBay. They will list your auctions, design templates, provide feedback, and fulfill orders by boxing and shipping to your customers.
This Google Maps mash-up displaying locations of Iran nuclear facilities.

Zollage is a collage of Amazon products. Each picture is made up of tiny product images. The tiny products are all clickable to get a view of the product and read the reviews. Nice Ajax UI from Francis Shanahan.
A site showing Bruce Springsteen s Devils and Dust global concert tour via Google Maps.
Do price comparisons from your cell phone to find prices on the Internet from anywhere.
Get detailed traffic reports on your phone. Yahoo Traffic based results. The traffic report will be based on a 10 mile radius around an entered zip code and will include major and critical incidents.
Mashup of what s hot using the Yahoo Buzz index to show the day s most popular search queries on Yahoo Updated hourly with sections on Music, Movies, Sports, and Games.
BlockRocker.com uses Google Maps to show classifieds by location. View classifieds as locally or as globally as you want to.
Use the Healthia doctor search to find doctors the United States. 800,000 doctors listed.
Browse, search and purchase products from Amazon s entire product catalog, compare them against eBay listings and Yahoo shopping. Get via RSS feed or WML on Blackberry.
Use this Business Finder to find local businesses. May be less need to use th old 411 service and spend .50 per call.

Slut-o-meter evaluates the promiscuity of the subject you enter by comparing the number of Google search results with and without safe-search enabled. Promiscuity Percentage calculated as: Pr(slut) 100 ((unsafe-safe) unsafe).
Commercial application using the Google and Yahoo Advertising APIs (the old Overture APIs) for improving results on Yahoo Search and Google AdWords.
Updates the Skype mood field with stuff from Flickr, RSS feeds etc.
Geo-reference of the news offered by the Catalan newspaper, lavanguardia, in it s students edition
Search and browse NYC real estate listings along with Google Maps.
Google Maps-API Application for Digitizing (GMAD). GMAD lets users trace map features on Google Maps and satellite imageries. Code snippets in XML, SVG, Google Maps are generated while working.
A Yahoo Map of the San Diego road construction projects with details, cost estimates and completion date.
Mix and match news, weather, NASA satellite pix, Flickr images and other datasources on a Google maps background. Good map UI and useful data.
Search NYC real estate listings with locations plotted on Google Maps.
A map of 60 castles in Japan. With photos and details for each.
The Greenpeace Defending Our Oceans voyage is plotted on this Google Map.
The classic game Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego lives on in this intrepretation on a Google Map. Race around the globe as a government agent to stop a deadly terror attack.
ShoppingTogether is a multi-user online shopping application running on MSN Messenger Activity platform. Two users can chat and shop though Messenger while browsing a catalog of 18 million items.

Shared Search is a way for you and your contact to perform searches on the same keywords and view the results together. Results are synchronised and will open in the Shared Search browse window inside Messenger.
Web cams around the world on a Google Map.
MyConcertDates.com maps currently touring muscial acts in the US.
Shop on eBay as you chat. eBay searches are displayed on a MSN Virtual Earth Map. Map is syncronized between the two users. Click on items on map to display balloon with more information.
A mashup of Slashdot and Digg. Bringing the news together for nerds.
Color is used to represent newsworthiness of news stories from the Washington Post RSS news feed plotted on a Google Map.
Interactive tag cloud of Washington Post stories that lets you browse stories by keyword. By Frank Wiles.
Google Map of Hindu temples. Use the state by state index at the bottom of the page to navigate.
A daily news quiz generated directly from Washington Post headline feeds.
Yelp user reviews of stores, restaurants, bars and venues placed in context on a Google Map.
Over a thousand fishing spots in national parks, wildlife refuges, lakes, campgrounds, historic trails etc.
Flickrmap.com is a web service that allows you to put a flash based world map on your own website or blog. It searchs your Flickr photos and plots the ones tagged with places, with EXIF or geotagged.
Combines houses for sale or rent in Spain with Google maps.
Digg slashdot del.icio.us popular are a constant browsing cycle for some and so this site combines them into a unified format, eliminate duplicates and adds some extra niceities.

Notesaic allows you and someone else to work on a note at the same time. Two users can work on different parts of the note and see the changes edits as they happen and then send a copy of the note to whoever you want.

View real-time ski conditions for ski resorts all over the world on Google Map along with webcams, resort information, trail maps and weather forecasts. Snowcast feature predicts which resorts will have the best snowfall in next 24 hours.
Search FSBO real estate listings via Google Maps and Google Earth. Nice, fast interface with photos of properties, mortgage calculator and it shows date the property was listed for sale.
This app allows you to exchange contact cards with your friend. Enter your name, organization, phone, web address, favorite quote and picture - and app will create a nice looking contact card.
The Internet Bargain Center allows users to find eBay bargains near their zip code, college, or airport. Also pick out colleges and airports in a particular state using Google Maps.
Opens a web browser in Messenger to share URLs, search the web and monitor URLs you and your contacts are typing without needing to open a web browser.
Get 360-degree views of NYC of Google Map-selectable locations.
A mashup showing the average weekday passenger entries to the Top 50 NYC Subway stations, with the markers sized according to the data value represented.
Rich mashup with live weather, forecasts, webcams, and more on a Google Map.
The premise is simple: it shows you 4 pictures, only 3 of which belong together, if you spot the exception, you win. Yahoo Image Search API used to dynamically get the images.
The t4im app integrates a translator and dictionary into the MSN Messenger. You can communicate with foreign people even if you don t understand their language.
Keep up with and discuss with friends in Messenger the lastest UFO sightings with this combination of MSN Virtual Earth Maps and data from the National UFO Reporting Center.
Puts eBay searches on a MSN Virtual Earth Map. It will try to locate your zip automatically. It works in the USA, UK, France and Germany.
A contacts page for a personal website. Essentially, it s a place where people can add their information or interesting places they ve been to a database.
Plots CATA (Centre Area Transportation Authority) bus route and timetable information within the map interface.
Public restrooms in San Francisco on a Goolge Map. Handy, if you happen to have access to this when you need it.
Comprehensive for-sale-by-owner search engine using Google Maps.
Ridesharing site where users can store and search for rides all on a map. All contact between users is anonymous. NOTE: As of January 2007 this site has changed and is no longer the mashup described.
Google Map of real estate listings in Folkestone UK and surrouding Kent area.
Find baseball, football and hockey stadiums and arenas in the US by this index of Google satellite Maps.

Chatting with other person in MSN Messenger it s great, but sometimes you want to meet him her in reality. You need to find some place, which is suitable for both of you. This application will help you to find the ideal meeting place.
Uses Yahoo Map Images and EnGraph GPS components to show current position of Tim Hibbard, developer for EnGraph.
Plotted current and predicted positions of Hurricane Rita over the days as it approached landmass. The most viewed Virtual Earth map in the gallery.
Plots trails for sports such as BMX, hiking, and horse riding and allows people to contribute and share their trails.

Displays driving directions in Virtual Earth maps using data from the MapPoint Web Service. The ASP.NET page makes the calls to the MWS and returns XML which is in turn parsed by the JavaScript using XMLHttpRequest.
Google Maps based hotel reservation services and visual search.
Find people looking to chat. Shows you all of Userplane s live chat activity on a map, broken down by their chatrooms.
This site contains links to the most spectacular and notable UK landmarks.
Play a game of virtual golf on Google Maps satellite images. Multiple courses around the US available.
Use this Google Map to plot, pardon the pun, crimes in Topeka Kansas.
in the Captitol Hill neighborhood. From a href http: food206.com food206 a .
Collection of traffic webcams plotted on a Yahoo Map.
can quiz you on your knowledge of Provincial Capitals of Canada. See if you can guess the name before you click on each icon.
Greg Gershman s mashup plotting Chicago-area bloggers.
A Google map showing all the main motorsport venues, links and events in the UK. NOTE: As of Jan 2007 this site appears to be down.
Yahoo hacker Mike Heideman pulls a lot franchises together under one roof of Americana - fast food, wifi, diesel, hotel, and car rentals.
Crime mashup of the upscale San Francisco neighborhood.
Jeffrey McManus from Yahoo s Developer Network created this nice interactive map of San Diego s trolleys.
You can dial the Amazon web API from any phone, enter a UPC code, and do real time price checks when your out shopping. Very cool.

Frappr (Friend Mapper) lets you see the zip code where your friends live or work, letting you find out who works in the office building next door and who lives in the apartment complex across the street.

From Yahoo Maps: Jamie Glenn plotted home sales data for 200 zip codes in the Bay Area from May 2004 to May 2005. Blue means going up month over month, orange means going down. Click on them to see the year over year details.
From Yahoo Maps: Here is a mashup plotting the USATT-sanctioned table tennis tournaments in Pacific Region by Sudhish Iyer.
Yahoo s description: Bike maps require back roads and out-of-the-way rest stops on roads don t have names or details for a rest stop. Elena did a Mashup that works around all those issues.
Find wineries by location and varietal. As they say So many wineries..so little time .
Web Cams in Dublin Ireland plotted on a Google Map.
Another crime-locator map, this time Toronto Ontario Canada.
A Start.com gadget which shows photos from any Flickr RSS.
A Yahoo Map to help players and parents plan their soccer outings.

NOTE: As of Jan 2007 this is out of service. Slick interface for finding movies anywhere in US via this Google Maps mashup. Pick a geographic region, then browse by Theater or Movie. (The UI has some kinks to work-out, like overlapping windows at times.)
Combines Google Maps, cameras and GPS into the newest road game to sweep the country .
Francis Shanahan created this take on Google Suggest only with Amazon that he calls Amazon Zuggest . It dynamically searches Amazon as you type, no need to hit Submit or Enter.
Blosh finds blogs mentioning locations and displays them on a map.
Flash-based vector graphics meet Google Maps API to deliver the NYC Subway map in a new form.
Find Stuff you didn t know you wanted. Follow the Amazon similarity web and be surprized by where you get.
Google Maps the traceroute command show you the route from your pc to any site on the internet. From WeReporters.
Use your iPod as your guide through this service that creates downloadable iPod-friendly directions from Yahoo Maps.
Your Groovy Guide to Travel Hotels and Hostels . A search engine with Google Maps and geocoding.
Play match-maker with couples on HotOrNot. If you are a HotOrNot user, you can also see who people think you should hook up with.
Desktop Blog Client that integrates many RSS and Web Services for creating blog content.
An early use of the MSN Virtual Earth APIs to find movies by location in the Seattle area.
Google Maps data from Penn Public Safety combined to create a non-profit, freely browsable database of crimes reported in West Philadelphia, in and around the University of Pennsylvania.
Get pictures of people on HotOrNot to your cellphone. Right now you get picture working on ranking back
First generic eBay Google Maps Mashup
gFeedMap combines Google Maps and Feedmap.net to display the location of websites blogs on a Google map. It also features BlogMaps - badge-sized maps for websites.
Tracks current news and opinions about the U.S. Supreme Court.
PEP, the Prodigem Enclosure Puller, combines the Prodigem API for BitTorrent and the del.icio.us feed for popular videos to automatically deliver those videos.
A klip for KlipFolio which uses the OpenSearch API to search numerous websites
Amazon API-based appliction from Pete Freitag. Offers deal search and RSS subscriptions.
Photos on Google Maps from the Pixagogo online photo service.
Xbox Radar helps people find Xbox 360 products and information.
MSN Virtual Earth used to plot photos from the a href http: www.america24-7.com America 24 7 project a .

LinkPut is an experiment that attempts to create a better search experience by using powerful search results from Yahoo, combined with a wiki type collaboration of the community to help better define the information describing the results returned.
Shows the best search results from both Google and Yahoo in a new way. Also allows user to alter his trust in either engine to bais combined rankings.
See where Tim is now: he always carries a GPS-enabled mobile phone and data gets plotted on a Google Map (also uses Cloudberry and his own EnGraph).
Geographically place Wikipedia articles on top of Google maps.
By combining weather camera data of the AWS WeatherBug network, www.instacam.com, with Google maps, Brady Davis created a handy way to find US web cams.
Find people to meet on HotOrNot.com by browsing on a Google Map. Start in your zip code and browse the nearby areas.
KatrinaShelter.com uses Google Maps to list private homes and shelters able to take people displaced by the storm; doesn t work in Safari.
Social network visualization using Flickr API.
